invention_title.text: High power electrostatic chuck with features preventing he hole light-up/arcing

abstract.text: A spark suppression apparatus for a helium line in an electrostatic chuck in a plasma processing chamber is provided. The spark suppression apparatus comprises a dielectric multilumen plug in the helium line, wherein the dielectric multilumen plug has a plurality of lumens, wherein the plurality of lumens are numbered between 30 to 100,000 lumens and have a width of between 1 micron and 200 microns.

abstract.text: The present application relates to a communication method and apparatus, and a readable storage medium. The method comprises: a sending end acquiring an information bit sequence, and using a generator matrix corresponding to a parity-check matrix of an LDPC code to encode the information bit sequence to obtain a codeword sequence, wherein the code length of the LDPC code is less than or equal to 36, and the girth of a Tanner graph corresponding to the parity-check matrix of the LDPC code is greater than or equal to 6; and sending the codeword sequence. By using the present application, the decoding success rate of the system can be improved, and thus the decoding performance and the transmission reliability are improved. The present application supports IEEE series protocols, such as IEEE 802.11bn/UHR protocol, IEEE 802.15/UWB protocol, IEEE 802.11bf/sensing protocol or integrated millimeter wave/IMMW protocol. The present application can also support a spark link/nearlink standard protocol.

La présente demande se rapporte à un procédé et à un appareil de communication, ainsi qu'à un support de stockage lisible. Le procédé comprend les étapes suivantes : une extrémité d'envoi acquiert une séquence de bits d'informations, et utilise une matrice de générateur correspondant à une matrice de contrôle de parité d'un code LDPC pour coder la séquence de bits d'informations pour obtenir une séquence de mots de code, la longueur de code du code LDPC étant inférieure ou égale à 36, et le périmètre d'un graphe de Tanner correspondant à la matrice de contrôle de parité du code LDPC étant supérieur ou égal à 6 ; et envoyer la séquence de mots de code. En utilisant la présente demande, le taux de réussite de décodage du système peut être amélioré, et ainsi les performances de décodage et la fiabilité de transmission sont améliorées. La présente demande prend en charge des protocoles de série IEEE, tels que le protocole IEEE 802.11bn/UHR, le protocole IEEE 802.15/UWB, le protocole IEEE 802.11bf/sensing ou le protocole intégré à ondes millimétriques/IMMW. La présente demande peut également prendre en charge un protocole standard de liaison par étincelle/liaison proche.

本申请涉及一种通信方法、装置及可读存储介质，该方法包括：发送端获取信息比特序列，利用LDPC码的校验矩阵对应的生成矩阵对信息比特序列进行编码，获得码字序列；其中LDPC码的码长小于或等于36且LDPC码的校验矩阵所对应的编码二分图的围长大于或等于6；发送该码字序列。采用本申请，可以提高系统的译码成功率，从而提高译码性能和传输可靠性。本申请支持IEEE系列协议，如IEEE 802.11bn/UHR协议，IEEE 802.15/UWB协议，IEEE 802.11bf/sensing协议，或集成毫米波/IMMW协议。本申请还可支持星闪/spark link/nearlink标准协议。

abstract.text: The present invention relates to the field of air purification devices, and provides an electrostatic air purifier. The electrostatic air purifier comprises a housing, a high-voltage circuit control module, an electrostatic generation module and a collection module, the high-voltage circuit control module being fixed on the outer side wall of the housing; three fixing holes are formed in the housing, the high-voltage circuit control module comprises three conductive assemblies, and the three conductive assemblies respectively extend into the housing via the fixing holes; the conductive assemblies are each sleeved with an insulating sleeve, the insulating sleeves abutting against the hole walls of the fixing holes; one conductive assembly is connected to the electrostatic generation module, and the other two conductive assemblies are connected to the collection module. In the electrostatic air purifier of the present disclosure, the conductive assemblies are sleeved with the insulating sleeves, and the insulating sleeves abut against the hole walls of the fixing holes, thus achieving isolation between the housing and the conductive assemblies. In this way, the formation of electric spark patterns on housings caused by electric leakage of conductive assemblies can be avoided, thus further preventing the problem of short circuit caused by high-voltage breakdown of housings.

La présente invention se rapporte au domaine des dispositifs de purification d'air, et concerne un purificateur d'air électrostatique. Le purificateur d'air électrostatique comprend un boîtier, un module de commande de circuit haute tension, un module de génération électrostatique et un module de collecte, le module de commande de circuit haute tension étant fixé sur la paroi latérale externe du boîtier ; trois trous de fixation sont formés dans le boîtier, le module de commande de circuit haute tension comprend trois ensembles conducteurs, et les trois ensembles conducteurs s'étendent respectivement dans le boîtier par l'intermédiaire des trous de fixation ; les ensembles conducteurs sont chacun emmanchés avec un manchon isolant, les manchons isolants venant en butée contre les parois de trou des trous de fixation ; un ensemble conducteur est connecté au module de génération électrostatique, et les deux autres ensembles conducteurs sont connectés au module de collecte. Dans le purificateur d'air électrostatique de la présente divulgation, les ensembles conducteurs sont emmanchés avec les manchons isolants, et les manchons isolants viennent en butée contre les parois de trou des trous de fixation, réalisant ainsi une isolation entre le boîtier et les ensembles conducteurs. De cette manière, la formation de motifs d'étincelles électriques sur les boîtiers provoqués par une fuite électrique d'ensembles conducteurs peut être évitée, évitant ainsi en outre le problème de court-circuit provoqué par un claquage à haute tension des boîtiers.

本发明提供一种静电式空气净化器，涉及空气净化设备领域。静电式空气净化器包括壳体、高压电路控制模组、静电发生模组和收集模组，高压电路控制模组固定在壳体的外侧壁上；壳体上开设有三个固定孔，高压电路控制模组包括三个导电组件，三个导电组件分别自固定孔伸入壳体的内部，导电组件上套设有绝缘套，绝缘套与固定孔的孔壁抵接，其中一个导电组件与静电发生模组连接，另外两个导电组件与收集模组连接。在本公开的静电式空气净化器中，导电组件上套设有绝缘套，绝缘套与固定孔的孔壁抵接，实现了壳体与导电组件的隔绝。如此，避免了导电组件漏电导致的壳体形成电火花纹，进而避免了壳体被高压击穿导致的短路问题。

invention_title.text: Welding gun water cooling device of electric spark surfacing repair machine
一种电火花堆焊修复机的焊枪水冷装置

extracted_name.value: SHENYANG BOYIQIANG HEAVY MACHINERY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
沈阳博屹强重型机械设备有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of material repair, and discloses a welding gun water cooling device of an electric spark surfacing repair machine, which comprises a repair machine main machine and a welding gun, the repair machine main machine is connected with the welding gun through a connecting line, and the side wall of the welding gun is respectively provided with a liquid outlet and a liquid inlet. One side of the repairing machine main machine is sequentially provided with a guiding and returning water pump, a cooling box and a guiding-out water pump, the input end of the guiding-out water pump is connected with the welding gun through flow guiding pipes, and the two flow guiding pipes are connected with the liquid outlet and the liquid inlet through hoops. According to the utility model, the heat dissipation area is increased through the annular spiral cooling channel, and the cooling efficiency is improved; the flexible pipeline is in buckle type surrounding clamping connection, rapid disassembly and assembly are facilitated, the operation flexibility is improved, and the burden of a welding gun is relieved; a filtering device is additionally arranged in a cooling liquid circulation path, blocking is effectively prevented, and the stability and durability of the system are improved.

本实用新型涉及材料修复技术领域，公开了一种电火花堆焊修复机的焊枪水冷装置，包括修复机主机和焊枪，所述修复机主机和焊枪之间通过连接线连接，所述焊枪的侧壁上分别设置有出液口和进液口，所述修复机主机的一侧依次安装有导回水泵、冷却箱和导出水泵，所述导出水泵的输入端均通过导流管与所述焊枪之间相连，两个所述导流管与所述出液口和所述进液口之间均通过环箍相连。本实用新型中，通过环形螺旋冷却通道增大散热面积，提高冷却效率；柔性管道采用卡扣式环绕卡接，便于快速拆装，提升操作灵活性并减轻焊枪负担；在冷却液循环路径中增设过滤装置，有效防堵塞，提高系统稳定性和耐用性。

一种烟雾净化装置

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a smoke purification device, which belongs to the technical field of electric spark machining and comprises an installation device, an air inlet device and a purification and recovery device, the air inlet device used for air inlet and the purification and recovery device used for sucking and recovering and purifying smoke are installed on the installation device, the purification and recovery device comprises a recovery assembly used for recovering waste oil in smoke, a filtering and sucking assembly used for providing negative pressure environment suction and filtering and purifying, and a driving assembly used for providing driving force. The recycling assembly, the filtering and sucking assembly and the driving assembly are all mounted in the mounting device, the driving assembly is connected with the recycling assembly and the filtering and sucking assembly, and the recycling assembly comprises a mounting frame, a rotating shaft, a plurality of rotating plates, a filter cartridge, a collecting tank, an oil collecting box and a supporting plate. By means of the mode, oil molecules in smoke can be collected through the arrangement of the rotating plate and the filter cylinder so that follow-up secondary utilization can be facilitated, meanwhile, the filtering difficulty of the filtering and sucking assembly is reduced, and follow-up cleaning is facilitated.

本实用新型公开了一种烟雾净化装置，属于电火花加工技术领域，包括安装装置、进气装置和净化回收装置，安装装置上安装有用于进气的进气装置和用于抽吸并对烟雾进行回收净化的净化回收装置，净化回收装置包括用于回收烟雾中废油的回收组件、用于提供负压环境抽吸并过滤净化的过滤抽吸组件和用于提供驱动力的驱动组件；回收组件、过滤抽吸组件和驱动组件均安装在安装装置内部，驱动组件均与回收组件和过滤抽吸组件连接，回收组件包括安装架、转轴、多个转板、滤筒、收集槽、集油盒和支撑板。通过上述方式，本实用新型通过转板和滤筒的设置使得烟雾中的油分子可以得到收集便于后续二次利用，同时降低了过滤抽吸组件的过滤难度便于后续清洁。

invention_title.text: Grinding machine with rotating housing
一种带转动罩壳的砂轮机

extracted_name.value: CHAODA ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION TECH LISHUI CO LTD
超达环保科技（丽水）有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a grinding machine with a rotary housing, which comprises a main body, a grinding wheel component and a dust filtering component are arranged in the main body, the main body is further provided with the housing, the housing covers the periphery of the grinding wheel component and is movably connected with the main body, and a lighting device is arranged in the housing. The housing capable of rotating in a hinged mode is arranged at the position, corresponding to the working position of the grinding wheel, of the grinding machine shell with the rotating housing, and the light source is arranged in the housing, so that the problems of dust splashing, spark splashing and too dark operation light are solved.
本实用新型公开了一种带转动罩壳的砂轮机，包括：主体，所述主体内设置有砂轮组件和粉尘过滤组件，还设置有罩壳，所述罩壳罩设于所述砂轮组件外周，并且所述罩壳与所述主体活动连接，所述罩壳内部设置有照明装置，通过本设置，通过在带转动罩壳的砂轮机壳体上对应砂轮工作位置，设置有一铰连接能够转动的罩壳，并且在罩壳内设置有光源，解决了粉尘飞溅，火花飞溅和操作光线过暗的问题。

invention_title.text: Component machining jig based on non-standard automation equipment
一种基于非标自动化设备的部件的加工治具

extracted_name.value: CHENGDU ROCK PREC MANUFACTURING CO LTD
成都若克精密机械制造有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a part processing jig based on non-standard automation equipment, which comprises a jig base, a clamping component used for clamping a processing part is arranged at the top of the jig base, a positioning plate is arranged on the upper surface of the jig base, and a positioning plate is arranged on the upper surface of the jig base. A restraining assembly used for restraining spark generation and splashing is installed on one side of the upper surface of the jig base, and a collecting assembly used for limiting spark collection is installed on the surface of the jig base. Through the synergistic effect of all structures of the suppression assembly, the fire suppression agent can be sprayed in time when sparks are generated, splashing of the sparks is effectively suppressed, personal safety threats to operators are reduced, potential risks such as skin burns and eye injuries are avoided, and the safety of the operators is improved. Splashing sparks are guided in and collected into the collecting tank filled with the fire extinguishing medium through the guide plate, and therefore production efficiency reduction and enterprise safety cost and maintenance cost increase caused by fire disasters are avoided.

本实用新型公开了一种基于非标自动化设备的部件的加工治具，包括治具底座，所述治具底座的顶部安装有用于夹紧加工部件的夹持组件，所述治具底座的上表面安装有定位板，所述治具底座上表面的一侧安装有用于抑制火花产生和飞溅的抑制组件，所述治具底座的表面安装有用于限制收集火花的收集组件；本实用新型通过抑制组件各个结构的协同作用，能够在火花产生时及时喷洒抑火剂，有效抑制火花的飞溅，降低了对操作人员的人身安全威胁，避免了皮肤灼伤、眼部伤害等潜在风险，通过引导板将飞溅的火花导入并收集至装有灭火介质的收集槽中，从而避免了因火灾导致的生产效率下降和企业安全成本与维修成本的增加。

invention_title.text: HYDROPHOBIC FILTER MEDIUM

abstract.text: A filter medium is provided that comprises a nonwoven layer. The nonwoven layer comprises a sizing agent and a hydrophobic, stiffening binder resin. The nonwoven layer may be corrugated. A method producing a filter medium is also provided. The filter medium may be a fuel filter, oil filter, air filter, or an electric discharge filter. The filter medium, after corrugation, pleating, or embossing, avoids or minimizes water ingress, while still allowing the filter medium to maintain its structural and filtration properties.

invention_title.text: SUBSTRATE TREATMENT APPARATUS AND SUBSTRATE TREATMENT METHOD

abstract.text: The present invention provides an apparatus for treating a substrate. The apparatus for treating a substrate may include: a process treatment unit that provides a treatment space in which the substrate is treated; and a plasma generation unit that is provided above the process treatment unit and generates plasma from a process gas. The plasma generation unit includes: a plasma chamber having an electric discharge space formed therein; a shield unit surrounding the exterior of the plasma chamber; an antenna which surrounds the shield unit from the outside of the shield unit and to which high-frequency power is applied; and a connecting unit electrically connecting the shield unit and the antenna.

abstract.text: A system for manufacturing a nanomaterial may include a first electrode; a second electrode spaced apart from the first electrode by a gap; and a chamber configured to enclose the first electrode, the second electrode, and a liquid. The system may also include a power supply configured to provide electrical energy to at least one of the first electrode and the second electrode; and a pump configured to cause the liquid to flow through the gap between the first electrode and the second electrode.

CONTROL DEVICE FOR WIRE ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINE AND CONTROL METHOD FOR ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINING
ワイヤ放電加工機の制御装置および放電加工の制御方法

abstract.text: This control device for a wire electric discharge machine includes: a movement control unit that causes a wire electrode to move along a machining path; a voltage control unit that controls a machining power supply and applies a machining voltage across poles; and a machining control unit that maintains a non-discharge state in which discharge does not occur between the poles until the wire electrode reaches a first position on the machining path, that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position, gradually increases the discharge density so that the discharge density of the discharge becomes a set value set as a machining condition, and that, upon the wire electrode reaching the first position again, gradually decreases the discharge density to achieve a non-discharge state.

L'invention concerne un dispositif de commande pour une machine d'électroérosion par fil comprenant : une unité de commande de mouvement qui amène une électrode en fil à se déplacer le long d'un trajet d'usinage ; une unité de commande de tension qui commande une alimentation électrique d'usinage et applique une tension d'usinage entre des pôles ; et une unité de commande d'usinage qui maintient un état sans décharge dans lequel aucune décharge ne se produit entre les pôles jusqu'à ce que l'électrode en fil atteigne une première position sur le trajet d'usinage, qui, lorsque l'électrode en fil atteint la première position, augmente progressivement la densité de décharge de telle sorte que la densité de décharge de la décharge devient une valeur définie définie comme condition d'usinage, et qui, lorsque l'électrode en fil atteint à nouveau la première position, diminue progressivement la densité de décharge pour pour parvenir à l'état sans décharge.

ワイヤ放電加工機の制御装置は、ワイヤ電極を加工経路に沿って移動させる移動制御部と、加工電源を制御して極間に加工電圧を印加する電圧制御部と、ワイヤ電極が加工経路上の第１位置に到達するまでは極間において放電が発生しない無放電状態を維持し、ワイヤ電極が第１位置に到達すると、放電の放電密度が加工条件として設定された設定値になるように放電密度を徐々に増加させ、ワイヤ電極が第１位置に再び到達すると、放電密度を徐々に減少させて極間を無放電状態にさせる加工制御部と、を備える。

invention_title.text: Electric discharge machine for precision process
정밀 가공용 방전 가공기

abstract.text: 본 발명은 전극의 세팅시간을 줄이고 작업능률을 향상시킬 수 있는 정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 정밀 가공용 방전 가공기에 관한 것으로서, 상측의 헤드부(100)와 하측의 거치부(200)로 구분하면서 헤드부(100)와 거치부(200) 사이가 개방된 형태로 형성된 본체부, 상기 본체부에 구비되며 피가공물(20)이 거치되는 거치부(200), 상기 거치부(200)의 상면에 돌출 형성되어 상기 피가공물(20)이 지지되며 전류가 흐르는 음극전극부, 상기 거치부(200)의 상면을 마주하도록 배치되며 전류가 흐르는 양극전극부(180) 및, 상기 양극전극부(180)를 고정하면서 높이 및 좌우이동을 제어하는 지그이동부(100a)를 구성하며, 상기 지그이동부(100a)는, 동력부(110)와 상기 동력부(110) 하측에 위치한 높이조절부(120)와 상기 높이조절부(120) 하측에 위치한 연결체(140)와 상기 연결체(140) 하측에 위치한 지그회전체(150)와 상기 지그회전체(150)의 하측에 위치한 전극지그(160)와 상기 전극지그(160) 하측에 위치한 소정의 수직길이로 형성된 전극(170)과 상기 전극(170)의 하측에 위치하여 피가공물의 가공부위에 접촉하는 제1전극팁(183)으로 구성된 양극전극부(180)를 포함하며, 상기 양극전극부(180)는, 전극(170) 하단에 연결되는 수직형 제1몸체(181-1)와 상기 제1몸체(181-1)의 일측면 하단에서 수평으로 연결되면서 상면 중앙에서 하면 중앙으로 관통된 제1체결공(181-3)이 형성된 제2몸체(181-2)로 구성된 제1지지부(181)와, 상기 제1지지부(181)의 제2몸체(181-2) 하부에 배치되어 제1체결공(181-3)의 위치에 대응된 제2체결공(182-1)이 형성되면서 하면 중앙에 제1전극팁(183)의 상부를 결속하는 제1삽입공이 형성된 전극연결체(182)를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

invention_title.text: Electric discharge machining system for precision setting and process
정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 방전 가공 시스템

abstract.text: 본 발명은 전극의 세팅시간을 줄이고 작업능률을 향상시킬 수 있는 정밀 세팅 및 가공을 포함하는 방전 가공 시스템에 관한 것으로서, 외관을 형성하는 본체부, 상기 본체부에 구비되며 피가공물이 거치되는 거치부(200), 상기 거치부(200)의 상면에 돌출 형성되어 상기 피가공물이 지지되며 전류가 흐르는 음극전극부, 상기 거치부(200)의 상면을 마주하도록 배치되며 전류가 흐르는 양극전극부(180), 상기 양극전극부(180)를 고정하면서 높이 및 좌우이동을 제어하는 지그이동부(100a) 및, 상기 피가공물의 방전가공을 제어하는 방전제어모듈을 포함하는 방전가공기가 구비되며, 상기 방전제어모듈은, 피가공물의 3D 도면을 이용하여 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공을 자동으로 수행하는 방전가공프로그램과, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공시 상기 방전가공기에 설치된 센서들의 측정값을 화면에 표시하고 동작 상태를 실시간으로 화면에 표시하는 모니터와, 상기 방전가공기의 동작을 제어하는 신호를 입력하는 동작스위치 입력부와, 상기 방전가공프로그램을 저장하고, 상기 피가공물의 방전 가공 측정값을 시간대별로 저장하는 메모리 및, 상기 동작스위치 입력부의 입력 신호와 상기 방전가공프로그램에 따라 방전 가공을 자동 수행을 제어하는 제어부로 구성되며, 상기 지그이동부(100a)는, 동력부(110)와 상기 동력부(110) 하측에 위치한 높이조절부(120)와 상기 높이조절부(120) 하측에 위치한 연결체(140)와 상기 연결체(140) 하측에 위치한 지그회전체(150)와 상기 지그회전체(150)의 하측에 위치한 전극지그(160)와 상기 전극지그(160) 하측에 위치한 소정의 수직길이로 형성된 전극(170)과 상기 전극(170)의 하측에 위치하여 피가공물의 가공부위에 접촉하는 제1전극팁(183)으로 구성된 양극전극부(180)를 포함하는 것을 특징으로 한다.

invention_title.text: Apartment house electric discharge panel
공동주택 전기 분전반

abstract.text: 이러한 본 발명은 전기 분전반의 소음과 진동이 벽면에서 공동주택으로 확산이 분전구에 의하여 줄여지도록 하는 것이다.

invention_title.text: ELECTROSTATIC CHUCK

abstract.text: An electrostatic chuck 10 includes a dielectric substrate 100, an internal electrode 140 provided inside the dielectric substrate 100, a base plate 200 in which a through hole 230 is formed, a power supply member 400 that is a member for supplying power to the internal electrode 140 and is inserted through the through hole 230, and an insulating member 500 arranged between an inner surface of the through hole 230 and the power supply member 400. The insulating member 500 includes a tubular first insulating member 510, and a tubular second insulating member 520 covering a part of the first insulating member 510 on an outer peripheral side. The electrostatic chuck 10 further includes an annular member 530 for preventing an electric discharge along a path from the power supply member 400 to the inner surface of the through hole 230 passing between the first insulating member 510 and the second insulating member 520.

abstract.text: This machining tank lifting device of an electric discharge machine lifts a machining tank (4) in which a machining liquid is stored. The machining tank lifting device of the electric discharge machine includes: a drive source (1) and a rack pinion (2) for lifting the machining tank (4) on the depth side of the machining tank (4); and a cylinder (5), having the function of preventing the front side of the machining tank (4) from dropping down in relation to the depth side, on the front side of the machining tank (4).

Ce dispositif de levage de réservoir d'usinage d'une machine à décharge électrique soulève un réservoir d'usinage (4) dans lequel un liquide d'usinage est stocké. Le dispositif de levage de réservoir d'usinage de la machine à décharge électrique comprend : une source d'entraînement (1) et un pignon de crémaillère (2) pour lever le réservoir d'usinage (4) sur le côté de la profondeur du réservoir d'usinage (4) ; et un cylindre (5), ayant pour fonction d'empêcher le côté avant du réservoir d'usinage (4) de tomber par rapport au côté de la profondeur, sur le côté avant du réservoir d'usinage (4).
放電加工機の加工槽昇降装置は、加工液を貯留された加工槽（４）を昇降する。放電加工機の加工槽昇降装置は、加工槽（４）の奥側に、加工槽（４）を昇降するための駆動源（１）およびラックピニオン（２）を配置し、加工槽（４）の正面側に、加工槽（４）の奥側に対する正面側の垂れ下がりを防ぐ機能を有するシリンダ（５）を配置する。

abstract.text: Embodiments provide an electromagnetic lens, a scanning electron microscope, and an electron beam inspection apparatus, which are capable of suppressing an electric discharge between an objective lens and a target object. An electromagnetic lens includes a coil; a yoke including an upper wall on the upstream side along the advancing direction of a primary electron beam passing, outer and inner peripheral walls, and a lower wall where a gap is formed on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction or an inclined wall where a gap is formed on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction, letting the primary electron beam pass through a space surrounded by the inner peripheral wall, and surrounding the coil by the upper wall, the outer and inner peripheral walls, and the lower wall or the inclined wall; and a cover contacting and covering an end surface of the yoke on the downstream side along the primary-electron-beam advancing direction, the end surface including a corner portion on the inner peripheral side, wherein the cover corner portion is formed having a curved surface.

abstract.text: A solution processing apparatus (1) includes a main body portion (20A) having a gas flow channel (30) through which a gas flows, an electric discharge section (40) for generating plasma discharge within the gas flow channel (30), and a power supply section (9) for applying voltage between a first electrode (42) and the second electrode (44) of the electric discharge section (40). The power supply section (9) periodically applying AC voltage between the first electrode (42) and the second electrode (44), thereby causing the electric discharge section (40) to perform a discharge operation in such a manner that current flowing through a solution (90) has a waveform composed of waveforms which are alternately repeated and represent positive current values and negative current values, respectively, the average of the current values becomes substantially 0 in each period, and the absolute value of a positive peak current value becomes larger than the absolute value of a negative peak current value in each period.

invention_title.text: Deep vulcanization treatment device for silica gel tube
一种硅胶管用深度硫化处理装置

extracted_name.value: 临海市海花橡塑制品有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides a deep vulcanization treatment device for a silica gel tube. The deep vulcanization treatment device for the silica gel tube comprises a barrel body, an electric discharge hopper, an air inlet pipe, a first cross, a transmission column and the like, the interior of the barrel body is hollow; an electric discharge hopper is arranged at the bottom of the barrel; an air inlet pipe is arranged at the lower part of the outer ring surface of the barrel; a first cross is arranged at the lower part of the inner ring surface of the barrel body, and the first cross is hollow; a transmission column is rotationally connected to the first cross. By means of the mode that the packing auger conveys the silicone tubes, the silicone tubes are more dispersed, and therefore the situation that in the prior art, an existing vulcanization drying tunnel furnace adopts a conveying belt for conveying, the silicone tubes are prone to accumulation in the conveying process, vulcanization of the silicone tubes is not uniform, and the optimal performance of the silicone tubes is affected is avoided.

本实用提供了一种硅胶管用深度硫化处理装置。硅胶管用深度硫化处理装置包括有桶体、电动出料斗、进气管、第一十字架和传动柱等；桶体内部设置为中空；桶体底部设置有电动出料斗；桶体外环面下部设置有进气管；桶体内环面下部设置有第一十字架，第一十字架内部设置为中空；第一十字架上转动连接有传动柱。通过绞龙对硅胶管的输送方式，使得硅胶管更为分散，从而避免了现有技术中，现有的硫化烘道炉均采用传送带进行传送，在输送过程中硅胶管容易堆积，导致硅胶管硫化不均匀，从而影响硅胶管的最佳性能。

invention_title.text: Graphite electrode mechanism for deep curved surface machining
一种深度曲面加工用的石墨电极机构

extracted_name.value: 佛山市越鑫模具有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides a graphite electrode mechanism for deep curved surface machining, which relates to the technical field of graphite electrode machining equipment and comprises a quick clamping component, the quick clamping component is used for clamping a graphite electrode, and the graphite electrode is used for performing electric discharge machining on parts; the upper end of the connecting assembly is connected with the horizontal adjusting table, the upper end of the horizontal adjusting table is connected with the rotary adjusting table, and the upper end of the rotary adjusting table is connected with the machine tool. The device has the beneficial effects that the rotary adjusting table and the horizontal adjusting table are arranged, so that the circumference angle of the graphite electrode on an XY plane can be adjusted, and the angle of the graphite electrode on an XYZ space can be adjusted; according to the multi-angle fine adjustment graphite electrode, fine adjustment of multiple angles can be carried out when the graphite electrode carries out electric discharge machining on a product, so that more accurate positioning can be achieved when the product with a deep curved surface is machined, and the machining quality and the size precision of the product are guaranteed.

实用新型提供一种深度曲面加工用的石墨电极机构，涉及石墨电极加工设备技术领域，包括快速夹持组件，快速夹持组件夹持石墨电极，石墨电极用于对零部件进行放电加工；所述快速夹持组件与连接组件连接，连接组件上端连接水平调节台，水平调节台上端连接旋转调节台，旋转调节台上端与机床连接。本实用新型的有益之处是，设置了旋转调节台以及水平调节台，能对石墨电极在XY平面上进行度的圆周角度调节以及对石墨电极在XYZ空间上进行角度调节；使得石墨电极在对产品进行放电加工的时候，能进行多个角度的精调，这样对于具有深度曲面的产品进行加工的时候，可以达到更加准确的定位，从而保证产品加工的质量以及尺寸精度。

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a numerical control electric discharge machine cooling device in the technical field of electric discharge machines, which comprises a machine frame, a cooling device, a cooling device, a cooling device and an electric discharge machine, and is characterized in that the machine frame is provided with a processing machine head and a blocking frame, and a bearing seat is arranged in the blocking frame; the cooling mechanism comprises an annular pipe shell arranged in the blocking frame, an annular opening is formed in the inner circumferential side of the annular pipe shell, an annular sealing plate is rotationally arranged in the annular opening, a plurality of spraying pipes communicate with the inner circumferential side of the annular sealing plate in an array mode, and a plurality of supporting plates are arranged on the side, located on the annular pipe shell, of the annular sealing plate in an array mode; a water tank is arranged on the machine frame, a water drainage pipe is communicated between the blocking frame and the water tank, a water inlet pipe is communicated between the water tank and the annular pipe shell, and the water inlet pipe is communicated with a water pump arranged on the machine frame.

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of die machining, in particular to a machining method of a supercharger turbine shell runner die, which comprises the following steps of: roughly machining an inner cavity of a die blank by adopting a low-speed fast feeding machining method and a cavity milling machining method; a machining strategy combining streamline machining and equal-height machining is adopted, and a high-speed cutting machining mode is adopted for semi-finish machining; an equal-height machining method is adopted for the side wall of the mold, a streamline machining method is adopted for the bottom and the runner face of the mold, 45-degree oblique angle streamline machining is adopted, and bottom back gouging is conducted on right-angle sides through a milling cutter; in the tongue area of the runner mold and the area where the machining precision cannot be guaranteed, the tail end and the sharp corner of the runner are subjected to electric discharge machining treatment through an electrode; performing deburring treatment on the parting surface of the mold; and a blue-light 3D scanner is used for detecting the molding surface of the mold. The machining method combining streamline machining, equal-height machining and electric spark machining is adopted, the partition finish machining technology is adopted, and the machining precision is improved.

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of mold manufacturing, in particular to a CNC engraving-based mold machining process optimization method. Comprising the following steps that CNC rough machining is conducted on a mold core; a secondary grinding forming cutter is adopted, and a mesh structure and a hot-pressing column structure on the mold core are directly machined through the CNC engraving and milling technology; wherein the distance between the mesh structures is smaller than or equal to 1.6 mm, the diameter of each hot-pressing column structure is 1.5 mm +/-0.05 mm, and the height of each hot-pressing column structure is 0.5 mm +/-0.02 mm; and electrode design, electric discharge machining and mold saving procedures are omitted, and integrated forming of the mold core from roughing to finish machining is achieved. Defects in the prior art cause a die enterprise to fall into difficulty in cost and quality balance: a high-price strategy loses order competitiveness, and a low-price strategy faces a cost upside-down risk. Therefore, the invention provides an innovative processing method which can simplify the process, reduce the cost and guarantee the precision.

本发明涉及模具制造技术领域，尤其涉及一种基于CNC精雕的模具加工工艺优化方法。包括以下步骤：对模仁进行CNC开粗加工；采用二次研磨的成型刀具，通过CNC精雕工艺直接加工模仁上的网孔结构和热压柱结构；其中，网孔结构的间距≤1.6mm，热压柱结构的直径为1.5mm±0.05mm、高度为0.5mm±0.02mm；省略电极设计、放电加工以及省模工序，实现模仁由开粗至精加工的一体化成型。现有技术缺陷导致模具企业在成本与质量平衡中陷入困境：高价策略丧失订单竞争力，低价策略则面临成本倒挂风险。因此，本发明提供了一种能简化流程、降低成本并保障精度的革新性加工方法。

abstract.text: The invention discloses an arrangement method for arranging electrode jigs for electric discharge machining. The arrangement method comprises the following steps: respectively establishing electrode jig information according to electric discharge machining conditions of a plurality of electrode jigs; the electric discharge machining machine divides the multiple pieces of electrode jig information into a rough machining category, a finish machining category and a pouring gate machining category; next, the electric discharge machine not only arranges the above three categories into a rough machining category, a finish machining category and a pouring gate machining category in sequence, but also arranges information of a plurality of electrode jigs of each category from large to small according to the size of the area where the electrode jigs conduct electric discharge machining, and therefore the electric discharge machining accuracy is improved. According to the machining sequence arrangement method, the use sequence of the multiple electrode jigs can be correctly arranged, so that the use sequence of the multiple electrode jigs cannot be wrongly ranked due to practical experience of operators, and the selected electrode jigs can be used at opposite time points relative to an electric discharge machining machine.

本发明公开一种编排放电加工的电极治具编排方法，包含以下步骤：依据多个电极治具的放电加工条件分别建立电极治具信息；放电加工机将多个电极治具信息区分为粗加工类别、精加工类别与浇道加工类别；接下来，放电加工机不仅将前述三个类别先后顺序排列为粗加工类别、精加工类别与浇道加工类别，而放电加工机还会将每一个类别的多个电极治具信息依据电极治具进行放电加工的区域大小由大到小进行排列，借此，本发明加工顺序排列方法能正确地编排多个电极治具的使用顺序，使得多个电极治具的使用顺序不会因为操作人员的实务经验而排序错误，相对放电加工机能在相对的时间点使用选定的电极治具。

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a replacement mechanism for an electric discharge machine, which relates to the field of electric discharge machines, and has the technical scheme that the replacement mechanism comprises an electric discharge machining head, a base and a horizontally arranged turntable, the turntable is rotationally connected to the top of the base through a motor, and a plurality of clamping components for clamping the electric discharge machining head are mounted on the turntable. When the electric spark machining head is damaged and needs to be disassembled, the damaged electric spark machining head is disassembled to one of the clamping assemblies and is clamped, and the motor is started to drive the rotating disc to rotate and drive the other clamping assemblies to rotate. The electric spark machining heads damaged in the using process can be detached to other unused clamping assemblies, so that the multiple clamping assemblies can clamp the multiple electric spark machining heads detached from the electric spark machine for multiple times, and an operator can detach and replace the electric spark machining heads on the multiple clamping assemblies in a centralized mode; and the treatment times and frequency after an operator disassembles the electric spark machining head are reduced.

本实用新型公开了一种电火花机用更换机构，涉及电火花机领域，其技术方案要点是：包括电火花加工头和底座，还包括呈水平设置的转盘，转盘通过电机转动连接在底座顶部，转盘上安装有多个用于夹持电火花加工头的夹紧组件。本实用新型电火花加工头损坏需要拆卸时，将损坏的电火花加工头拆卸至其中一个夹紧组件上，并电火花加工头进行夹持，并启动电机驱动转盘转动并带动其它夹紧组件进行转动，可将使用过程中损坏的电火花加工头拆卸至其他未使用的夹紧组件上，使得多个夹紧组件可夹持多次从电火花机上拆卸下来的多个电火花加工头，从而操作者可集中拆卸更换多个夹紧组件上的电火花加工头，减少操作者拆卸电火花加工头后进行处理的次数和频率。

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a waste liquid treatment device for an electric discharge machine, which relates to the field of electric discharge machines and is characterized by comprising a base, a storage tray and a collecting frame arranged on the base, and a push plate is slidably connected in the collecting frame along the horizontal direction. According to the electric discharge machine, when working liquid is used for carrying out electric corrosion on materials on the storage disc, chippings removed from the materials through corrosion and the working liquid can be stored in the collecting frame, then the push plate is moved to move in the direction close to the filtering frame, and when the push plate moves, the chippings and the working liquid are pushed to move respectively; the working liquid flows into the containing opening and the water outlet groove in sequence through the filtering holes, the working liquid flows into the liquid collecting frame through the water outlet pipe, the chippings are stored in the filtering frame, and then the chippings in the filtering frame and the working liquid in the liquid collecting frame are treated; and the situation that the working solution cannot be repeatedly used due to the fact that the chippings are mixed in the working solution is avoided.

本实用新型公开了一种电火花机用废液处理装置，涉及电火花机领域，其技术方案要点是：包括底座和置物盘，还包括设置在底座上的收集框，收集框内沿水平方向滑动连接有推板。本实用新型电火花机在使用工作液对置物盘上的材料电蚀时，从材料上蚀除下来的碎屑以及工作液会储存在收集框内，之后移动推板使其朝靠近过滤框的方向移动，推板移动时分别推动碎屑以及工作液移动，直至碎屑以及工作液均被推入至过滤框内，工作液通过过滤孔依次流入容纳口和出水槽，并通过出水管使工作液流入至集液框内，碎屑储存在过滤框内，之后分别对过滤框内的碎屑和集液框内的工作液进行处理，避免碎屑混在工作液中导致工作液无法重复使用的情况。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a vehicle-mounted high-voltage battery pack charging and discharging power supply system and a control method thereof, and relates to the technical field of vehicle-mounted high-voltage energy storage, and the method comprises the steps: a system wakes up a request for low voltage, and obtains working parameters; monitoring the voltage value of the storage battery, part faults and CAN (Controller Area Network) communication; if the voltage of the storage battery is normal, the system works normally and parts do not have faults, low-voltage standby is prompted; the system normally requests high voltage or requests charging; monitoring high-voltage interlocking, fault conditions and bus voltage during pre-charging; when the high-voltage state of the system is normal and high voltage is normally increased, pure electric discharge is prompted; after high voltage is applied, the system normally requests direct current charging, alternating current charging or inversion discharging. The high-voltage battery pack is adopted to meet the high-voltage direct-current electricity utilization requirement of the system and the load requirement, various charging and discharging application scenes such as direct-current charging and alternating-current discharging and direct-current discharging and alternating-current discharging are supported, the discharging or charging mode is flexibly recognized, and double-gun charging and discharging can be effectively controlled according to the real-time working condition.

本发明公开了一种车载高压电池包充放电电源系统及其控制方法，涉及车载高压储能技术领域，该方法包括：系统唤醒请求上低压，获取工作参数；监测蓄电池电压值以及部件故障和CAN通讯；满足蓄电池电压正常、系统正常工作且部件无故障则提示低压待机；系统正常请求上高压或请求充电；监测高压互锁、故障情况以及预充时母线电压；系统高压状态正常且正常上高压时则提示纯电放电；上高压后，系统正常请求直流充电、交流充电或逆变放电。本发明采用高压电池包满足系统及负载需求的高压直流用电需求，支持多种充放电应用场景，如直流充电交流放电、直流放电交流放电等，灵活识别放电或充电模式，可根据实时工况有效控制双枪充放电。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of numerical control machine tools, in particular to an electric discharge machining tool and a machining method. The stand column is fixed to the base; the X-axis moving platform is connected to the base and can move along the X axis relative to the base; the Y-axis moving platform is connected to the X-axis moving platform and can move along the Y axis relative to the X-axis moving platform, and the Y-axis moving platform is provided with a cutter and a workpiece station; the Z-axis moving assembly is connected to the stand column and can move along the Z axis relative to the stand column; the rotary electrode is connected to the lower end of the Z-axis moving assembly and can rotate around the Z axis relative to the Z-axis moving assembly; wherein during any two adjacent machining procedures, the Y-axis moving platform and the Z-axis moving assembly are actuated, and the rotary electrode rotates, so that the tool machines the rotary surface of the rotary electrode. abstract.text: The utility model provides a guide mechanism of a medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine, which belongs to the technical field of medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge, and comprises a lower processing arm, a wire feeding mechanism, a guide wheel and a guide wheel cover, a mounting cavity for the guide wheel to rotate is formed between the guide wheel cover and the tail end of the lower processing arm, and the guide wheel is positioned below the wire feeding mechanism. A groove is formed in the side wall of the guide wheel in the circumferential direction of the guide wheel, the groove comprises a slag discharging groove part and a guide groove part which are arranged from inside to outside, the width of the slag discharging groove part is smaller than the diameter of a molybdenum wire, the width of the guide groove part is matched with the molybdenum wire, and the molybdenum wire is conveyed along the guide groove part; a guide wire channel communicated with the guide groove part is arranged on the upper end surface of the guide groove part towards the guide groove part; according to the molybdenum wire conveying device, the rotatable guide wheel is adopted to replace a traditional wire guide pipe, during continuous rotation of the guide wheel, the molybdenum wire conveying efficiency can be improved, deslagging is facilitated, the molybdenum wire can be well protected, and the service life of the molybdenum wire can be prolonged.

本实用新型提供一种中走丝电火花线切割机的引导机构，属于中走丝线切割技术领域，包括下加工臂、送丝机构、导轮与导轮盖，导轮盖与下加工臂的末端之间形成有供导轮转动设置的安装腔，导轮位于送丝机构的下方，导轮的侧壁沿其周向设置有凹槽，凹槽包括由内至外设置的排渣槽部与引导槽部，排渣槽部的宽度小于钼丝的直径，引导槽部的宽度与钼丝相适配，钼丝沿引导槽部输送，安装腔的下方设置有开口，并且其上端面朝向引导槽部设置有与之相连通的导丝通道；本实用新型中采用可转动的导轮替代了传统的导丝管，导轮在持续转动中，不仅能够提升钼丝输送的效率，还有利于进行排渣，并且能够较好地保护钼丝，延长其使用寿命。

abstract.text: To provide an electric discharge machine and a method of the same.SOLUTION: An electric discharge machine and a method of the same perform a discharge processing procedure on an object to be machined. The electric discharge machine includes a mounting base, and an electric discharge unit. The mounting base mounts the object to be machined. The object to be machined has a machining target area. The electric discharge unit performs an electric discharge procedure on the machining target area of the object to be machined, by a machining parameter, through a discharge electrode. The electric discharge unit adjusts an actual output energy value according to a state of change of a discharge frequency or discharge energy during the process of discharge of the discharge processing procedure, and thereby can maintain the discharge processing procedure in a target processing state. The electric discharge machine and the method assists in removing a residue remaining in a working groove by external force to be provided, by using a slag discharge unit, while an insulating sleeve covers the discharge electrode, which can reduce Kerf loss.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

【課題】放電加工装置とその方法を提供する。【解決手段】放電加工装置とその方法は、加工対象物に対して放電加工手順を行うためのものである。この放電加工装置は、載せ台と、放電加工ユニットと、を備える。載せ台は加工対象物を載せるためのものである。加工対象物は加工目標エリアを有する。放電加工ユニットは、放電電極を経由して、加工パラメータで、加工対象物の加工目標エリアに対して放電加工手順を行う。放電加工ユニットは、放電加工手順の放電の過程中の放電周波数または放電エネルギーの変化の状態に応じて、実際出力エネルギー値を調整することにより、放電加工手順を目標加工状態に維持できるようにする。放電加工装置とその方法は、スラグ排出ユニットを使用して、提供される外力により、加工溝に残留した残留物の除去を補助する。一方、絶縁スリーブが放電電極を覆うことにより、カーフロス（Ｋｅｒｆ Ｌｏｓｓ）を減少することができる。【選択図】図２

abstract.text: The method of the present invention employs: a testing step S1 in which a prescribed voltage is applied to a rolling bearing in a state in which the inner ring and the outer ring are rotating relative to one another; an investigation step S2 in which a search is conducted, within a first rolling surface and a second rolling surface that have completed the testing step, for an abnormal surface portion generated when a single electric discharge occurs between the first rolling surface or the second rolling surface and the rolling body; and an evaluation step S4 in which, if an abnormal surface portion comprising an electric discharge mark generated with an uneven shape is found in the investigation step, it is determined that the rolling bearing may generate ridge marks due to electrolytic corrosion on the first rolling surface or the second rolling surface, and if no electric discharge mark is found in the investigation step, it is determined that the rolling bearing does not generate ridge marks.

Le procédé de la présente invention utilise : une étape de test S1 dans laquelle une tension prescrite est appliquée à un palier à roulement dans un état dans lequel la bague interne et la bague externe tournent l'une par rapport à l'autre; une étape d'investigation S2 dans laquelle une recherche est effectuée, dans une première surface de roulement et une seconde surface de roulement qui ont terminé l'étape de test, pour une partie de surface anormale générée lorsqu'une seule décharge électrique se produit entre la première surface de roulement ou la seconde surface de roulement et le corps de roulement; et une étape d'évaluation S4 dans laquelle, si une partie de surface anormale comprenant une marque de décharge électrique générée avec une forme irrégulière est trouvée dans l'étape d'investigation, il est déterminé que le palier à roulement peut générer des marques de crête dues à la corrosion électrolytique sur la première surface de roulement ou la seconde surface de roulement, et si aucune marque de décharge électrique n'est trouvée dans l'étape d'investigation, il est déterminé que le palier à roulement ne génère pas de marques de crête.

abstract.text: In a closed impeller (1) made of an aluminum alloy, a plurality of blades (3) arranged in the circumferential direction connect a hub (2) and a shroud (4). First, electric discharge machining is performed on impeller material to form a plurality of flow passages (5) between the blades (3). Then, a surface of a flow passage that is the inner peripheral surface of each flow passage (5) in the impeller material is polished to remove a modified layer formed on the surface of the flow passage by the electric discharge machining, and then the surface of the flow passage is further polished.

Dans une roue à aubes fermée (1) constituée d'un alliage d'aluminium, une pluralité de pales (3) situées dans le sens circonférentiel relient un moyeu (2) et une enveloppe (4). Tout d'abord, un usinage par décharge électrique est réalisé sur un matériau de roue à aubes pour former une pluralité de passages d'écoulement (5) entre les pales (3). Puis, une surface d'un passage d'écoulement qui est la surface périphérique interne de chaque passage d'écoulement (5) dans le matériau de roue à aubes est polie pour éliminer une couche modifiée formée sur la surface du passage d'écoulement par l'usinage par décharge électrique, et la surface du passage d'écoulement est davantage polie.

abstract.text: The invention relates to an electric discharge machining device and method which are used for performing an electric discharge machining program on a to-be-machined object. The electrical discharge machining apparatus includes a stage and an electrical discharge machining unit. The carrying table is used for carrying a to-be-machined object. The to-be-processed object defines a processing target area. The electrical discharge machining unit performs an electrical discharge machining procedure on a machining target area of the to-be-machined object through the discharge electrode according to the machining parameters. The electric discharge machining unit correspondingly adjusts the actual output energy value according to the change state of the discharge frequency or the discharge energy in the discharge process of the electric discharge machining program, so that the electric discharge machining program is maintained in the target machining state. According to the electric discharge machining device and method, a deslagging unit is used for providing external force to assist in removing residues remaining in a machining groove. In addition, the insulation sleeve is used for wrapping the discharge electrode, so that cut loss can be reduced.

本发明涉及一种放电加工装置及方法，用以对待加工物进行放电加工程序。此放电加工装置包含载台及放电加工单元。载台用以承载待加工物。待加工物定义有加工目标区。放电加工单元经由放电电极以加工参数对待加工物之加工目标区进行放电加工程序。放电加工单元依据放电加工程序之放电过程中之放电频率或放电能量之变化状态，对应地调整实际输出能量值，使得放电加工程序维持在目标加工状态。放电加工装置及方法使用排渣单元提供外力辅助去除残留在加工沟槽中之残渣。此外，使用绝缘套包覆放电电极可减少切口损失。

invention_title.text: Machine tool structure with symmetrical combined machine heads
一种对称组合式机头的机床结构

extracted_name.value: 特博精机（深圳）有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a machine tool structure with symmetrical combined machine heads. The machine tool structure comprises a base, a first stand column, a second stand column, a first set of electric discharge machining machine heads and a second set of electric discharge machining machine heads. A working groove is formed in the base, the first stand column is arranged on one side of the base, and the second stand column is arranged on the other side of the base. A first X-axis linear module is arranged on the first stand column, and a second X-axis linear module is arranged on the second stand column. The first group of electric discharge machining machine heads is connected with the first X-axis linear module, and the second group of electric discharge machining machine heads is connected with the second X-axis linear module; each of the first group of electric discharge machining machine heads and the second group of electric discharge machining machine heads comprises at least three machine heads; any one of the discharge machining machine heads is provided with an independent Y-axis linear module and an independent Z-axis linear module and is connected with a discharge machining power source. The linkage of the first group and the second group of discharge machining machine heads can machine a plurality of workpieces or machine different parts of the same workpiece at the same time, so that the parallel work is realized, and the efficiency is improved.

本申请公开了一种对称组合式机头的机床结构，包括：底座、第一立柱、第二立柱、第一组放电加工机头和第二组放电加工机头；底座上设置有工作槽，第一立柱设置在底座的一侧，第二立柱设置在底座的另一侧；第一立柱上设置有第一X轴直线模组，第二立柱上设置有第二X轴直线模组；第一组放电加工机头与第一X轴直线模组连接，第二组放电加工机头与第二X轴直线模组连接；第一组放电加工机头和第二组放电加工机头均包含至少三个机头；放电加工机头的中的任意一个机头上均设置有独立的Y轴直线模组和Z轴直线模组并与放电加工电源连接。第一组和第二组放电加工机头的联动可以同时对多个工件加工或同一个工件的不同部位加工，实现并行工作，提高效率。

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of special maintenance of reactor bodies, and particularly relates to a control rod driving mechanism thermal sleeve dismantling process. Comprising the following steps that 1, a dismantling robot walks and is positioned to the position under a to-be-dismantled heat casing pipe; 2, the electric spark machining head is jacked and positioned to the position of the upper end of the to-be-dismantled hot casing pipe; 3, the electric spark machining head conducts electric discharge machining on the upper end of the to-be-dismantled hot sleeve till the upper end is completely cut off; 4, the heat sleeve is moved downwards, and middle cutting is carried out; and 5, the hot sleeve is taken out. The method provided by the invention has the beneficial effects that the method of removing the hot sleeve from the lower part of the top cover is adopted, so that the welding seam of the pressure-resistant shell of the control rod driving mechanism is prevented from being damaged, and the test verification work after the primary loop pressure boundary is damaged is not needed. And an electric spark machining method is adopted, remote automatic machining in a narrow space can be achieved, the reaction of machining does not exist, and the equipment can be light and miniaturized.

本发明属于反应堆本体特种维修技术领域，具体涉及一种控制棒驱动机构隔热套管拆除工艺。包括如下步骤：步骤1：拆除机器人行走定位至待拆热套管的正下方；步骤2：将电火花加工头顶升定位至待拆除热套管的上端头位置；步骤3：电火花加工头对待拆除热套管的上端头进行放电加工，直至全部切除；步骤4：下移热套管，并进行中部切割；步骤5：取出热套管。本发明的有益效果在于：采用从顶盖下方进行热套管拆除的方法，避免破坏控制棒驱动机构耐压壳的焊缝，不需进行一回路压力边界破坏后的试验验证工作。采用电火花加工的方法，能实现狭小空间的远程自动加工，不存在机械加工的反作用，装备可以实现轻便化和小型化。

invention_title.text: Four-head bilateral spark machine
一种四头双侧火花机

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a four-head double-side electric discharge machine, and belongs to the technical field of electric discharge machines. The device comprises a working table, bases higher than the table top of the working table are arranged on the two sides of the working table, the bases are symmetrically arranged on the two sides of the working table, two sets of spark units are slidably connected to the two sets of bases correspondingly, the four sets of spark units form a four-head structure, and the structures on the two sides of the working table are symmetrical; according to the design of the four-head double-side spark machine in the scheme, the spark units are arranged on the two sides of the workbench, two sets of spark units are arranged on each side, and the total number of the four sets of spark units is four. By means of the design, non-standard point position synchronous electric spark machining of the workpiece is achieved, the machining efficiency is greatly improved, and the device is particularly suitable for processing of non-standard customized products and has the efficient synchronous machining capacity. The spark machine head can freely move on the workbench in a three-dimensional mode and has the precise displacement control capacity. The flexibility ensures that the spark machine head can accurately reach any designated position on the workbench, and the complex machining requirement is met.

本实用新型涉及一种四头双侧火花机，属于电火花机技术领域；其包括工作台，工作台的两侧设置有高出工作台台面的基座，基座对称设置于工作台的两侧，两组基座上分别滑动连接有两组的火花单元，四组火花单元形成四头结构，且工作台两侧的结构对称；本方案的四头双侧火花机设计，使得工作台的两侧均配置有火花单元，且每侧两组，共计四组火花单元。这种设计实现了对工件的非标点位同步电火花加工，极大地提高了加工效率，尤其适用于非标定制化产品的处理，具备高效同步加工能力。火花机头能够在工作台上实现三维自由移动，并具备精准的位移控制能力。这种灵活性确保了火花机头能够准确到达工作台上的任何指定位置，满足复杂加工需求。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of wire and cable manufacturing and detection, and discloses a detection device for data cable processing, which comprises an electric discharge machine device, dust collection stabilizing devices are fixedly connected to two sides of the electric discharge machine device, and tension guide wheel devices are fixedly connected to the bottoms of the dust collection stabilizing devices. The spark machine device is fixedly connected with the integral shell, the spark machine device is fixedly connected with the base, the base is fixedly connected with the integral shell, and the tension guide wheel device is arranged, so that the detection precision is ensured, the missing detection and false alarm rate is reduced, the equipment compatibility is improved, the equipment loss is reduced, and the service life of the equipment is prolonged; the dust collection device is arranged, dust on the cable is cleaned and collected through negative pressure, the influence on subsequent procedures is reduced, the production stability is improved, the shutdown risk is reduced, the stabilizing assembly is arranged, high-speed shaking is restrained through non-contact adsorption of the negative pressure, and the procedure precision is improved.

本发明涉及电线电缆制造检测技术领域，且公开了一种数据线缆加工用检测装置，包括火花机装置，所述火花机装置的两侧固定连接有吸尘稳定装置，所述吸尘稳定装置的底部固定连接有张力导轮装置，所述火花机装置与整体外壳固定连接，所述火花机装置与底座固定连接，所述底座与整体外壳固定连接通过设有张力导轮装置，利用导向轮组保证检测精度，降低漏检与误报率，提升设备兼容性，降低设备损耗，延长设备的寿命，通过设有吸尘装置，利用负压将线缆上灰尘清扫并收集，减少对后续工序的影响，提高了生产的稳定性，降低停机风险，通过设有稳定组件，利用负压的非接触式吸附，抑制高速抖动，提高工序精度。

abstract.text: The invention particularly relates to a discharge machining simulation control system for a nuclear power plant in a high-radiation boron-containing water environment, which belongs to the technical field of special maintenance in the high-radiation environment of the nuclear power plant and comprises a man-machine interaction system, a discharge machining control system and subsystems. Each subsystem comprises a pulse power supply system, a servo power system, a washing system, a purification system, a grounding system and a tool system; the man-machine interaction system is used for man-machine interaction and displaying the discharge machining implementation data fed back by the subsystems; the electric discharge machining control system is used for generating an electric discharge machining instruction according to the man-machine interaction information and controlling the subsystems to cooperate to perform electric discharge machining work; and each subsystem is used for implementing electric discharge machining work according to the electric discharge machining instruction and feeding back electric discharge machining implementation data. According to the invention, simulation control of discharge processing in the high-radiation boron-containing water environment of the nuclear power plant is realized.

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the field of remote underwater maintenance, and particularly relates to an EDM cutting device with a rotary positioning function, which comprises a base, a positioning mechanism, a driving mechanism and an electrode device, the positioning mechanism is mounted on the base, the driving mechanism is mounted on the positioning mechanism, and the electrode device is mounted on the driving mechanism; the positioning mechanism is used for adjusting the electrode device in the circumferential direction, and the driving mechanism is used for vertically moving the electrode device in the axial direction; the electrode device is used for conducting electric discharge machining on the machined part. According to the device, center positioning is conducted through the positioning shaft and the positioning groove of the positioning mechanism, and accurate positioning of the EDM electrode and the machining position is achieved; and circumferential positioning is carried out through the rotating part of the driving mechanism, so that positioning of the EDM electrode in the circumferential direction is realized.

本发明属于远程水下维修领域，具体涉及一种具备旋转定位功能的EDM切割装置，包括：底座、定位机构、驱动机构、电极装置；定位机构安装于底座上，驱动机构安装于定位机构上，电极装置安装于驱动机构上；定位机构用于电极装置在圆周方向的调整，驱动机构用于电极装置在轴向方向的上下移动；电极装置用于对加工件进行放电加工。本发明装置通过定位机构定位轴及定位槽进行中心定位，实现EDM电极与加工位置的精确定位；通过驱动机构旋转件进行周向定位，实现EDM电极在圆周方向的定位。

invention_title.text: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS AND TRANSFER CONDITION CONTROL METHOD
画像形成装置及び転写条件制御方法

extracted_name.value: コニカミノルタ株式会社

abstract.text: To prevent the occurrence of an image quality defect caused by electric discharge at a leading end of a sheet, in performing image formation by superimposing toners with different average particle diameters.SOLUTION: An image forming apparatus 1 comprises: a secondary transfer unit 133 that secondarily transfers toner images to a recording material; and a control unit 16 that changes a transfer condition according to the physical property value of the recording material in image formation in which toner layers using toners with different average particle diameters are superimposed with each other.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 11
【課題】平均粒径の異なるトナーを重ね合わせて画像形成を行う際、用紙先端における放電による画質不良の発生を防止する。【解決手段】画像形成装置１は、転写条件に基づいて、記録材にトナー画像を２次転写する２次転写部１３３と、平均粒径の異なるトナーを用いるトナー層を重ね合わせる画像形成において、記録材の物性値に応じて、転写条件を変更する制御部１６と、を備える。【選択図】 図１１

invention_title.text: ELECTRIC DISCHARGE PROCESSING METHOD
放電処理方法

extracted_name.value: 本田技研工業株式会社

abstract.text: To provide an electric discharge processing method with which it is possible to efficiently reproduce the battery subject to processing.SOLUTION: The electric discharge processing method comprises: a discharge step in which a depleted lithium-ion secondary battery is discharged, and lithium is moved from the anode to the cathode of the lithium-ion secondary battery; a charge step in which the lithium-ion secondary battery is charged with a low voltage at which the proportion of lithium returning to the anode is small; a measurement step in which the capacity of the lithium-ion secondary battery is measured after being charged with the low voltage for a prescribed duration; and a confirmation step in which the state of health (SOH) is confirmed on the basis of the measured capacity of the lithium-ion secondary battery. Charge processing by the charge step is finished when the SOH of the lithium-ion secondary battery reaches a recovery critical point.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

【課題】効率良く対象電池を再生できる放電処理方法を提供することを目的とする。【解決手段】放電処理方法は、消耗したリチウムイオン二次電池を放電させ、前記リチウムイオン二次電池の負極から正極にリチウムを移動させる放電ステップと、前記リチウムイオン二次電池を、前記負極にリチウムが戻る割合の少ない、低電圧で充電する充電ステップと、前記低電圧で所定時間、充電したあとの、前記リチウムイオン二次電池の容量を測定する測定ステップと、前記測定された前記リチウムイオン二次電池の容量に基づいて、ＳＯＨ（Ｓｔａｔｅ Ｏｆ Ｈｅａｌｔｈ）を確認する確認ステップと、を備え、前記リチウムイオン二次電池のＳＯＨが、回復限界点に達したところで、前記充電ステップによる充電処理を終了する。【選択図】図２

invention_title.text: Pulling head of lower coil holder stay wire clamp of wire cut electric discharge machine
一种电火花线切割机的下线架拉线夹的拉头

extracted_name.value: 苏州智穿科技有限公司

classifications_ipcr.symbol:
B23H   1/    00            A I                    
                            
                            
                                B23H   7/    10            A I

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a pull head of a lower coil holder stay wire clamp of a wire cut electric discharge machine. A left-right moving groove and an up-down moving groove which are communicated with each other are formed in a fixed block; the guide nozzle mounting seat is fixedly mounted at the left end of the top of the fixed block; the guide nozzle is fixedly mounted at the right end of the guide nozzle mounting seat; a wire clamping groove located on the left side of the guide nozzle is formed in the left end of the guide nozzle installation base and located above the up-down moving groove. The left-right moving block is mounted in the left-right moving groove; the up-down moving block is mounted in the up-down moving groove; the top of the up-and-down moving block protrudes upwards to form a wire jacking block; the connecting rod is mounted between the left-right moving block and the up-down moving block, and the left end of the connecting rod is higher than the right end; the bottom sealing plate is fixedly installed on the bottom face of the fixing block, and the left-right moving block, the up-down moving block and the connecting rod are all packaged in the fixing block. The metal wire clamping device can clamp a metal wire and pull the metal wire to move in the left-right direction, and is high in automation degree and high in working efficiency.

本实用新型公开一种电火花线切割机的下线架拉线夹的拉头,固定块内开设相连通的左右移动槽、上下移动槽；导嘴安装座安装固定在固定块的顶部左端；导嘴安装固定在导嘴安装座的右端；导嘴安装座的左端开设有位于导嘴的左侧的夹线槽，夹线槽位于上下移动槽的上方；左右移动块安装在左右移动槽内；上下移动块安装在上下移动槽内；上下移动块的顶部向上突设顶线块；连接杆安装在左右移动块和上下移动块之间，连接杆的左端高于右端；底部封板安装固定在固定块的底面上，将左右移动块、上下移动块、连接杆都封装在固定块内。本实用新型能够夹紧金属丝，拉动着金属丝沿着左右方向移动，自动化程度高，工作效率高。

invention_title.text: Tensioning wire discharging device of medium-speed wire cut electric discharge machine
一种中走丝电火花线切割机的张紧出丝装置

extracted_name.value: ZHEJIANG SANQI MACHINERY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
浙江三奇机械设备有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides a tensioning wire outlet device of a medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine, and belongs to the technical field of medium-speed wire cut electrical discharge machine.The tensioning wire outlet device comprises a base, a sliding seat and a charging barrel, the charging barrel is used for outputting molybdenum wires wound on the charging barrel through rotation and is arranged on the sliding seat, and a sliding mechanism is arranged between the sliding seat and the base; the sliding mechanism comprises a driving assembly, and a guide rail and a sliding block which are arranged between the first inclined surface and the second inclined surface; compared with a traditional medium-speed wire cut electric discharge machine which adopts a tension adjusting mechanism with a plurality of tensioning wheels, the wire outlet device with the tensioning function has the advantages that the number of the tensioning wheels can be reduced, the structure of the device and the steps of threading and winding molybdenum wires are simplified, and the production efficiency is improved. And meanwhile, the problems that the multiple tensioning wheels vibrate in the working process and the cleaning difficulty of the multiple tensioning wheels is large after long-term machining are solved.

本申请提供一种中走丝电火花线切割机的张紧出丝装置，属于中走丝线切割技术领域，包括底座、滑动座与料筒，料筒用于通过转动输出绕设于其上的钼丝，并且其设置于滑动座上，滑动座与底座之间设置有滑移机构，滑移机构包括驱动组件以及设置在第一斜面与第二斜面之间的导轨与滑动块；本实用新型中带张紧功能的出丝装置，相较于传统的中走丝电火花线切割机采用多个张紧轮的张力调节机构，能够减少张紧轮的数量，简化了装置的结构以及穿绕钼丝的步骤，同时避免了在工作过程中多个张紧轮产生震动以及长期加工后多个张紧轮的清理难度大的问题。

abstract.text: The present invention provides a safe ultraviolet light irradiation device that uses ultraviolet light safe to the human body and has a wide range of microorganism elimination and sterilization effects, and also provides an ultraviolet light emitting element provided with: an electrode substrate having a pair of electrodes; at least one cylindrical or flattened cylindrical glass tube disposed on the electrode substrate so as to face both of the electrodes, the glass tube having both end parts sealed; a xenon gas-containing discharge gas enclosed inside the glass tube and generating an electric discharge due to a voltage applied to the electrodes; and a phosphor layer formed on an inner surface of the glass tube and emitting light when excited by the electric discharge, wherein the glass tube is made of borosilicate glass or quartz glass; and the phosphor layer is made of a phosphate-based fluorescent material and has an emission spectrum having a peak half value width within a wavelength range of 50 nm or less with a peak at a wavelength of 203±10 inm on an illuminance basis.

abstract.text: This electric discharge machine is provided with: a discharge machining unit that performs electric discharge machining on a workpiece in a machining fluid; and a filter that removes sludge contained in the machining fluid. When the workpiece is made of an aluminum-based material, electric discharge machining is performed using a machining fluid in which the specific resistivity has been reduced to a prescribed value or less due to addition of a chemical agent, and the prescribed value is equal to or less than 30,000 [[Omega]cm].

invention_title.text: CONTROL DEVICE FOR HYBRID VEHICLE
ハイブリッド車両用制御装置

extracted_name.value: ダイハツ工業株式会社

abstract.text: To provide a control device for a hybrid vehicle that can suppress electric discharge from a battery when the battery has an SOC equal to or lower than a threshold and an electric motor that functions as a power generator generates electric power of the maximum electric energy.SOLUTION: When a battery has an SOC equal to or lower than a threshold and a first electric motor generates electric power of the maximum electric energy and generates a deviation amount Wdf, at least part of the deviation amount Wdf is subtracted from at least one of the available electric energy and auxiliary power.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 8
【課題】バッテリのＳＯＣが閾値以下であり且つ発電機として機能する電動モータが最大電力量の電力を発電しているときにバッテリの放電を抑制できるハイブリッド車両用制御装置を提供する。【解決手段】バッテリのＳＯＣが閾値以下であり、第１電動モータが最大電力量の電力を発電し、且つズレ量Ｗｄｆが発生しているときに、使用可能電力量及び補機電力の少なくとも一方からズレ量の少なくとも一部を引く。【選択図】図８

invention_title.text: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS
画像形成装置

abstract.text: To prevent the occurrence of faulty cleaning in initial rotation for allowing a new process cartridge to perform printing.SOLUTION: An image forming apparatus comprises a control unit 100 that executes an initialization operation for allowing a new photoconductor drum 1 to perform printing, and an image forming operation for forming a toner image on a transfer material P. The control unit 100 controls a transfer voltage power supply 20 to apply, to a transfer roller 4, a constant voltage (-150 V) ((v) example 1 of transfer voltage) different from that during an image forming operation, in a time T11 until immediately before [2] a toner supply period for supplying toner in a developing area 31 from a developing device 3 to the photoconductor drum 1 in the initialization operation, and controls the transfer voltage power supply 20 so as to adjust the constant voltage to be applied to the transfer roller 4 in the time T11 to have a normal electrification polarity of the toner and a voltage value at which electric discharge does not occur between the photoconductor drum 1 and the transfer roller 4.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

【課題】新品状態のプロセスカートリッジを印刷可能状態にするための初期回転におけるクリーニング不良の発生を防ぐこと。【解決手段】新品状態の感光ドラム１を印刷可能な状態に移行させるための初期動作と、転写材Ｐにトナー像を形成するための画像形成動作と、を実行する制御部１００を備え、制御部１００は、初期動作において現像装置３から感光ドラム１に現像領域３１においてトナーを供給する〔２〕トナー供給期間の直前までの時間Ｔ１１で、転写ローラ４に画像形成動作時とは異なる定電圧（－１５０Ｖ）（（ｖ）転写電圧の実施例１）を印加するように転写電圧電源２０を制御し、時間Ｔ１１において転写ローラ４に印加する定電圧を、トナーの正規の帯電極性、かつ、感光ドラム１と転写ローラ４との間で放電しない電圧値となるように転写電圧電源２０を制御する。【選択図】図４

invention_title.text: IMPULSE TEST SYSTEM AND IMPULSE TEST METHOD
インパルス試験システム及びインパルス試験方法

extracted_name.value: 東芝産業機器システム株式会社

abstract.text: To provide an impulse test system and an impulse test method that make it possible to appropriately grasp an electric discharge point.SOLUTION: An impulse test system 20 tests a test transformer 1 for impulses. The impulse test system 20 comprises: a high-speed camera control device 25 for outputting a recording start command on the basis of the test voltage application timing of an impulse test; a high-speed camera 26 for capturing an image beginning from a timing at which the recording start command is received and installed in the periphery of the test transformer 1 that is the object to be tested; a test data recording server 22 for recording the captured image; and a display unit 21a for displaying an electric discharge point included in the result that is recorded in the test data recording server 22.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

【課題】放電箇所を適切に把握できるようにしたインパルス試験システム及びインパルス試験方法を提供する。【解決手段】インパルス試験システム２０は供試変圧器１をインパルス試験する。インパルス試験システム２０は、インパルス試験の試験電圧の印加タイミングに基づいて録画開始指令を出力するハイスピードカメラ制御装置２５と、試験対象となる供試変圧器１の周辺に設置され録画開始指令を受け付けたタイミングから撮像するハイスピードカメラ２６と、撮像された画像を記録する試験データ記録サーバ２２と、試験データ記録サーバ２２に記録された結果に含まれる放電箇所を表示する表示部２１ａと、を備える。【選択図】図１

abstract.text: The invention relates to the field of cooling oil filtering, in particular to a cooling oil filtering device of an electric discharge machine, solves the problems that an existing cooling oil filtering device of the electric discharge machine is inconvenient to clean, single in use and high in use cost, and provides the following scheme. The device comprises an upper barrel, a lower barrel, a motor bin, a chuck, a filter element, a telescopic piece, a circular ring disc, a first circular ring, a guide plate, a scraper and a cleaning brush, a traction assembly is arranged on the circular ring disc, an unfolding assembly is arranged between a vertical plate and the guide plate, a driving assembly is further arranged in the upper barrel and used for driving the first circular ring to rotate, and the lower barrel is provided with a driving assembly. The scraping plate is driven to clean the inner wall of the upper barrel and the cleaning brush is driven to clean the outer side surface of the filter element. The device can be used independently and can also be used in combination with an electric discharge machine, functionality is increased, oil can be fed from multiple pipe openings, the cooling oil filtering efficiency is greatly improved, self-cleaning can be achieved, the cleaning effect is good, and the use cost is low.

本发明涉及冷却油过滤领域，具体的公开了一种电火花机的冷却油过滤装置，解决了现有电火花机冷却油过滤装置不方便清洁，且使用单一，使用成本较高的问题，现提出如下方案，其包括上筒体、下筒体、电机仓、卡盘、滤芯、伸缩件、圆环盘、圆环一、导向板、刮板、清洁刷，所述圆环盘上设置有牵拉组件，所述竖板与导向板之间设置有展开组件，所述上筒体内还设置有驱动组件，所述驱动组件用于驱动圆环一转动，以带动刮板对上筒体内壁和清洁刷对滤芯外侧面进行清洁。本装置能够单独使用，也能够与电火花机组合使用，增加了功能性，能够多管口进油，大大的提高了对冷却油过滤的效率，并能够自清洁，且清洁效果好，使用成本低。

abstract.text: The present disclosure relates to a shielding device against atmospheric discharges. The device comprises a first conductive element and a second conductive element that passes through the first conductive element, wherein both conductive elements are electrically insulated by means of a first insulating body, and a second insulating body that are connected to the ends of the first conductive element and the second conductive element. Additionally, the device comprises a third conductive element that passes through the second conductive element that is connected to a fourth conductive element. The fourth conductive element is connected to one of the ends of the first and second conductive elements, and the shape of the fourth conductive element prevents the generation of a corona effect in the presence of an electric discharge. In addition, the third conductive element allows the lightning shielding device to be connected to a grounding element, thus concentrating the electric discharge only in the lightning shielding device, acting as an electric capacitor, and producing the flow of electric charge towards the grounding element, preventing the discharge from spreading to structures or people around.

abstract.text: An electric discharge machine adjusting head comprises a combination device, an adjusting device and an electrode base, the combination device is used for being combined with an electric discharge machine head, the electrode base is used for installing an electrode, the adjusting device comprises a top disc, a movable disc and a plurality of deflection adjusting assemblies, and the top disc is provided with a plurality of abutting parts; the movable disc is provided with a plurality of movable grooves, each movable groove comprises a straight groove and a ball hole, the straight grooves are located below the ball holes and communicated with the ball holes, and the ball holes are located below the abutting parts; each deflection adjusting assembly comprises a lifting ball and an adjusting piece, the lifting balls are located in the ball holes, the adjusting pieces are located in the straight grooves, and when the adjusting pieces are screwed into the movable grooves, the adjusting pieces extrude the lifting balls, so that the lifting balls abut against the abutting-against parts, the gap between the top disc and the movable disc is expanded, and the deflection adjusting assemblies are arranged on the top disc. Therefore, the deflection angle is changed.

一种放电机调整头，包含一结合装置、一调整装置及一电极底座，所述结合装置用于结合放电加工机头部，所述电极底座用于装设电极，所述调整装置包含一顶盘、一活动盘及多个偏摆调整组件，所述顶盘具有多个抵顶部；所述活动盘具有多个活动槽，每一活动槽包含一直槽、一球孔，所述直槽位于球孔下方且连通球孔，所述球孔位于一所述抵顶部下方；每一偏摆调整组件包含一升降球及一调整件，所述升降球位于所述球孔，所述调整件位于所述直槽，当所述调整件旋入所述活动槽，所述调整件挤压所述升降球，使所述升降球抵顶所述抵顶部，撑开所述顶盘与所述活动盘之间的间隙，以此改变偏摆角度。

invention_title.text: Penetrating head of wire penetrating frame of wire feeding frame of wire cut electric discharge machine
一种电火花线切割机的上线架的穿丝架的穿头

extracted_name.value: 苏州智穿科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a penetrating head of a wire penetrating frame of a wire feeding frame of a wire cut electric discharge machine. A circular rotating block mounting groove which is through up and down is formed in a fixed block; the rotating block is mounted in the rotating block mounting groove and can rotate in the rotating block mounting groove; a wire clamping rod insertion hole is formed in the center of the rotating block; the front end of the push rod is rotatably pivoted on the rotating block, and the rear end of the push rod is directly or indirectly connected with the push-pull power device; the threading mounting seat is mounted and fixed on the bottom surface of the rotating block; the left wire clamping device and the right wire clamping device are both installed on the wire penetrating installation base. The top of the left wire clamping device and the top of the right wire clamping device are both inserted into wire clamping rod insertion holes of the rotating block. The push-pull power device pushes the push rod, the push rod pushes the rotating block to rotate, and the left wire clamping device, the right wire clamping device and the wire penetrating installation base are driven to rotate synchronously. According to the utility model, the metal wire which is blocked in descending is not blocked after rotating, and can smoothly descend and enter the next working procedure, so that the production efficiency is high.

一种电火花线切割机的上线架的穿丝架的穿头，固定块开设有上下贯通的圆形的旋转块安装槽；旋转块安装在旋转块安装槽中并且能够在其中旋转；旋转块的中央开设有夹丝杆插孔；推杆的前端可旋转地枢接在旋转块上，后端直接或者间接地连接推拉动力装置；穿丝安装座安装固定在旋转块的底面；左夹丝装置和右夹丝装置都安装在穿丝安装座上；左夹丝装置和右夹丝装置的顶部都插在旋转块的夹丝杆插孔中；推拉动力装置推动推杆，推杆推动旋转块旋转，带动左夹丝装置、右夹丝装置和穿丝安装座同步旋转。本实用新型下行受阻的金属丝旋转之后不再受到阻碍，能够顺利下行,顺利进入下一工序，生产效率高。

invention_title.text: Electric spark machining tool
一种电火花机加工工装

extracted_name.value: 怡力精密制造有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses an electric spark machining tool, and relates to the technical field of machining tools. An electric spark machining tool comprises an electrode clamping device and a part positioning device, the electrode clamping device comprises a clamping seat and a plurality of clamping structures arranged on the clamping seat, and each clamping structure comprises a clamping plate hinged to the clamping seat and an elastic jacking assembly arranged in the clamping seat. The elastic jacking assembly is used for jacking one end of the clamping plate so that the other end of the clamping plate can be matched with the clamping base to clamp an electrode. The part positioning device is provided with a plurality of positioning structures corresponding to the clamping structures in a one-to-one mode, and the positioning structures are used for positioning parts to be machined. According to the electric discharge machining tool, the purpose of batch electric discharge machining of parts is achieved, the electric discharge time is saved, and the production efficiency is improved.

本实用新型公开了一种电火花机加工工装，涉及加工工装技术领域。一种电火花机加工工装，包括电极夹紧装置和零件定位装置，所述电极夹紧装置包括夹紧座和设置在所述夹紧座上的多组夹紧结构，所述夹紧结构包括铰接在所述夹紧座上的夹板和设置在所述夹紧座内的弹性顶紧组件，所述弹性顶紧组件用于顶紧所述夹板的一端以使所述夹板的另一端与所述夹紧座配合夹紧电极；所述零件定位装置具有与所述夹紧结构一一对应的多组定位结构，所述定位结构用于对待加工零件进行定位。本实用新型电火花机加工工装达到了零件批量放电加工的目的，节省了放电时间，提高了生产效率。
