abstract.text: Method of generating a preset pressure wave by a high-voltage electrochemical explosion to provide the required force effect on the processed object, in which the required total energy of the high-voltage electrochemical explosion is determined, which consists of electrical and chemical energies, an empirical dependence is obtained for an exothermic mixture containing 60% aluminum powder in an aqueous solution of an oxidant, at variable values ​​of the electrical energy and mass of the exothermic mixture, by which the specific electrical energy and the specific combustion efficiency of the exothermic mixture are determined, as the coordinates of the point of contact of the tangent line to the empirical dependence, at which the maximum chemical energy is released at a certain value of the total energy, and the mass of the exothermic mixture is determined. Capsule is filled with exothermic mixture, into which electrodes are installed from opposite sides, and the exothermic mixture is ignited by a discharge current when high-voltage pulses are applied to the electrodes from a pulse current generator with a capacitance. Before determining the required total energy of a high-voltage electrochemical explosion, a preset pressure wave is obtained at a certain point in the wave zone of the technological volume for the required force effect on the processed object, according to which the calculated parameters of the pulse current generator are determined. Required total energy of the electrochemical explosion is determined through the energy of a high-voltage electric discharge in the liquid. After determining the mass of the exothermic mixture, the amount of chemical energy released due to exothermic reactions and the amount of electrical energy are determined based on the calculated total energy. The required capacitance C of the pulse current generator is calculated, which is then installed in the pulse current generator, from which high voltage pulses are supplied to the electrodes installed in the capsule with the exothermic mixture.

Спосіб генерування високовольтним електрохімічним вибухом заданої хвилі тиску для забезпечення необхідного силового впливу на об'єкт обробки, у якому визначають необхідну повну енергію високовольтного електрохімічного вибуху, яка складається з електричної і хімічної енергій, отримують для екзотермічної суміші, що містить 60 % алюмінієвого порошку у водному розчині окислювача, емпіричну залежність при змінних значеннях величини електричної енергії і маси екзотермічної суміші, за якою визначають питому електричну енергію і питому ефективність згорання екзотермічної суміші, як координати точки дотику дотичної прямої до емпіричної залежності, при яких виділяється максимальна хімічна енергія при визначеному значенні повної енергії, та визначають масу екзотермічної суміші. Заповнюють капсулу екзотермічною сумішшю, в яку з протилежних боків встановлюють електроди, та підпалюють екзотермічну суміш розрядним струмом при подачі на електроди імпульсів високої напруги від генератора імпульсних струмів з ємністю. Перед визначенням необхідної повної енергії високовольтного електрохімічного вибуху одержують задану хвилю тиску у певній точці хвильової зони технологічного об'єму для необхідного силового впливу на об'єкт обробки, за якою визначають розрахункові параметри генератора імпульсних струмів. Визначають величину необхідної повної енергії електрохімічного вибуху через енергію високовольтного електричного розряду у рідині. Після визначення маси екзотермічної суміші за розрахованою повною енергією визначають величину хімічної енергії, що виділяється за рахунок екзотермічних реакцій, та величину електричної енергії. Розраховують необхідну величину ємності С генератора імпульсних струмів, яку далі встановлюють в генераторі імпульсних струмів, з якого подають імпульси високої напруги на електроди, що встановлені в капсулу з екзотермічною сумішшю.

abstract.text: According to the invention, solid recovered fuel pellets are torrefied to charred pellets, producing torrefaction gas that is converted into a torrefaction syngas containing hydrogen and carbon monoxide. A syngas stream comprising the torrefaction syngas is supplied to a CO shift unit, where carbon monoxide reacts with water steam to carbon dioxide and hydrogen, generating shifted syngas. The invention provides that the shifted syngas is passed through a low temperature heat recovery unit, where its heat energy is transferred to at least two process water streams that are used as process water during the production of the product gas stream. By utilizing this heat, waste heat losses are reduced, and the overall energy efficiency of the process is improved. Further, an increased hydrogen content of the product gas is achieved.

abstract.text: Feedstock including an amphiphilic lignocellulosic biomass can be processed using enzymes prior to pulping. The enzymes break down the biomass by disrupting the surface or cell walls or by reducing wax or other components. Such enzymes include cellulases, hemicellulases, laccases, peroxidases, and pectinases. Suitable enzymes can be obtained from secretions of microbes in soil organic matter from soil in which the feedstock was grown. If the pulping process includes steam explosion, such enzy matic processing of a biomass prior to steam explosion will increase absorption of water by the processed feedstock. In steam explosion, due to the increased ability of the processed feedstock to absorb water, steam explosion is more effective in breaking apart the processed feedstock. For other pulping processes, such enzymatic treatments break down the biomass, enabling extraction of the desired components from the processed feedstock through subsequent processing using less energy and fewer chemicals.

Une charge d'alimentation comprenant une biomasse lignocellulosique amphiphile peut être traitée à l'aide d'enzymes avant un dépulpage. Les enzymes décomposent la biomasse en perturbant la surface ou les parois cellulaires ou en réduisant la cire ou d'autres composants. De telles enzymes comprennent des cellulases, des hémicellulases, des laccases, des peroxydases et des pectinases. Des enzymes appropriées peuvent être obtenues à partir de sécrétions microbiennes dans une matière organique du sol à partir du sol dans lequel la charge d'alimentation a été cultivée. Si le processus de dépulpage comprend une explosion à la vapeur, un tel traitement enzymatique d'une biomasse avant explosion à la vapeur augmentera l'absorption d'eau par la charge d'alimentation traitée. Dans l'explosion à la vapeur, en raison de la capacité accrue de la charge d'alimentation traitée à absorber l'eau, l'explosion à la vapeur est plus efficace pour briser la charge d'alimentation traitée. Pour d'autres processus de dépulpage, de tels traitements enzymatiques décomposent la biomasse, ce qui permet l'extraction des composants souhaités à partir de la charge d'alimentation traitée par traitement ultérieur en utilisant moins d'énergie et moins de produits chimiques.

abstract.text: The present invention relates to a smoke generator (10; 10a; 10b) comprising a housing (15) with a condensate inlet (11) for receiving a smoke condensate and a steam inlet (12) for receiving overheated water steam, wherein the smoke condensate is converted to smoke particles when the smoke condensate interacts with the overheated water steam, and the smoke particles are accessible at a smoke outlet (13). The invention also relates to a system for feeding smoke particles to a smoke cabinet (23).

"La présente invention concerne un générateur de fumée (10; 10a; 10b) comprenant un boîtier (15) doté d'une entrée de condensat (11) pour recevoir un condensat de fumée et d'une entrée de vapeur (12) pour recevoir de la vapeur d'eau surchauffée. Le condensat de fumée est transformé en particules de fumée lorsque le condensat de fumée interagit avec la vapeur d'eau surchauffée, et les particules de fumée sont accessibles au niveau d'une sortie de fumée (13). L'invention concerne également un système qui fournit des particules de fumée dans une armoire à fumée (23)."

invention_title.text: Stable supply system for hydrogen production by clean energy and control method thereof
一种清洁能源制氢的稳定供给系统及其控制方法

extracted_name.value: LILING TOP COLLECTION IND CO LTD
醴陵陶润实业发展有限公司

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen production, in particular to a stable supply system for hydrogen production through clean energy and a control method of the stable supply system. The gas mixing chamber is used for mixing methanol steam and desalted water steam to form mixed gas; the heat preservation chamber is arranged outside the gas mixing chamber and is used for preserving heat of the gas mixing chamber through hydrogen mixed gas output by the reaction chamber; the reaction hydrogen production unit is connected with the raw material mixing unit and is used for providing chemical reaction conditions of the mixed gas to generate hydrogen mixed gas of hydrogen and carbon dioxide; the gas separation unit is used for separating the hydrogen mixed gas to output pure hydrogen; the detection unit is used for detecting the internal air pressure of the gas mixing chamber, the air pressure of the gas inlet of the reaction chamber, the air pressure of the gas outlet of the reaction chamber and the vibration frequency of the gas mixing chamber; the hydrogen production stability is improved.

本发明涉及制氢技术领域，尤其涉及一种清洁能源制氢的稳定供给系统及其控制方法，稳定供给系统包括：原料混合单元，包括用以对甲醇蒸气和脱盐水蒸气进行混合以形成混合气体的气体混合室和设置在气体混合室外部其通过反应室输出的氢气混合气体对气体混合室进行保温的保温室；反应制氢单元，其与所述原料混合单元相连，用以提供所述混合气体的化学反应条件以生成氢气和二氧化碳的氢气混合气体；气体分离单元，用以将所述氢气混合气体进行分离以输出纯净氢气；检测单元，用以分别检测气体混合室的内部气压、反应室的进气口的气压、反应室的出气口的气压以及气体混合室的振动频率；本发明提高了制氢的稳定性。

invention_title.text: Steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and cooking equipment
用于烹饪设备的汽水分离装置及烹饪设备

extracted_name.value: 杭州老板电器股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of kitchen appliances, in particular to a steam-water separation device for cooking equipment and the cooking equipment, the steam-water separation device for the cooking equipment comprises a separator, the separator comprises a separation pipe and a separation plate, the separation plate is arranged in the separation pipe and divides the separation pipe into a steam inlet side and a steam outlet side, and the steam inlet side is communicated with the steam outlet side. Screen holes are formed in the separation plate, steam flows in from one end of the separation pipe, penetrates through the screen holes in the separation plate and flows out from the other end of the separation pipe, and the separation plate is used for water-steam separation. The steam passes through the separation plate through the sieve holes of the separation plate, and in the process, the separation plate can intercept water drops, so that the water drops can be intercepted more efficiently, water accumulation is reduced, the influence on food nutrition and taste is reduced, and the use effect of the cooking equipment is improved.

本实用新型涉及厨电技术领域，具体公开了用于烹饪设备的汽水分离装置及烹饪设备，该用于烹饪设备的汽水分离装置包括分离器，分离器包括分离管和分离板，分离板设置于分离管内且将分离管分割成进汽侧和出汽侧，分离板上设置有筛孔，蒸汽从分离管的一端流入，穿过分离板上的筛孔且从分离管的另一端流出，分离板用于进行水汽分离。蒸汽通过分离板的筛孔穿过分离板，在此过程中，分离板可以拦截水珠，进而可以更高效的拦截水珠，降低积水的产生，从而减小对食物营养和口感产生影响，提升烹饪设备的使用效果。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a selective condensation mechanism and wastewater treatment equipment and method with selective condensation, the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation plate, the condensation plate comprises a main body part and a selective condensation coating covering the main body part, the main body part is internally provided with a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant, and the selective condensation coating covers the main body part. The affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the main body part and the impurities in the waste water steam; or the selective condensation mechanism is a condensation pipeline, the condensation pipeline comprises an inner pipeline and an outer pipeline which are sleeved with each other, a cooling cavity used for containing a refrigerant is formed between the inner pipeline and the outer pipeline, and the selective condensation coating is arranged on the inner wall of the inner pipeline; the affinity of the selective condensation coating and impurities in waste water steam is greater than that of the condensation plate and the impurities in the waste water steam. The energy consumption in the condensation process can be reduced, and organic components in waste water can be separated and recycled easily.

本发明公开了一种选择性冷凝机构、具有选择性冷凝的废水处理设备及方法，所述选择性冷凝机构为冷凝板，所述冷凝板包括主体部以及包覆于主体部外的选择性冷凝涂层，所述主体部内具有用于容纳冷媒的冷却腔，所述选择性冷凝涂层与废水蒸汽中杂质的亲和性大于主体部与废水蒸汽中杂质的亲和性；或所述选择性冷凝机构为冷凝管道，所述冷凝管道包括相互套设的内管道和外管道，所述内管道和外管道之间设有用于容纳冷媒的冷却腔，所述选择性冷凝涂层设于所述内管道的内壁上，所述选择性冷凝涂层与废水蒸汽中杂质的亲和性大于冷凝板与废水蒸汽中杂质的亲和性。本发明能够降低冷凝过程的耗能，有利于分离回收废水中的有机组分。

invention_title.text: Flow control sauna machine
一种控流桑拿机

extracted_name.value: CIXI TIANQUAN ELECTRICAL APPLIANCE TECH CO LTD
慈溪市天泉电器科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a flow control sauna machine, and belongs to the technical field of steam sauna machines. A flow control sauna machine comprises a switching box, a water inlet part is arranged at the front end of the switching box, and a bag body is arranged in the rear end of the switching box; a water outlet is formed in the water inlet part, and a connecting pipeline is arranged between the water outlet and the bag body, so that the water inlet part is communicated with the bag body; a flow blocking piece is arranged at the lower end of the water outlet, the flow blocking piece floats on the liquid level, close to the water outlet end, in the connecting pipeline under the normal condition, the density of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of water, and the flow blocking piece does not have water absorption; the diameter of the flow blocking piece is larger than that of the water outlet. The diameter of the flow blocking piece is smaller than that of the connecting pipeline. Water-steam conversion can be effectively carried out by reducing the water drainage speed, and water backflow is prevented.

本实用新型公开了一种控流桑拿机，属于蒸汽桑拿机技术领域。一种控流桑拿机，包括转换盒，所述转换盒的前端设置进水部，转换盒的后端内设置囊体；所述进水部内开设有下水口，所述下水口与囊体之间设置有连接管道，以使进水部与囊体相互连通；所述下水口下端设置有阻流件，所述阻流件在常态情况下浮于连接管道内靠近下水口端的液面上，阻流件的密度小于水，阻流件不具备吸水性；所述阻流件的直径大于下水口的直径；阻流件的直径小于连接管道的直径。它可以实现减缓下水速度有效进行水汽转换，并防止水体回流。

invention_title.text: Water-vapor separation box, faucet and multifunctional water dispenser
水汽分离盒、水龙头和多功能饮水机

extracted_name.value: ZIBO YUEKA ELECTRICAL TECH CO LTD
淄博悦卡电器科技有限公司

abstract.text: The water vapor separation box comprises a box body, one side of the box body is provided with a hot water inlet, the other side of the box body is provided with a water outlet nozzle, the water outlet nozzle is provided with a steam exhaust outlet and hot water outlets, the hot water outlets comprise the first hot water outlet and the second hot water outlet, and the steam exhaust outlet is communicated with the steam exhaust outlet. A stop block is arranged above the water outlet nozzle; the bottom wall of the inner cavity of the box body is inclined from the hot water inlet to the stop block to form an inclined surface; by designing the reasonable layout of the hot water inlet, the hot water outlet and the steam exhaust outlet and arranging the stop block and the inclined bottom wall in the box body, steam and water flow can be effectively separated in the flowing process of hot water. Steam is discharged through the steam discharging channel, hot water is discharged through the hot water channels with different heights according to the hydrodynamic law, efficient water vapor separation is achieved, and it is ensured that output hot water is more stable and purer.

本实用新型涉及一种水汽分离盒、水龙头和多功能饮水机，包括盒体，所述盒体一侧开有热水入口，所述盒体另一侧设置有出水嘴，所述出水嘴开有排汽出口和热水出口，所述热水出口包括第一热水出口和第二热水出口，所述出水嘴上方设置有阻挡块，所述盒体的内腔底壁由热水入口往阻挡块方向倾斜形成倾斜面；通过设计热水入口、热水出口以及排汽出口的合理布局，并在盒体内设置阻挡块及倾斜底壁，热水在流动过程中可以有效分离蒸汽和水流。蒸汽通过排汽通道排出，热水则根据流体动力学规律通过不同高度的热水通道排出，实现水汽的高效分离，确保输出热水更加稳定和纯净。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a zero-power-consumption thermal power cold end system vacuum optimization device, which belongs to the technical field of vacuum optimization, and comprises a front vacuum absorber, an annular water-gas self-oscillation processing mechanism, a gas-gas-liquid self-separation device and a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device which are sequentially connected in series, and the output end is connected with a condenser hot well through a gas-liquid isolation secondary separation device. The chemical replenishment water is dynamically mixed with the steam-steam mixture at the outlet of the condenser through jet entrainment, so that water steam is condensed, after the formed steam-steam mixture is separated, non-condensable gas is extracted by vacuumizing equipment, and liquid is recycled to a hot well. The device does not need extra energy consumption, the vacuum degree of the condenser is effectively improved through multi-stage mixing, separation and recovery closed loops, and coal consumption and operation cost are reduced.

本发明公开了一种零功耗火电冷端系统真空优化装置，属于真空优化技术领域，包括依次串联的前置真空吸收器、环形水气自激振荡处理机构、气汽液自分离装置和气液隔离二次分离装置，整体接入抽真空设备管道，输入端连凝汽器出口，输出端通过气液隔离二次分离装置连凝汽器热井。化补水经射流卷吸与凝汽器出口气汽混合物动态混合，使水蒸气冷凝，形成的气汽水混合物经分离后，不凝气体由抽真空设备抽除，液体回收至热井。装置无需额外能耗，通过多级混合、分离及回收闭环，有效提升凝汽器真空度，降低煤耗与运行成本。

invention_title.text: Large-temperature-difference high-temperature fused salt and water heat exchange steam generation system
一种大温差高温熔盐与水换热产汽系统

extracted_name.value: DEC GUANGZHOU HEAVY MACHINERY CO LTD
东方电气（广州）重型机器有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a large-temperature-difference high-temperature fused salt and water heat exchange steam production system. The system comprises a fused salt storage tank, a high-pressure hot water storage tank, a fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger and a steam pocket, the fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger is of a multi-shell-pass spiral coil pipe type heat exchanger structure. A plurality of limiting inner barrels are arranged in a shell barrel to form annular cavities of different levels, a plurality of heat transfer pipes are connected in parallel and wound around a central pipe or the wall of an upper-level fiber inner barrel to form spiral coil pipes, and a plurality of sets of spiral coil pipes are arranged in the annular cavities respectively. A shell side fused salt liquid inlet, a shell side fused salt liquid outlet, a pipe side water inlet and a pipe side steam outlet are formed in the shell cylinder body; the fused salt-water/steam heat exchanger is connected with an outlet and an inlet of the fused salt storage tank and further connected with a water outlet and an inlet of the high-pressure hot water storage tank. High-temperature thermal shock damage of the heat exchanger and pipeline blockage caused by fused salt solidification can be effectively eliminated, membrane boiling of water is inhibited, the heat transfer efficiency is high, and system operation is safe and reliable.

本实用公开了一种大温差高温熔盐与水换热产汽系统。该系统包括熔盐储罐、高压热水储罐、熔盐‑水/蒸汽换热器和汽包；熔盐‑水/蒸汽换热器为多壳程螺旋盘管式换热器结构；在壳筒体内设有多个限位内筒形成不同层级的环状空腔，多根传热管并联围绕中心管或上一级纤维内筒壁缠绕形成螺旋盘管，多组螺旋盘管分别设置在环状空腔中；壳筒体上设有壳侧熔盐液体入口、壳侧熔盐液体出口、管侧水入口和管侧蒸汽出口；熔盐‑水/蒸汽换热器与熔盐储罐的出口和进口连接，还与高压热水储罐的出水口和进口连接。本发明可有效消除换热器高温热冲击破坏和熔盐凝固堵塞管道，抑制水的膜态沸腾，传热效率高，系统运行安全可靠。

invention_title.text: Frying and baking machine
煎烤机

extracted_name.value: ZHEJIANG SUPOR ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES MFG CO LTD
浙江苏泊尔家电制造有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a frying and baking machine which comprises a base assembly and an upper cover assembly capable of covering the base assembly, the base assembly comprises a lower baking tray, the lower baking tray is provided with a cooking groove and a water groove, a water tank is arranged in the water groove, the water tank is provided with a containing cavity and at least one water outlet, the water outlet is communicated with the containing cavity and the water groove, and the water outlet is communicated with the cooking groove. And an air outlet gap for steam circulation is formed between the outer side wall of the water tank and the side wall of the water tank. When the frying and baking machine is used, both the water tank and the water tank are filled with water, steam can be generated only by heating the water in the water tank to boil during heating, and the water does not need to be heated to boil completely, so that the steam can be generated quickly. Meanwhile, after the water in the water tank is consumed, the water in the water tank can flow into the water tank through the water outlet, so that the duration time of the steam is prolonged.

本申请涉及一种煎烤机，包括底座组件和可盖合于所述底座组件上的上盖组件，所述底座组件包括下烤盘，所述下烤盘设有烹饪槽和水槽，所述水槽内设有水箱，所述水箱设有容腔和至少一个出水口，所述出水口连通所述容腔和所述水槽，所述水箱外侧壁和所述水槽侧壁之间具有供蒸汽流通的出气间隙。该煎烤机在使用时，可在水槽和水箱中均装有水，加热时只需将水槽中的水加热沸腾即可产生蒸汽，而不需要将全部水加热至沸腾，从而可以实现快速产生蒸汽。同时，当水槽中的水消耗后，水箱内的水可通过出水口流出到水槽中，使得蒸汽的持续时间延长。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a black liquor combustion alkali furnace optimization design method based on numerical simulation, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the geometric modeling of an alkali furnace in a design stage, combining the combustion of the alkali furnace, NOx generation and a flue gas-water/steam heat exchange model, and obtaining the distribution rules of a temperature field, a velocity field and a concentration field in the alkali furnace and the heat efficiency of the alkali furnace through CFD numerical simulation. Therefore, the rationality of the current design can be evaluated, an optimized alkali furnace design scheme can be obtained through iterative optimization, and the later operation and maintenance cost is reduced. In addition to the optimization design stage, the technical method can be adopted for the existing alkali furnace to carry out fault diagnosis and technical transformation scheme effectiveness evaluation.

本发明公开了一种基于数值模拟的黑液燃烧碱炉优化设计方法，本发明通过对设计阶段的碱炉进行几何建模，结合碱炉燃烧、NOx生成及烟气‑水/汽换热模型，通过CFD数值模拟获得碱炉内部的温度场、速度场及浓度场分布规律以及碱炉热效率。从而可以对当前设计的合理性进行评估，通过迭代优化，可以获得优化的碱炉设计方案，减少后期的运行维护成本。除了在优化设计阶段，亦可对现存碱炉采用本技术方法，进行故障诊断及技术改造方案有效性的评估。

abstract.text: Abstract An espresso machine for producing an espresso coffee beverage from coffee grounds held by a portafilter, the espresso machine including: a water tank; a group head for receiving the portafilter; a pump between the water tank and the group head for pumping water from the water tank toward the group head; a heater between the pump and the group head; a steam wand for expelling steam produced by the heater heating water received from the pump; a valve between the group head, the steam wand and the heater; a grinder for producing the coffee grounds; a controller for controlling the pump, the heater, and the valve; and a user interface for providing a user signal to the controller, the user interface having: a grind icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the grinder for producing coffee grounds; a brew icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for providing hot water to the group head; and a steam icon that, when actuated, results in the controller operating the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for providing steam to the steam wand, wherein each of the grind icon, brew icon, and steam icon, when actuated multiple times in a short time period, results in the controller operating the grinder, the pump, the heater, and/or the valve for preparing the grind path, the group head, and the steam wand, respectively, for producing the espresso coffee. 134 138 130 136 Water Tank FM Flow Meter Solenoid Pump Over Pressure Valve Low thermal mass flow through heater E-valve E-valve E-valve 2/2 E-valve Group Head Heater Hot/cold water OR Steam Brew Hot/cold water Hot/Cold coffee Coffee Output Air Pump Venturi Steam Hot water Steam Wand Output Steam & Air Mix Hot Water OutputHot water ot w at er te am 134 138 130 136 212 150 Hot/cold Brew Group Head, water OR Hot/cold Heater Steam M water Hot/Cold coffee 2 Coffee GHH Output E-valve 2/2 Water W E-valveFM OPV FTH 180Tank 2 Flow Meter Low thermal Hot water OR Steam Over Pressure 160 Solenoid Valve Air Pump mass flow 170 Pump through 162 heater 2 Venturi Steam Wand 140 Steam OutputSteam & 3/2 Air Mix E-valve 120 Hot 180 164 water M 2 Hot Water Hot water Output E-valve ct c t o t o l d c o f f e e o f f e e a t e r Hot water t e a m l o w e t e r o l e n o i d h e a t e r e n t u r i t e a m a n d t e a m t e a m &amp; invention_title.text: Mixed gas generating device for heavy oil thermal recovery high-pressure gas injection
稠油热采高压注气用混合气体发生装置

classifications_cpc.symbol:
E
                                21
                                B
                                43
                                243
                                I
                                CN

abstract.text: The invention provides a heavy oil thermal recovery high-pressure gas injection mixed gas generation device which comprises a gas mixing generation unit, the mixed gas generation unit is connected to the top of a supporting base, and the mixed gas generation unit is used for manufacturing high-pressure mixed gas; the gas mixing generation unit comprises a gas generation shell, a combustion assembly, a dispersion assembly and a temperature adjusting assembly are arranged in an inner cavity of the gas generation shell, one end of the combustion assembly is fixedly connected with one side of the gas generation shell in a penetrating mode, the other end of the combustion assembly is rotationally connected with one end of the dispersion assembly, and the temperature adjusting assembly is arranged on the outer side of the dispersion assembly. Combustion gas generated by the combustion assembly can be evenly dispersed in the gas generation shell through the dispersion assembly, water can be fully sprayed to an inner cavity of the gas generation shell through the temperature adjusting assembly, the combustion gas can make full contact with the water, steam is generated, and therefore mixed gas can be obtained; and the mixed gas is pressurized and injected into an oil well through the gas storage module, the steam injection module and the like, and heavy oil thermal recovery is carried out.

本发明提供了一种稠油热采高压注气用混合气体发生装置，包括气体混合发生单元，混合气体发生单元连接于支撑基座顶部，混合气体发生单元用于制造高压混合气；气体混合发生单元包括气体发生外壳，气体发生外壳内腔处设置有燃烧组件、分散组件和调温组件，燃烧组件一端与气体发生外壳一侧固定的贯穿连接，燃烧组件另一端与分散组件一端转动连接，分散组件外侧设置有调温组件。本发明利用分散组件可将燃烧组件产生的燃烧气均匀的分散在气体发生外壳内，利用调温组件可充分的将水体喷洒在气体发生外壳内腔处，使得燃烧气可充分与水体接触，生成蒸汽，从而可得到混合气体，以便于储气模组、注汽模组等将该混合气体加压并注入油井内，进行稠油热采。

invention_title.text: Built-in sealed water tank assembly for pipeline machine
用于管线机的内置密封水箱组件

extracted_name.value: SICHAN AI CHANCE TECH CO LTD
四川爱创科技有限公司

classifications_cpc.symbol:
Y
                                02
                                A
                                20

                                A
                                EP

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a built-in sealed water tank component for a pipeline machine in the field of drinking water equipment, which comprises a water tank and a water pump, an opening is arranged at the top of the water tank, a water tank cover is arranged at the opening, a water inlet and an air vent which are communicated with the water tank are arranged on the water tank cover, and the air vent is connected with a water-steam separation box through an air pipe. A water outlet is formed in the bottom of the water tank, a three-way pipe is arranged at the water outlet, and the other two connectors of the three-way pipe are connected with the drainage pipe and a water inlet pipe of the water pump respectively. The water inlet and the air vent in the water tank cover are utilized to ensure that water from the water purifier can enter the water tank, and water in the water tank cannot flow into the pipeline machine, so that damage to components caused by water leakage is avoided; the drainage pipe and the water inlet pipe of the water pump are connected with the water outlet at the bottom of the water tank through the three-way pipe, so that water in the water tank can be fully sucked by the water pump, stored water is reduced, and the stored water in the water tank can be drained conveniently when the pipeline machine is not used for a long time.

本实用新型公开的是饮水设备领域的一种用于管线机的内置密封水箱组件，包括水箱和水泵，所述水箱顶部设有开口，开口处设有水箱盖，所述水箱盖上设有与水箱相连通的进水口和通气口，所述通气口通过气管与水汽分离盒相连，所述水箱底部设有出水口，出水口处设有三通管，三通管的另外两个接口分别与排水管和水泵的进水管相连。利用水箱盖上的进水口和通气口确保从净水器过来的水能够进入水箱内，而水箱内的水不会流入管线机内部，从而避免了漏水导致的元器件损坏；将排水管和水泵的进水管通过三通管与水箱底部的出水口相连，可使水泵充分吸取水箱中的水，减少存水，同时，也便于管线机在长期不用后排尽水箱中的存水。

invention_title.text: Plate forming equipment
板材成型设备

extracted_name.value: JINGCHENG GONGKE AUTOMOTIVE SYSTEMS CO LTD
精诚工科汽车系统有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of galvanized sheet processing, in particular to sheet forming equipment, which comprises an upper die, a lower die and a water bath system, the upper die comprises an upper die holder and an upper die insert arranged on the upper die holder, and the lower die comprises a lower die holder and a lower die insert arranged on the lower die holder; the water bath system comprises a water tank arranged on the lower die holder and a steam collecting device arranged on the upper die holder; when the upper die and the lower die are closed, the forming surfaces of the upper die insert and the lower die insert are positioned in the water tank; and the steam collecting device is used for discharging water steam formed above the water tank to the outside of the equipment. According to the plate forming equipment, a large amount of water vapor can be discharged through the steam collecting device, the damp condition of a machine tool of the equipment is reduced, the problems that the equipment is affected with damp and corroded due to the water vapor can be solved, and then the probability that the equipment breaks down can be reduced.

本实用新型涉及镀锌板材加工技术领域，具体提供了一种板材成型设备，包括上模、下模、以及水浴系统，上模包括上模座以及设于上模座上的上模镶块，下模包括下模座以及设于下模座上的下模镶块；水浴系统包括设于下模座上的水槽，以及设于上模座上的蒸汽收集装置；上模和下模合模时，上模镶块和下模镶块的成型面均位于水槽中；蒸汽收集装置用于将形成于水槽上方的水蒸汽排出到设备外部。本实用新型的板材成型设备，蒸汽收集装置可将大量水蒸汽排出，降低设备机床的受潮情况，可改善设备因水蒸汽而受潮、腐蚀的问题，进而可降低设备发生故障的概率。

invention_title.text: Water dispenser water outlet nozzle capable of stably stopping water outlet
一种出水关停稳定的饮水机出水嘴

extracted_name.value: AOKUTE ENVIRONMENTAL TECH SUZHOU CO LTD
澳酷特环境科技（苏州）有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a water dispenser water outlet nozzle capable of stopping water stably, which comprises a water outlet nozzle body provided with an inner cavity and provided with a water outlet and a water inlet; the partition plate component comprises a first partition plate, a second partition plate and a third partition plate, the first partition plate divides the inner cavity into a first cavity and a second cavity, the water outlet and the water inlet are both communicated with the first cavity, an air outlet is formed in the second cavity and located at the bottom of the water outlet nozzle body, and the second partition plate is located at one end of the water inlet; the third partition plate is located on the side, away from the second partition plate, of the second partition plate, the water outlet is located between the first partition plate and the second partition plate, and a gap is reserved between the first partition plate and the second partition plate. According to the utility model, the problems that hot steam is discharged together with hot water through the water outlet nozzle, water steam in the hot water can cause the phenomena of unstable water outlet, water splashing and the like, and a user is easily scalded can be solved.

本实用新型公开了一种出水关停稳定的饮水机出水嘴，其包括：出水嘴本体，出水嘴本体具有一内腔，出水嘴本体上设置有出水口和进水口；隔板部件，隔板部件包括第一隔板、第二隔板和第三隔板，第一隔板将内腔分割成第一腔室和第二腔室，出水口和进水口均与第一腔室相连通，第二腔室内设置有出气口，出气口位于出水嘴本体的底部，第二隔板位于进水口的一端，第三隔板位于第二隔板远离第二隔板的一侧，出水口位于第一隔板与第二隔板之间，第一隔板与第二隔板之间留有间隙。本实用新型可以解决热蒸汽随同热水一起通过出水嘴一同排出，热水中的水蒸气会造成出水不稳定及出水飞溅等现象，很容易烫伤用户的问题。

invention_title.text: METHOD FOR REMOVING ORGANIC DISSOLVED SUBSTANCES IN WATER-STEAM CYCLE
水・蒸気サイクル中の有機系溶存物質の除去方法

abstract.text: To provide a method for removing organic dissolved substances in water-steam cycle, which simultaneously achieves improved heat exchanger efficiency through the addition of droplet condensation promoters and the removal of organic dissolved substances from the water-steam cycle system excluding the target heat exchanger.SOLUTION: A method for removing organic dissolved substances in a water-steam cycle where organic chemicals are added upstream of a heat exchanger, the method for passing at least a part of the drain water from the heat exchanger through a filtration device to remove organic dissolved substances, in which the filtration device comprises a plurality of devices arranged in parallel, each comprising at least one of an ion exchange device, an activated carbon filtration apparatus, an RO membrane device, and an NF membrane device, arranged in parallel, a part of the drain water is passed through some of these devices, and when the filtration performance is determined to have decreased based on the amount of chemical added or water quality measurements from sensors, the water flow is switched to another device.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

【課題】滴状凝縮促進剤等の添加による熱交換器の効率向上と、対象熱交換器を除いた水・蒸気サイクル系の有機系溶存物質の除去を両立させることができる、水・蒸気サイクル中の有機系溶存物質の除去方法を提供する。【解決手段】熱交換器の上流で有機系薬品を添加する水・蒸気サイクル中の有機系溶存物質を除去する方法であって、該熱交換器のドレン水の少なくとも一部を濾過装置に通して有機系溶存物質を除去する方法において、該濾過装置として、イオン交換装置、活性炭濾過装置、ＲＯ膜装置及びＮＦ膜装置の少なくとも一種よりなる機器が複数個並列に配置されており、一部の該機器にドレン水を通し、薬品添加量またはセンサによる水質の測定値に基づいて濾過性能が低下したと判断された場合に通水を他の該機器に切替えることを特徴とする水・蒸気サイクル中の有機系溶存物質の除去方法。【選択図】図１

invention_title.text: Faucet with heating and water-vapor separation functions and multifunctional water dispenser
具备加热以及水汽分离的水龙头和多功能饮水机

extracted_name.value: ZIBO YUEKA ELECTRICAL TECH CO LTD
淄博悦卡电器科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a faucet with heating and water-vapor separation functions and a multifunctional water dispenser, which comprise a water heating device for heating water, a main control board, the faucet and a water-vapor separation box, and the water heating device is arranged in the faucet; the water-steam separation box is provided with a hot water inlet and a water outlet nozzle, the water-steam separation box is arranged in the faucet, the water outlet nozzle is provided with a steam exhaust outlet and a hot water outlet, the water outlet nozzle is exposed out of the faucet, the hot water inlet is communicated with a water outlet of the water heating device, and a water inlet of the water heating device is connected with an external water source; the water heating device is electrically connected with the main control board, and the main control board controls the water heating device to start and stop. The water and steam can be effectively separated through the design of the water-steam separation box, it is guaranteed that steam is not carried in the hot water output process, the user experience is improved, and meanwhile the scalding risk caused by steam overflow is avoided.

本实用新型涉及一种具备加热以及水汽分离的水龙头和多功能饮水机，包括用于对水进行加热的水加热装置、主控板、水龙头和水汽分离盒，所述水加热装置设置在水龙头内；所述水汽分离盒开有热水入口以及设置有出水嘴，所述水汽分离盒置于水龙头内，所述出水嘴开有排汽出口和热水出口，所述出水嘴露出水龙头外，所述热水入口连通水加热装置的出水口，所述水加热装置的进水口连接外界水源；所述水加热装置与主控板电连接，主控板控制水加热装置启停。水汽分离盒的设计能够有效分离水与蒸汽，确保热水输出过程中不夹带蒸汽，改善用户体验，同时避免蒸汽外溢引发的烫伤风险。

invention_title.text: Double-separation double-cooling system air compressor
一种双分离双冷却系统空压机

extracted_name.value: XIAMEN DONGYA MACHINERY IND CO LTD
厦门东亚机械工业股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides an air compressor with double separation and double cooling systems. The air compressor comprises double oil-gas separation systems, double cooling systems and a main machine, an oil-gas mixing outlet of the main machine is respectively communicated with two oil-gas separation barrels in the double oil-gas separation system through gas inlet pipelines; gas outlets of the two oil-gas separation barrels are communicated with each other through a gas outlet pipe, and oil outlets of the two oil-gas separation barrels respectively enter two sets of oil filter systems in the double-cooling system; the air outlet pipe is communicated with an air inlet pipe, the air inlet pipe is respectively communicated to two air coolers in the double-cooling system, and air outlets of the air coolers are communicated with an exhaust pipe through a water-steam separator; and an oil outlet of the oil filter system is communicated with the main machine.

本实用新型提供了一种双分离双冷却系统空压机，包括：双油气分离系统、双冷却系统、主机；所述主机的油气混合出口通过进气管道分别连通至双油气分离系统中的两个油气分离桶；两个油气分离桶的出气口经过出气管相互连通，两个油气分离桶的出油口分别进入双冷却系统中的两套油滤系统；所述出气管连通进气管，进气管分别连通至双冷却系统中的两个气冷却器，所述气冷却器的出气口通过水汽分离器连通排气管；所述油滤系统的出油口连通主机。

invention_title.text: Steam generator and cooking equipment
一种蒸汽发生器以及烹饪设备

extracted_name.value: 火星人厨具股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a steam generator and cooking equipment, and the steam generator comprises a heating structure which comprises a heated container and a heating part, and the heated container is internally provided with a heating cavity; the water-steam separation structure is used for discharging steam generated by the heating structure; the communication structure can be used for supplying water to the heating structure and the water-vapor separation structure; the water flow control structure can be used for supplying water to the communicating structure; the heating structure further comprises a temperature monitoring structure used for monitoring temperature changes, and water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled through the monitored temperature changes. One side of the temperature monitoring structure is attached to the heated container or the heating piece; water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled by monitoring temperature change detection of the heating structure through the temperature monitoring structure, water supply of the water flow control structure is controlled after the heating structure reaches the preset temperature, a good water supply control effect is guaranteed, excessive dry burning caused by too little water in the heating structure is avoided, and the service life of the heating structure can be prolonged.

一种蒸汽发生器以及烹饪设备，包括：加热结构，加热结构包括受热容器和加热件，受热容器内设有加热腔；水汽分离结构，用于将加热结构产生的蒸汽排出；连通结构，能够用于为加热结构和水汽分离结构供水；水流控制结构，能够用于为连通结构供水；加热结构上还包括用于监测温度变化的温度监测结构，并通过监测到的温度变化控制水流控制结构供水；温度监测结构的一侧贴设在受热容器或加热件上；本申请通过温度监测结构监测加热结构的温度变化检测来控制水流控制结构供水，检测加热结构到达预设温度后就控制水流控制结构供水，保证较好的供水控制效果，避免因加热结构中水太少而过度干烧，还能延迟加热结构的使用寿命。

invention_title.text: Permanganate index analyzer convenient for collecting water vapor
一种便于收集水蒸汽的高锰酸盐指数分析仪

extracted_name.value: 四川长青松科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a permanganate index analyzer convenient to collect water vapor, and relates to the technical field of permanganate index analyzers, the analyzer comprises a box body, and a digestion position is arranged in the box body; a water steam draining mechanism and a water steam collecting mechanism are arranged on the box body, the water steam draining mechanism comprises an air inlet formed in the left side of the box body, a right air outlet formed in the right side of the box body and an upper air outlet formed in the top of the box body, and exhaust fans are arranged at the right air outlet and the upper air outlet; the digestion position is positioned below the upper exhaust outlet; and the water vapor collecting mechanism is respectively communicated with the right air outlet and the upper air outlet. The water vapor collecting mechanism is mounted at the air outlet of the instrument, so that a large amount of water vapor generated when the instrument works can be collected, and the discharged water vapor is prevented from being attached to other equipment and instruments in a machine room, so that the normal operation of other equipment and instruments is not influenced; meanwhile, when the liquid in the liquid storage tank reaches a certain amount, the water vapor collecting mechanism can also automatically discharge the liquid.

本实用新型公开了一种便于收集水蒸汽的高锰酸盐指数分析仪，涉及高锰酸盐指数分析仪技术领域，该分析仪包括箱体，箱体内设置有消解位；箱体上设置有排水蒸汽机构和收集水蒸汽机构，排水蒸汽机构包括设置于箱体左侧的进风口、设置于箱体右侧的右排风口和设置于箱体顶部的上排风口，右排风口处和上排风口处均设置有排风机；消解位位于上排风口的下方；收集水蒸汽机构分别与右排风口和上排风口连通。通过在仪器的排风口处安装收集水蒸汽机构，可将仪器工作时产生的大量水蒸汽收集起来，防止排出的水蒸气附着在机房其他设备和仪器上，从而影响其他仪器设备的正常运行；同时当储液箱内的液体达到一定量时收集水蒸汽机构还可自动将液体排出。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the field of power generation equipment, in particular to a portable mute stealth power generation device which comprises a power generation component and a simulation component. The power generation component comprises a diesel oil combustion unit, and the diesel oil combustion unit is used for improving the combustion utilization rate by atomizing macromolecular diesel oil drop clusters into micromolecular diesel oil gas clusters and fully mixing the micromolecular diesel oil gas clusters with combustion-supporting air; the high-pressure steam generating unit is used for forming a water-steam circulating system without a power device by utilizing a self-circulating steam generating technology; the annular rotor power generation unit realizes power generation through expansion work of high-pressure steam; the condensation latent heat recovery unit is used for preparing drinking water by condensing water vapor and is linked with the infrared simulation component; high-temperature distilled water is injected into the simulation component to simulate an infrared false target, and the device has the advantages of being small in size, high in power generation efficiency, low in noise, high in confusion and the like.

本发明涉及发电设备领域，便携静音隐身发电装置，包括发电构件及仿真构件；发电构件包括：柴油燃烧单元，所述柴油燃烧单元通过将大分子柴油滴团雾化为小分子柴油气团，与助燃空气充分混合，提高燃烧利用率；高压蒸汽发生单元，利用自循环蒸汽发生技术形成无需动力装置的水—汽循环系统；环形转子发电单元，通过高压水蒸气膨胀做工来实现发电；冷凝潜热回收单元，通过冷凝水蒸气，制备饮用水和联动红外仿真构件；仿真构件，所述仿真构件内通过注入高温蒸馏水来模拟红外假目标，本发明具备尺寸小，发电效率高，噪音低，迷惑性强等优点。

abstract.text: The invention provides ironing equipment and an ironing control method, and relates to the technical field of ironing. The ironing equipment comprises a main machine steam generating device, a secondary steam generating device and a water-steam separating device. The water-steam separation device is enclosed by an upper cover and a shell to form a backflow cavity, and the backflow cavity is communicated with the main machine steam outlet end and the secondary steam inlet end. A baffle structure is arranged in the backflow cavity and used for changing the flow direction of steam and promoting liquid water drops in the steam to be separated, and separated water flows back to the main machine under the action of gravity to be recycled. The dryness of the steam is improved after the steam is subjected to water-vapor separation treatment, and the steam is easier to vaporize after entering the secondary steam generation device, so that the heating burden is relieved, the water spraying phenomenon is avoided, and the use safety and user experience are improved.

本发明提供了一种熨烫设备及熨烫控制方法，涉及熨烫技术领域。该熨烫设备包括主机蒸汽发生装置、二次蒸汽发生装置及水汽分离装置。水汽分离装置由上盖和壳体围合形成回流腔室，其连通主机出汽端与二次进汽端。回流腔室内设有挡板结构，用于改变蒸汽流向并促使其中的液态水滴分离，分离后的水在重力作用下回流至主机中循环利用。蒸汽经水汽分离处理后干燥度提高，进入二次蒸汽发生装置后更易汽化，从而减轻加热负担，避免喷水现象，提升使用安全性与用户体验。

invention_title.text: Automatic pressure relief system
一种自动泄压系统

extracted_name.value: YONGLONG HIGH TECH QINGDAO CO LTD
永隆高新科技（青岛）有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses an automatic pressure relief system which comprises a reaction kettle body, a steam conveying pipe, a cooling water feeding pipeline and a cooling water return pipeline, one end of the steam conveying pipe and one end of the cooling water feeding pipeline are jointly connected with a water-steam mixer, one end of the water-steam mixer is connected with a plurality of conveying pipelines, and the conveying pipelines are connected with the cooling water return pipeline. A coil pipe is arranged on the circumferential side wall in the reaction kettle body, one end of the conveying pipeline is connected to the coil pipe, one end of the cooling water return pipeline penetrates through the reaction kettle body and is connected to the coil pipe, a stirring mechanism is arranged on the reaction kettle body, a circulating water pump is installed on the cooling water feeding pipeline, and the cooling water return pipeline is connected to the circulating water pump. And a connecting pipe is connected between the cooling water feeding pipeline and the cooling water return pipeline. According to the utility model, the pressure of the system can be kept within the range required by the process, the stable operation of the whole system is ensured, the risk caused by the operation of workers can be reduced, the safety of the operation is ensured, the operation is simple, and the practicability, rapidity and convenience are enhanced.

本实用新型公开了一种自动泄压系统，包括反应釜本体、蒸汽输送管、冷却水上水管路和冷却水回水管路，所述蒸汽输送管和冷却水上水管路的一端共同连接有水汽混合器，所述水汽混合器的一端连接有多个输送管路，所述反应釜本体内的一周侧壁上设有盘管，所述输送管路的一端连接在盘管上，所述冷却水回水管路的一端贯穿反应釜本体并连接在盘管上，所述反应釜本体上设有搅拌机构，所述冷却水上水管路上安装有循环水泵，所述冷却水上水管路和冷却水回水管路之间连接有连接管。本实用新型能将系统压力恒定在工艺需求的范围，保证整个系统的稳定运行，可以降低工人操作带来的风险，保证操作的安全性，同时操作简单，增强了实用性、快速性和便捷性。

abstract.text: A multiphase pellet comprises a calcium-based material in combination with an aluminum-containing binder or a silicon-containing binder, or both. The multiphase pellet can undergo more than about 300 standard cycles of charging and discharging. The calcium-based material can include one or more of lime, limestone, plaster-of-paris, calcium oxide and calcium carbonate. The binder can include one or more of Portland cement, alumina, aluminum hydroxide, an aluminoslicate, calcium aluminate cement, bauxite, and kaolin. The multiphase pellet can be used to store and to release thermochemical energy. For example, the multiphase pellet can be charged by heating it, e.g., at a temperature of at least about 350 °C, to store energy. The multiphase pellet can be discharged using water, steam, or humidified air, or a combination thereof, to cause the pellets to release heat.

Un granulé multiphasique comprend un matériau à base de calcium en association avec un liant contenant de l'aluminium ou un liant contenant du silicium, ou les deux. Le granulé multiphasique peut subir plus d'environ 300 cycles standard de charge et de décharge. Le matériau à base de calcium peut comprendre un ou plusieurs éléments parmi la chaux, le calcaire, le plâtre de Paris, l'oxyde de calcium et le carbonate de calcium. Le liant peut comprendre un ou plusieurs éléments parmi le ciment Portland, l'alumine, l'hydroxyde d'aluminium, un aluminoslicate, le ciment d'aluminate de calcium, la bauxite et le kaolin. Le granulé multiphasique peut être utilisé pour stocker et libérer de l'énergie thermochimique. Par exemple, le granulé multiphasique peut être chargé par chauffage, par exemple, à une température d'au moins environ 350 °C, pour stocker de l'énergie. Le granulé multiphasique peut être déchargé à l'aide d'eau, de vapeur ou d'air humidifié, ou d'une combinaison de ceux-ci, pour amener les granulés à libérer de la chaleur.

invention_title.text: Water-vapor separation box and instant heating water dispenser
水汽分离盒及即热饮水机

extracted_name.value: 广东新宝电器股份有限公司

abstract.text: The water vapor separation box comprises a box body, a water inlet, a water vapor separation flow channel, a water outlet and a steam exhaust flow channel, the water inlet is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel, the water outlet is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel, and the inlet end of the steam exhaust flow channel is communicated with the water vapor separation flow channel; and a first water baffle is arranged in the water-steam separation flow channel and used for preventing hot water in the water-steam separation flow channel from entering the steam exhaust flow channel. The first water baffle can be used for preventing hot water in the water-steam separation flow channel from entering the steam exhaust flow channel, complete separation of the hot water and steam is achieved, the hot water is prevented from being discharged through the steam exhaust flow channel, therefore, a user is prevented from being scalded, and the use safety is improved.

本实用新型公开了一种水汽分离盒及即热饮水机，包括：盒体，具有进水口、水汽分离流道、出水口和排蒸汽流道，进水口连通水汽分离流道，出水口连通水汽分离流道，排蒸汽流道的进口端连通水汽分离流道；其中，水汽分离流道内设有第一挡水板，第一挡水板用于阻挡水汽分离流道内的热水进入排蒸汽流道内。其能够利用第一挡水板阻挡水汽分离流道内的热水进入排蒸汽流道内，实现将热水和蒸汽完全分离开，避免热水通过排蒸汽流道排出，从而避免烫伤用户，提高了使用安全性。

invention_title.text: Steam boiler provided with solar hot water energy-saving system
一种配置太阳能热水节能系统的蒸汽锅炉

extracted_name.value: SHENXIAN MABEI OIL COTTON CO LTD
莘县马北油棉有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model belongs to the field of steam boilers, and provides a steam boiler with a solar hot water energy-saving system, which comprises a boiler, a flue gas waste heat recovery device and a solar heating device, a 1 # tank is arranged at the tail end of a preheating pipe, and a first water supplementing pipe connected with the solar heating device is arranged on the 1 # tank. A second water supplementing pipe is arranged on the solar heating device, a second tank is arranged at the tail end of the second water supplementing pipe, a hot water supply pipe connected with the boiler is arranged on the second tank, a water-steam separation device communicated with the second tank and the first tank is arranged between the second tank and the first tank, and the water-steam separation device comprises a tank body, two steam inlet branch pipes, an exhaust pipe and two condensate water return pipes. According to the utility model, the mode of preheating and then solar heating is adopted, the gas consumption is greatly reduced by about 30%, the design is reasonable, the structure is simple, the cost is reduced, the hot water supply efficiency and the overall workshop production efficiency are ensured, and the device is suitable for large-scale popularization.

本实用新型属于蒸汽锅炉领域，提出一种配置太阳能热水节能系统的蒸汽锅炉，包括锅炉、烟气余热回收装置和太阳能加热装置，所述预热管的末端设置有1#罐，1#罐上设置有与太阳能加热装置连接的第一补水管，太阳能加热装置上设置有第二补水管，第二补水管的末端设置有2#罐，2#罐上设置有与锅炉连接的热水供应管，2#罐与1#罐之间设置有与二者连通的水汽分离装置，水汽分离装置包括罐体、2个进汽支管、1个排气管和2个冷凝水回流管。本实用新型采用先预热再太阳能加热的方式，大幅度降低燃气消耗30％左右，设计合理、结构简单、有利于降低成本、有利于保证热水供应效率以及车间整体生产效率，适合大规模推广。

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a spray type dish-washing machine with an elbow nozzle. Tap water enters the stainless steel inner container through the water inlet electromagnetic valve. The water discharged from the rotary piston water pump enters the left lower side of the pressurized water tank through a water outlet one-way valve, the compressed air discharged from the rotary piston air compressor enters the left upper side of the pressurized water tank through an electric heating wire and a one-way air valve, the compressed air and a water-steam-water mixing pipe, and the mixture of the compressed air discharged from the water-steam-water mixing pipe and water enters an L-shaped water pipe. And then the water enters a central barrel of a central barrel cover plate of the strip-shaped rotary nozzle from a circle of small holes in the upper section of the L-shaped water pipe. A mixture of compressed air and water from a plurality of centrosymmetric thin pipes on the central barrel of the central barrel cover plate penetrates through the rubber thin pipes and enters the elbow nozzles, and mist water sprayed by the elbow nozzles flushes tableware in the wrist basket. After set time is reached, the motor traction drainage valve is electrified and opened, and water pumped out by the rotary piston water pump is discharged from the drainage pipe through the electrified and opened motor traction drainage valve and the drainage one-way valve.

本实用新型公开一种装有弯头喷嘴的喷雾式洗碗机。自来水经过进水电磁阀进入不锈钢内胆。从旋转活塞水泵出来的上经过出水单向阀进入加压水罐左下侧，从旋转活塞空压机出来的压缩空气经过电发热丝和单向气阀进入加压水罐左上侧，压缩空气和水气与水混合管，从气与水混合管出来的压缩空气与水混合物进入L形水管，然后从L形水管上段的一圈小孔进入条形旋转喷头中央圆桶盖板的中央圆桶。从中央圆桶盖板的中央圆桶上数个中心对称的细管出来的压缩空气与水混合物穿过橡胶细管进入弯头喷嘴，弯头喷嘴喷出的雾状水冲洗腕蓝里的餐具。达到设定时间后，电机牵引排水阀通电打开，旋转活塞水泵抽出的水经过通电打开的电机牵引排水阀以及排水单向阀从排水管排出。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of geological disaster prediction, and discloses a high-speed remote landslide dynamic process prediction method, which comprises the following steps: S1, selecting a landslide research area, and obtaining physical and mechanical parameters of solid-phase particles, ice, water, gas, a solid skeleton and a sliding mass of the landslide area; s2, according to the physical and mechanical parameters, establishing a mechanical equilibrium equation, a material conservation equation and an energy conservation equation, and establishing a high-speed remote landslide heat-water-force-steam coupling kinetic model for describing the whole process of ice-water-steam phase change in the cold region; and S3, performing simulation prediction on the dynamic process of the high-speed long-distance landslide through the thermal-water-force-steam coupling dynamic model of the high-speed long-distance landslide to obtain a prediction result. According to the invention, a heat-water-force-steam coupling modeling framework combining solid ice melting and pore water vaporization processes is adopted, the method is suitable for simulating a multi-stage phase change process caused by rapid temperature rise in a landslide shear zone, and transition behaviors among freezing, melting and vaporization stages can be continuously described.

本发明涉及地质灾害预测技术领域，其公开了一种高速远程滑坡动力学过程预测方法，其包括以下步骤：S1:选择研究滑坡区域，获取滑坡区域的固相颗粒、冰、水、气体、固体骨架、滑体的物理力学参数；S2:根据物理力学参数，通过建立力学平衡、物质守恒和能量守恒方程，组建用于描述寒区冰‑水‑汽相变全过程的高速远程滑坡热‑水‑力‑汽耦合动力学模型；S3:通过高速远程滑坡热‑水‑力‑汽耦合动力学模型对高速远程滑坡动力学过程进行仿真预测，得预测结果。本发明采用固态冰融化与孔隙水汽化过程结合的热‑水‑力‑汽耦合建模框架，适用于模拟滑坡剪切带中温度快速升高引发的多阶段相变过程，能够连续描述冻结、融化和汽化各阶段之间的过渡行为。

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of agilawood essential oil distillation, and particularly relates to agilawood essential oil distillation extraction equipment which comprises a distillation kettle body, a sealing plate is in threaded connection with a feeding hole of the distillation kettle body; the distillation kettle body is fixedly connected with a condensation pipe; by arranging brand-new agilawood essential oil distillation extraction equipment, the functions of uniform heating, efficient extraction and effective cleaning of raw materials are achieved, a distillation kettle body serves as a main container and is used for containing a mixture of agilawood raw materials and water, steam is introduced through two air inlet connectors for heating, liquid level changes in the distillation process are monitored by a liquid level device, and the liquid level is controlled by a controller. The opening or closing of a gas guide pipe on a gas guide plate is controlled through a partition assembly, uniform heating of raw materials at all parts in the equipment is ensured, a plurality of bent arc pipes are arranged on the outer wall of the gas guide pipe, the heating range is further expanded, the uniform heating effect is improved, a servo motor drives stirring blades to stir the raw materials in the distillation process, the heating uniformity is improved, and the distillation efficiency is improved. The distillation extraction quality is improved.

本发明属于沉香精油蒸馏技术领域，具体的说是一种沉香精油蒸馏提取设备，包括蒸馏釜体；所述蒸馏釜体的进料口处螺纹连接有密封板；所述蒸馏釜体上固接有冷凝管；通过设置全新的沉香精油蒸馏提取设备，实现了对原料均匀加热、高效提取以及有效清洗的功能，其中，蒸馏釜体作为主要容器，用于盛放沉香木原料与水的混合物，通过两个进气接头通入蒸汽进行加热，蒸馏过程中的液位变化由液位器监测，通过分区组件控制导气板上的导气管打开或关闭，确保设备内部各部位原料的均匀受热，多个弯弧管设置在导气管外壁，进一步扩大加热范围，提高均匀加热的效果，伺服电机驱动搅拌叶在蒸馏过程中搅动原料，提高受热均匀性，提升蒸馏提取质量。

invention_title.text: Water vapor separation device
一种水汽分离装置

extracted_name.value: 广东威林科技股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a water vapor separation device which comprises a separation device main body, a separation cavity is arranged in the separation device main body, a plurality of water inlet pipes, a plurality of water outlet pipes and a plurality of exhaust pipes are arranged on the separation device main body, and the exhaust pipes are arranged at the top of the separation device main body. According to the water-steam separation device, when hot water and high-temperature steam enter the water inlet pipe through the hot water supply pipe and then enter the separation cavity of the separation device body, the hot water flows to the water drainage pipe along the inner bottom face of the separation cavity through the separation effect of the separation cavity on the hot water and due to the fact that the water is heavier than the high-temperature steam; the high-temperature steam is slowly focused above the separation cavity and is discharged through the exhaust pipe to realize water-steam separation, so that stable flowing of hot water is kept, the situation that the hot water splashes to scald a user when the steam is sprayed out along with the hot water is prevented, and the use safety of the water dispenser is improved.

本实用新型公开了一种水汽分离装置，包括：分离装置主体，所述分离装置主体内具有分离腔，并且所述分离装置主体上配置有若干进水管、若干排水管、若干排气管，所述排气管配置在分离装置主体的顶部。本实用新型提供了一种水汽分离装置，当热水和高温蒸汽经过热水供水管进入到进水管，而后再进入到分离装置主体的分离腔内，通过分离腔对热水的分离作用，并且由于水比高温蒸汽重，热水则沿着分离腔的内底面流动到排水管，高温蒸汽则慢慢聚焦在分离腔上方，通过排气管排出实现水汽分离，使得保持了热水的稳定流动，防止蒸汽伴随热水喷出时造成热水飞溅以烫伤用户，从而提高了饮水机的使用安全性。

abstract.text: A method of producing hydrogen and sequestering carbon or sulfur includes generating a fluid including at least one of water, steam, hydrogen sulfide, carbon dioxide and heat as a byproduct of a surface facility and injecting the fluid into a subsurface formation. The subsurface formation can include a porous rock, in various forms of porosity such as intragranular, intergranular, fracture porosity. The method can further include heating the fluid to stimulate an exothermic reaction of the fluid with components of the subsurface rock formation and produce a hydrogen reaction product and one or more of sulfur minerals from the hydrogen sulfide or carbon minerals from the carbon dioxide. The fluid can be heated to between about 25°C and about 500°C. The method can also include extracting the hydrogen produced from the reaction of the fluid with the subsurface rock formation and mineralizing at least one of the sulfur or carbon in the porous rock.

invention_title.text: Static electricity eliminating, atomizing and humidifying device of PVC powder conveying system
一种PVC粉料输送系统静电消除雾化加湿装置

extracted_name.value: 金川集团股份有限公司,
金川集团化工有限责任公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of chemical production, in particular to a static electricity eliminating, atomizing and humidifying device of a PVC (polyvinyl chloride) powder conveying system, which aims to solve the problem that resin fluidity becomes poor due to the fact that moisture of PVC resin particles is reduced and static electricity is increased due to friction, blowing loss and the like in the PVC powder conveying process at present. According to the device, separation of steam and condensate drops is effectively guaranteed through the water-steam separator capable of achieving automatic buffering and gravity separation, the partition plate and the pore plate liquid remover, the drain valve is arranged at the bottom of the water-steam separator, when condensate water in the water-steam separator reaches a certain liquid level, automatic drainage is achieved, and controllable drainage is achieved; a large amount of condensate water is prevented from entering the pneumatic conveying system to influence the resin quality, the spiral steam spray head utilizes saturated steam to increase the humidity of airflow of the pneumatic conveying system, static electricity and resin moisture loss in the resin conveying process are effectively reduced, and therefore the quality of PVC products is guaranteed.

本实用新型涉及化工生产技术领域，具体涉及一种PVC粉料输送系统静电消除雾化加湿装置，以解决目前在PVC粉料输送过程中，由于摩擦及风吹损失等造成PVC树脂颗粒水份降低及静电增大，导致树脂流动性变差的问题。该装置通过自动缓冲及重力分离的水汽分离器，设置隔板及孔板除液器，有效保证蒸汽与冷凝液滴的分离，水汽分离器底部设有疏水阀，当水汽分离器内冷凝水达到一定液位时自动排水，实现排水可控，防止大量冷凝水进入风送系统影响树脂质量，螺旋式的蒸汽喷头，利用饱和蒸汽给风送系统气流增加湿度，有效降低了树脂输送过程中的静电及树脂水份损失，从而保证了PVC产品的质量。

invention_title.text: Method for counting production consumption of pulping and papermaking DCS (Distributed Control System)
一种制浆造纸DCS控制系统对生产耗用统计方法

extracted_name.value: DONGGUAN JINZHOU PAPER INDUSTRY CO LTD
东莞金洲纸业有限公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses a production consumption statistical method of a pulping and papermaking DCS control system, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out the numerical initialization integer of data needing to be accumulated, taking each second as a unit, and recording the data as a pre-integrating variable; s2, integrating the variables before integrating by using an integrating operation module, and performing accumulation once in one second by using the integrating operation module; s3, recording an integrating result in different time periods, and calling a CPU system clock to execute data recording once at 8 o'clock, 16 o'clock and 23 o'clock in 59 minutes and 58 seconds; and S4, realizing communication between the CPU and an upper computer provided with RSVIEW32 software through the Ethernet by using the exchanger, and increasing display pictures. According to the pulping and papermaking DCS control system, a production consumption statistical method is adopted, a novel structural design is adopted, based on process requirements, production material integrating including clear water, steam, aluminum sulfate, a sizing agent and other data is added, a data accumulation function program is designed on the DCS, an accumulation function block of the system is mainly applied, and the principle is that input signals are accumulated once per second.

本发明公开了一种制浆造纸DCS控制系统对生产耗用统计方法，包括以下步骤：S1、将需要进行累积的数据进行数值初始化整定位每秒为单位，记为积算前变量；S2、应用积算运算模块对积算前变量积算，且积算运算模块以1秒执行一次累加；S3、分时段对积算结果记录，调用CPU系统时钟在8时、16时和23时59分58秒执行一次数据记录；S4、用交换器、通过以太网实现CPU与安装有RSVIEW32软件的上位机通信，增加显示画面。该制浆造纸DCS控制系统对生产耗用统计方法，采用新型的结构设计，基于工艺要求，增加生产用料积算包括清水、蒸汽、硫酸铝、施胶剂等数据，DCS上设计一种数据累积功能程序，主要应用系统的积计功能块，原理是对输入的信号进行一秒钟累加一次。

一种用于制取干蒸汽的蒸汽发生器

extracted_name.value: C & B ELECTRONICS SHENZHEN CO LTD
深圳市开步电子有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of steam production, and discloses a steam generator for producing dry steam, which is characterized in that a water channel is arranged in a first-stage thick film heating pipe, and the first-stage thick film heating pipe heats water flowing into the water channel into wet steam; a steam channel is arranged in the second-stage thick film heating pipe, and the second-stage thick film heating pipe heats wet steam conveyed by the water channel into dry steam. The first-stage thick film heating pipe and the second-stage thick film heating pipe are of an integrated connection structure. According to the steam generator, the first-stage thick film heating pipe and the second-stage thick film heating pipe are integrated into an integrally-connected structure, and a water-steam separator does not need to be additionally connected, so that all components of the steam generator for preparing dry steam are relatively concentrated, and the size is relatively small; and the advantages of high power density, high heating speed, high working temperature, high temperature rise rate, high mechanical strength, small size, convenience in installation, uniformity in heating, long service life, energy conservation, environment friendliness and the like of the thick film heating bodies forming the first-stage thick film heating tube and the second-stage thick film heating tube are fully utilized.

本实用新型涉及蒸汽制取技术领域，公开了一种用于制取干蒸汽的蒸汽发生器，包括：一级厚膜发热管内部设有水道，一级厚膜发热管将流入水道内的水加热为湿蒸汽；二级厚膜发热管内部设有蒸汽通道，二级厚膜发热管将水道输送的湿蒸汽加热为干蒸汽；一级厚膜发热管与二级厚膜发热管为一体连接结构。本申请通过将一级厚膜发热管和二级厚膜发热管集成为一体连接的结构，不需要额外连接水汽分离器，不仅使得制取干蒸汽的蒸汽发生器的各组成比较集中，体积较小；且充分利用组成一级厚膜发热管和二级厚膜发热管本身厚膜发热体所具有的功率密度高、加热速度快、工作温度高、升温速率快、机械强度高、体积小、安装方便、加热均匀、寿命长和节能环保等优点。

一种污泥废气处理装置

四川中鸿问鼎环保科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a sludge waste gas treatment device and belongs to the field of sludge waste gas treatment. A sludge waste gas treatment device comprises a base plate, a first end base and a second end base are installed at the two ends of the top of the base plate respectively, a kiln body is arranged between the first end base and the second end base, the sludge waste gas treatment device further comprises a waste gas recovery device communicated with the first end base and the second end base, and the waste gas recovery device comprises a draught fan communicated with the interior of the second end base through a gas conveying pipe. One end of the fan is communicated with the water-steam separator through a gas conveying pipe, one end of the water-steam separator is communicated with a storage tank through a gas conveying pipe, the storage tank is communicated with the interior of the first end seat through a gas conveying pipe, a spiral feeder is arranged at the top of the second end seat, a combustor is installed at the outer end of the first end seat, and a slag outlet in the first end seat is located below the combustor; by means of the waste gas recovery device, combustible waste gas generated during calcination in the kiln body is recovered and ignited again through the combustor, and waste gas emission is reduced.

本实用新型公开了一种污泥废气处理装置，属于污泥废气处理领域。一种污泥废气处理装置，包括底座板，底座板的顶部两端分别安装有第一端座和第二端座，第一端座和第二端座之间设有窑体，还包括与第一端座和第二端座连通的废气回收装置，废气回收装置包括与第二端座内部通过输气管连通的风机，风机的一端通过输气管连通水汽分离器，水汽分离器的一端通过输气管连通有储存罐，储存罐通过输气管与第一端座内部连通，第二端座的顶部设有螺旋送料机，第一端座的外端安装有燃烧器，第一端座上的出渣口位于燃烧器的下方；本实用新型通过废气回收装置，对窑体内部煅烧时产生的可燃废气进行回收并通过燃烧器再次点燃，减少废气排放。

invention_title.text: Water-steam separator
水汽分离器

extracted_name.value: SHANGHAI YIPIN WATER PURIFICATION TECH CO LTD
上海依品净水科技有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of water-steam separators, and particularly relates to a water-steam separator which comprises a heating body, the heating body is connected with a water inlet pipe through a corrugated pipe, a water-steam separating structure is formed by a sealing disc, a round pipe, a connecting block and a water outlet pipe, and the surface of the sealing disc is smooth and not prone to being adhered with scale. The sealing cover is installed on the flow dividing pipe through threads and extruded on the sealing disc through the circular ring, and when the water vapor separation structure needs to be taken out, the sealing cover is rotated to be taken down from the flow dividing pipe. A worker can directly hold the water outlet pipe with the hand to move downwards and take out the water vapor separation structure composed of the sealing disc, the round pipe, the connecting block and the water outlet pipe from the flow dividing pipe, and the worker can conveniently replace the water vapor separation structure and maintain or clean the water vapor separation structure; and all the structures are matched for use, so that the problem that the water outlet flow of the water-vapor separator is reduced due to the fact that threads on the water-vapor separation structure are prone to causing the unsmooth surface incrustation solidification condition is solved.

本实用新型属于水汽分离器技术领域，尤其涉及水汽分离器，包括加热体，加热体通过波纹管连接有进水管，通过设置的密封盘、圆管、连接块和出水管构成分离水汽结构，而密封盘的表面光滑不容易黏上水垢，同时，密封盖通过螺纹安装在分流管上，且由圆环挤压在密封盘上，当需要将分离水汽结构取出时，转动密封盖，使密封盖从分流管上拿下，并且人员直接用手就能握住出水管下移并将由密封盘、圆管、连接块和出水管构成分离水汽结构从分流管上取出，方便人员进行更换，对分离水汽结构进行维修或清理；并且上述各个结构配合使用也解决了分离水汽结构上的螺纹容易导致不光滑的表面水垢固化情况，使得水汽分离器出水流量变小问题。

invention_title.text: Device for adjusting steam by using ejector
一种使用抽射器进行蒸汽调节的装置

extracted_name.value: 中国石油化工股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a device for adjusting steam by using an ejector, which comprises the ejector, a Rafael nozzle, an expansion pipe, a first input pipeline, a second input pipeline, an output pipeline, a demineralized water component, a pressure adjusting component and a temperature adjusting component, the Rafael nozzle is arranged in the ejector, the expansion pipe is arranged on the ejector, and the first input pipeline and the second input pipeline are communicated with the output pipeline. The first input pipeline is arranged at the end, away from the expansion pipe, of the ejector, the second input pipeline is arranged at the end, close to the expansion pipe, of the ejector, the output pipeline is arranged at the output end of the expansion pipe, the demineralized water assembly is arranged on the expansion pipe, and the pressure adjusting assembly is arranged on the ejector. And the temperature adjusting assembly is arranged on the demineralized water assembly. According to the device, the energy of high-pressure steam pressure reduction is fully utilized, so that the consumption of steam in a water steam stripping method and the energy consumption in a temperature and pressure reduction process are reduced.

本实用新型涉及一种使用抽射器进行蒸汽调节的装置，包括抽射器、拉法尔喷嘴、扩张管、第一输入管道、第二输入管道、输出管道、除盐水组件、调压组件和调温组件，所述拉法尔喷嘴设置于所述抽射器内，所述扩张管设置于所述抽射器上，所述第一输入管道设置于所述抽射器远离扩张管的一端，所述第二输入管道设置于所述抽射器靠近扩张管的一端，所述输出管道设置于所述扩张管的输出端，所述除盐水组件设置于所述扩张管上，所述调压组件设置于所述抽射器上，所述调温组件设置于所述除盐水组件上。本装置充分利用高压蒸汽减压的能量，以降低水蒸汽汽提法中蒸汽的消耗以及减温减压过程中的能耗。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a treatment method for improving the raw gas water-steam ratio of a coal chemical gasification device, and the coal chemical gasification device comprises a gasification furnace, a washing tower, an ash water system, a steam injection device and a circulating water system. The method is realized by installing a high-precision temperature sensor and a high-precision pressure sensor on an outlet pipeline of the gasification furnace, and the sensors transmit temperature and pressure data collected in real time to a control system. By monitoring the temperature and pressure of the raw gas at the outlet of the gasification furnace in real time and calculating the target water-steam ratio according to the preset water-steam ratio correlation model, parameters such as washing water flow, steam injection amount and circulating water temperature can be accurately adjusted according to actual working conditions, and accurate control of the water-steam ratio of the raw gas is realized. The stability of the subsequent process and the product quality are improved.

本发明公开了关于煤化工气化装置提高粗煤气水汽比的处理方法，包括气化炉、洗涤塔、灰水系统、蒸汽喷射装置和循环水系统的煤化工气化装置，实时监测气化炉出口粗煤气的温度和压力，通过在气化炉出口管道上安装高精度的温度传感器和压力传感器来实现，传感器将实时采集到的温度和压力数据传输至控制系统。通过实时监测气化炉出口粗煤气的温度和压力，并依据预先设定的水汽比关联模型计算目标水汽比，能够根据实际工况精确调整洗涤水流量、蒸汽喷射量和循环水温度等参数，实现粗煤气水汽比的精准控制，提高后续工艺的稳定性和产品质量。

abstract.text: The invention provides intelligent temperature control instantaneous sterilization and rapid cooling equipment. The intelligent temperature control instantaneous sterilization and rapid cooling equipment comprises a bottom plate, a shell is arranged at the upper end of the bottom plate, a water drainage pipe is arranged on one side of the shell, a water steam drainage hole is formed in the upper end of the shell, an inner container is arranged in the shell, and the outer surface of the inner container is in threaded connection with a pressurization top cover; an electric telescopic rod is fixedly connected to the top inner wall of the pressurizing top cover, a pressing plate is fixedly connected to the lower end of the electric telescopic rod, a second water inlet pipe is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the shell, a cooling-water machine is fixedly connected to the upper end of the bottom plate, and a water pump is installed in a water tank of the cooling-water machine; the outer surface of the inner container is fixedly connected with a heating resistance ring, a sealing heat insulation sleeve is arranged outside the inner container, and through the structure, efficient sterilization can be achieved, cooling can be conducted in time, the humidity in the inner container can be reduced in time, and adverse effects of the high-humidity environment on the inner container and objects in the inner container are prevented.

本发明提供一种智能温控瞬时杀菌与快速冷却设备。该智能温控瞬时瞬时杀菌与快速冷却设备，包括底板，所述底板的上端设置有外壳，所述外壳的一侧设置有排水管，所述外壳的上端设置有排水汽孔，所述外壳的内部设置有内胆，所述内胆的外表面螺纹连接有加压顶盖，所述加压顶盖的顶内壁固定连接有电动伸缩杆，所述电动伸缩杆的下端固定连接有压板，所述外壳的内壁固定连接有第二进水管，所述底板的上端固定连接有冷水机，所述冷水机的水槽中安装有水泵，所述内胆的外表面固定连接有加热电阻环，外部设置有密封隔热套，通过上述结构，能够高效杀菌，能及时降温，以及时降低内胆内的湿度，防止因高湿环境对内胆及内部物品产生不良影响。

abstract.text: Process for producing syngas comprising the steps of:a) burning methane or natural gas with oxygen and optionally with water steam for producing flue gas comprising CO2 and H2O according to the following reaction:C⁢H4+2⁢O2→CO2+2⁢H2⁢O[1]b) cooling the flue gas coming from a) by heat exchange with a water stream which is thereby vapourised;c) condensing and removing water from the flue gas, coming from step b), thereby obtaining a mixture consisting essentially of CO2;d) carrying out an electrolysis of a steam stream in a solid oxide electrolytic cell (SOEC), whereby steam is split into oxygen gas and hydrogen gas according to the following reaction scheme:H2O(g)→H2+1/2⁢O2[2]e) separating and drying hydrogen gasf) carrying out a reverse water gas shift reaction between CO2 coming from step c) with H2 coming from step e) according to the following scheme:CO2+H2→CO+H2O.[3]

abstract.text: A fluidized bed boiler plant (10) and a method of preheating combustion gas fluidized bed boiler plant, the boiler plant comprising a furnace (12) and a combustion gas channel (24, 24b), and a water-steam cycle comprising an evaporator section (26), a superheater section comprising a last superheater (30) and a steam turbine (34), and a superheating path for conveying steam from the evaporator section (26) via the superheater section to the steam turbine, and a first combustion gas preheater (38, 38b), wherein the fluidized bed boiler plant comprises a second combustion gas preheater (40, 40b), a steam extraction line (46, 46b) attached in flow connection with the second combustion gas preheater and with the superheating path in a location upstream of the last superheater for conveying steam from the superheating path to the second combustion gas preheater, wherein the method for preheating combustion gas comprises conveying steam from the superheating path from a location upstream of the last superheater via the steam extraction line to the second combustion gas preheater, and transferring heat from the steam to the combustion gas in the second combustion gas preheater. invention_title.text: Hot water and steam multipurpose electric heating furnace
热水蒸汽多用途电加热炉

extracted_name.value: 常州综研加热炉有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a hot water steam multipurpose electric heating furnace which comprises an electric heater and a furnace body, and further comprises a cold water collecting pipe, a hot water collecting pipe and at least one coil pipe, water and cold water are stored in an inner cavity of the furnace body, the hot water collecting pipe is in a barrel shape and located above the cold water collecting pipe, a pipe body of the cold water collecting pipe is arranged in the inner cavity of the furnace body, and the coil pipe is arranged in the inner cavity of the furnace body. A cold water inlet end of the cold water collecting pipe is arranged on the outer side of the furnace body, a pipe body of the hot water collecting pipe is arranged in an inner cavity of the furnace body, a hot water outlet end of the hot water collecting pipe is arranged on the outer side of the furnace body, the coil pipe is vertically arranged in the inner cavity of the furnace body in a spiral shape, and a pipe opening in the lower end of the coil pipe is communicated with an inner cavity of the cold water collecting pipe. A pipe opening in the upper end of the coil pipe is communicated with an inner cavity of the hot water collecting pipe, the boiler body is vertically arranged, and a steam outlet is formed in the top end of the boiler body. The multi-heat-source heat supply system can provide hot water media and steam media, the two heat supply media are independent of each other, and the multi-heat-source heat supply requirement of a user is met.

本实用新型公开了一种热水蒸汽多用途电加热炉，包括电加热器和炉体，还包括冷水集管、热水集管和至少一根盘管，在炉体的内腔中存贮有水，冷水、热水集管呈圆桶形且热水集管位于冷水集管上方，冷水集管的管身置于炉体的内腔中，冷水集管的冷水进口端置于所述炉体外侧，所述热水集管的管身置于所述炉体的内腔中，所述热水集管的热水出口端置于所述炉体外侧，所述盘管呈螺旋状直立布置在所述炉体的内腔中，且所述盘管的下端管口与冷水集管的内腔相连通，所述盘管的上端管口与热水集管的内腔相连通，所述炉体直立布置且在炉体的顶端安装有蒸汽出口。本实用新型既能提供热水介质，又能提供蒸汽介质，两种供热介质互相独立，满足了用户多热源供热需求。

invention_title.text: Upper boiler barrel of boiler
一种锅炉上锅筒

extracted_name.value: 衡阳市大成锅炉有限公司

abstract.text: The upper boiler barrel comprises a barrel body, a front sealing head and a rear sealing head, an underwater pore plate parallel to an axis is arranged in the barrel body along the lower position of the axis, the left side and the right side of the underwater pore plate are respectively connected with a baffle which inclines upwards, the upper ends of the baffles are fixedly connected with the inner wall of the barrel body, and the lower ends of the baffles are fixedly connected with the lower end of the barrel body. Through holes are formed in positions, corresponding to the left and right baffles, of the barrel and are connected with the ascending pipe; a sealing plate is arranged at the front ends of the underwater pore plate and the two baffles, the lower edge of the sealing plate is lower than the underwater pore plate, a pore plate parallel to the underwater pore plate is arranged between the lower edge of the sealing plate and the front sealing head, and a through hole is formed in the position, corresponding to the pore plate, of the cylinder body and connected with a downcomer. According to the technical scheme, it can be ensured that a water-steam mixture entering from the ascending pipe can only flow into the lower half part of the cavity of the barrel firstly, then steam penetrates through the underwater pore plate and enters the upper half part of the cavity of the barrel upwards, first-time steam-water separation is achieved, and the water inlet of the descending pipe can be prevented from forming vortexes.

本实用新型公开了一种锅炉上锅筒，包括筒体、前封头、后封头，所述筒体内沿轴线偏下的位置设有一块与轴线平行的水下孔板，所述水下孔板的左右两边分别与一块向上倾斜的挡板相连，所述挡板的上端与筒体内壁固定连接，所述筒体对应左右挡板的位置设有通孔与上升管相连；所述水下孔板与两块挡板的前端设有一块封板，该封板的下缘低于水下孔板，所述封板的下缘与前封头之间设有一块与水下孔板相平行的孔板，所述筒体对应孔板的位置设有通孔与下降管相连。上述技术方案能够确保从上升管进来的水汽混合物只能先流入筒体空腔的下半部分，之后蒸汽再透过水下孔板向上进入筒体空腔的上半部分，实现第一次汽水分离，还能防止下降管进水口形成漩涡。
