abstract.text: A device for applying a layer (to a front and/or rear side of a flat steel product includes a zinc alloy melt bath (11) (ZnAl; ZnAlMg) with an input side and an exit side, a stripping nozzle device with at least one gas nozzle for blowing off the front or rear side of the flat steel product with gas, the stripping nozzle device being arranged in the area of the exit side, and a water vapor device which is configured to emit gaseous water vapor and to provide a controlled water vapor atmosphere in the close range of the front and/or rear side of the flat steel product. The controlled water vapor atmosphere has an absolute local humidity which is greater than 1 g/m3 and less than 300 g/m3, the absolute local humidity preferably being in the range of 2.71 g/m3 to 50 g/m3.

abstract.text: A small-batch hot stamping mold based on direct surface air cooling, comprising a male mold (20) and a female mold (30), wherein a recess matching a punch of the male mold is provided on the female mold, a first cavity (21) recessed toward the interior of the male mold is provided on a surface of the male mold, a second cavity (31) recessed toward the interior of the female mold is further provided on a surface of the female mold, and the first cavity and the second cavity are configured to form an airflow cooling channel in communication with an external pipe; and water vapor introduced through the external pipe enters the mold, and circulates and exchanges heat in the airflow cooling channel formed by the first cavity and the second cavity and on the surface of the mold, so as to take away the heat from a stamped part and the surface of the mold. Further disclosed are a cooling method for a stamped part based on direct surface air cooling and a cooling method for a stamping mold based on direct surface air cooling. The stamping mold is provided with the cavities on the surface of the mold, the manufacturing cost and maintenance cost of the mold are low, and the production cost of a single piece is reduced.

L'invention concerne un moule d'estampage à chaud de petit lot basé sur un refroidissement par air directement sur la surface, comprenant un moule mâle (20) et un moule femelle (30), un évidement correspondant à un poinçon du moule mâle étant disposé sur le moule femelle, une première cavité (21) en retrait vers l'intérieur du moule mâle étant disposée sur une surface du moule mâle, une seconde cavité (31) en retrait vers l'intérieur du moule femelle étant en outre disposée sur une surface du moule femelle, et la première cavité et la seconde cavité étant conçues pour former un canal de refroidissement d'écoulement d'air en communication avec un tuyau externe ; et de la vapeur d'eau introduite à travers le tuyau externe entre dans le moule, et circule et échange de la chaleur dans le canal de refroidissement d'écoulement d'air formé par la première cavité et la seconde cavité et sur la surface du moule, de façon à évacuer la chaleur d'une partie estampée et de la surface du moule. L'invention concerne en outre un procédé de refroidissement pour une pièce estampée sur la base d'un refroidissement par air directement sur la surface et un procédé de refroidissement pour un moule d'estampage sur la base d'un refroidissement par air directement sur la surface. Le moule d'estampage est pourvu des cavités sur la surface du moule, le coût de fabrication et le coût de maintenance du moule sont faibles, et le coût de production d'une seule pièce est réduit.

一种基于表面直接风冷的小批量热冲压模具，包括凸模（20）和凹模（30），凹模上设有与凸模冲头匹配的凹陷部，凸模表面设有朝其内部凹陷的第一凹腔（21），凹模表面也设有朝其内部凹陷的第二凹腔（31），第一凹腔和第二凹腔用以形成与外部管路连通的气流冷却通道；由外部管路通入的水气进入模具内，在第一凹腔、第二凹腔形成的气流冷却通道内以及模具表面进行循环和热交换，以带走冲压件和模具表面的热量。还公开了一种基于表面直接风冷的冲压件的冷却方法以及一种基于表面直接风冷的冲压模具的冷却方法。冲压模具在模具表面开设凹腔，模具的制造成本和维修成本低，降低了单件的生产成本。

abstract.text: Methods and systems are disclosed for easy and cost-effective adiabatic water desalination, producing freshwater and/or potable water from saline sources with minimal energy input. This is achieved by utilizing adiabatic thermodynamic processes to reduce energy consumption compared to conventional methods. The disclosed methods and systems offer sustainable and cost-effective solutions to address freshwater scarcity. In an example of these methods, a saltwater tank with two chambers is rocked back and forth around an axis such that, during each half cycle of rocking, the vapor volume of one chamber expands and the vapor volume of the other chamber shrinks. The expansion of the chambers' vapor volume vaporizes the salt water, and the shrinkage of the chambers' vapor volume causes condensation of the water vapor, which will be collected in a separate tank.

abstract.text: An installation for the conversion of uranium hexafluoride (UF6) to uranium dioxide (UO2) comprises a hydrolysis reactor (4) for the conversion of UF6 into uranium oxyfluoride powder (UO2F2), a pyrohydrolysis furnace (6) for converting the UO2F2 powder supplied by the reactor (4) into UO2 powder, a supply device (8) comprising reagent injection ducts (10) for the injection of UF6, water vapor or H2, and a control system (16) designed to control the supply device (8) so as to supply at least one of the reagent injection ducts (10) with a neutral gas during a shut-down or start-up phase of the conversion installation.

一种超低温液氢存储舱

abstract.text: An ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen storage cabin is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

一种超低温液氢存储舱，有圆筒形内舱，内舱通过填注层支撑固定在外舱内部，内舱与外舱形成填注层空间，填注层空间内填充有低温LNG或低温液氮。内舱由内舱外壁和内舱内壁组成，内舱外壁与内舱内壁形成真空层，真空层内填注珍珠岩并抽真空。本发明采用双层隔舱设置，外舱敷设绝缘层，内舱采用真空双壁绝热结构，内外舱之间充装与液氢温度较为接近的LNG或液氮，考虑到直接对液氢实现液体状态维持技术难度高、耗能大，本方案通过成熟的再液化系统轻松实现对‑163℃LNG或‑196℃液氨介质的超低温液体状态维护，从而间接保证超低温‑253℃液氢介质的液体状态维持，可大大降低液氢舱与外部环境之间的热量传递，降低液氢超低温存储技术难度和技术成本。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen medium active exhaust cooling test system and method. The system comprises a vacuum module, a liquid hydrogen storage box module, a gas replacement and filling module, an exhaust cooling test module, a helium pressurization module, a leakage and safe discharge module, an external heat flow simulation module and a measurement and control module. According to the scheme, on the basis of simulating the external vacuum environment, the test of active exhaust cooling of the liquid hydrogen medium space is achieved through gas replacement, filling, testing and the like, and compared with the prior art, the liquid hydrogen medium space active exhaust cooling device is comprehensive in function.
本发明公开了一种液氢介质主动排气降温试验系统和方法，该系统包括：真空模块、液氢贮箱模块、气体置换和加注模块、排气降温测试模块、氦气增压模块、泄出与安全排放模块、外热流模拟模块和测量与控制模块。通过本发明所述方案，在模拟外部真空环境的基础上，通过气体置换、加注、测试试验等，实现对液氢介质空间主动排气降温的测试，与现有技术相比，本发明功能全面。

invention_title.text: Emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen
一种液氢用紧急切断截止阀

extracted_name.value: 苏州纽威阀门股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides an emergency cut-off stop valve for liquid hydrogen, which comprises a valve body, a valve clack, a fixer and a sealing ring, and the valve clack is arranged in the valve body; the valve clack is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body. The fixer is connected with the bottom of the valve clack; the sealing ring is arranged between the valve clack and the fixator and is configured to protrude out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, and the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring is suitable for abutting against the side wall of a runner opening in the valve body and sealing the runner opening; the side wall depth of a flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the sealing ring protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack. The depth of the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body is larger than the width of the part, protruding out of the circumferential side of the valve clack, of the sealing ring, after the sealing ring loses efficacy due to excessive abrasion, effective sealing can still be formed through tight attaching between the valve clack and the side wall of the flow channel opening in the valve body, and liquid hydrogen medium leakage is prevented.

本实用新型提供一种液氢用紧急切断截止阀，包括阀体、阀瓣、固定器以及密封环，阀瓣设于阀体内部；阀瓣适于与阀体内部流道口侧壁抵接；固定器与阀瓣底部连接；密封环设置在阀瓣与固定器之间，密封环被配置为凸出阀瓣周侧，密封环凸出阀瓣周侧部分适于与阀体内部流道口侧壁抵接并封闭流道口；其中，阀体内部流道口侧壁深度大于密封环凸出阀瓣周侧部分宽度。通过设置阀体内部流道口侧壁深度大于密封环凸出阀瓣周侧部分宽度，在密封环由于磨损过多失效后，仍可以通过阀瓣与阀体内部流道口侧壁之间贴紧形成有效密封，防止液氢介质泄漏。

invention_title.text: Methane hydrogen regeneration olefin recovery system
一种甲烷氢再生回收烯烃系统

extracted_name.value: SHAANXI YANCHANG CHINACOAL YULIN ENERGY CHEMICAL CO LTD
陕西延长中煤榆林能源化工股份有限公司

abstract.text: The system is characterized in that the input end of a methane hydrogen heater is communicated with a demethanizer, and the output end of the methane hydrogen heater is communicated with the input end of a liquid phase dryer; the output end of the mixed C4 heater is communicated between the output end of the methane hydrogen heater and the input end of the liquid phase dryer; the output end of the gas-liquid separation tank is communicated with the input end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer; and the output end of the regenerated methane hydrogen coalescer is communicated with the input end of an external fuel pipe network. According to the utility model, a mixed C4 steam stripping process and a regenerated methane hydrogen secondary dehydration process are added, so that the water content in regenerated methane hydrogen gas is ensured to meet the requirements of receiving conditions of a fuel gas pipe network. According to the system for regenerating and recycling olefin by using methane hydrogen, disclosed by the invention, a mixed C4 and methane hydrogen medium is self-produced, so that the purpose of regenerating and recycling ethylene-propylene olefin substances by using the liquid-phase dryer is achieved, the nitrogen consumption and the torch gas emission are reduced, and the ethylene-propylene yield and the resource utilization rate are improved.

本申请公开了一种甲烷氢再生回收烯烃系统，甲烷氢加热器的输入端与脱甲烷塔连通，且其输出端与所液相干燥器的输入端连通；混合碳四加热器的输出端连通于甲烷氢加热器的输出端与液相干燥器的输入端之间；气液分离罐的输出端与再生甲烷氢聚结器的输入端连通；再生甲烷氢聚结器的输出端与外部燃料管网的输入端连通。本实用新型中增加混合碳四汽提流程和再生甲烷氢二级脱水流程，保证再生甲烷氢气体中的水含量达到燃料气管网接收条件要求。利用本申请中的甲烷氢再生回收烯烃系统自产混合碳四和甲烷氢介质，实现液相干燥器再生和回收乙烯丙烯烃类物质的目的，降低氮气用量和火炬气体排放，提升乙烯丙烯收率和资源利用率。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of graphene preparation, and provides a graphene preparation system and method.The system comprises a gas supply device, a plasma synthesis device, a gas-solid separation device, a product collection device, a tail gas separation device and a hydrogen storage device. The invention relates to a graphene preparation method, which comprises the following steps: ionizing a medium gas to generate plasma, and introducing a reaction gas to carry out a synthesis reaction; separating the reacted gas from a reaction product; settling and collecting the obtained reaction product; separating the obtained gas into hydrogen, medium gas and reaction gas; the medium gas and the reaction gas are recycled after being compressed, and the separated hydrogen is purified and stored. According to the technical scheme, the production cost is reduced, the material handling capacity is large, the productivity is high, the method is suitable for industrial application, energy consumption is low, pollution is avoided, expandability is high, and the application range is wide.

本发明涉及石墨烯制备技术领域，本发明提供一种石墨烯制备系统及方法，所述系统包括：供气装置、等离子体合成装置、气固分离装置、产物收集装置、尾气分离装置、储氢装置。一种石墨烯制备方法，包括以下步骤：使介质气体电离产生等离子体，再将通入反应气体进行合成反应；将反应后的气体和反应产物进行分离；将获得的反应产物进行沉降、收集；将获得的气体进行分离，分离为氢气、介质气体、反应气体；介质气体、反应气体分别经过压缩后循环使用，分离出的氢气进行提纯并储存。本发明的技术方案，降低了生产的成本，物料处理量大，产能高，适用于产业化应用，低能耗、无污染，可扩展性强，适用范围广。

invention_title.text: Normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen
一种用于液氢储存的常压储罐

extracted_name.value: CHONGQING NAIDE ENERGY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
重庆耐德能源装备股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides a normal-pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen. The normal-pressure storage tank comprises an inner tank made of metal and used for containing a low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, an outer tank located outside the inner tank and made of metal, a heat insulation interlayer located in an interlayer between the inner tank and the outer tank and playing a heat insulation role, and a cold shield arranged in the heat insulation interlayer. The cold shield comprises a cold shield coil pipe which is made of a metal material and is coiled in the heat insulation interlayer, the inlet end of the cold shield coil pipe is connected with a boil-off gas outlet of the gas phase space at the top of the inner tank, and the outlet end of the cold shield coil pipe penetrates through the outer tank, extends out of the outer tank and is connected with a boil-off gas recovery device. The cold shield medium entering the cold shield is liquid hydrogen evaporated gas in the inner tank, the defect of high daily evaporation rate of a liquid hydrogen low-temperature normal-pressure storage technology can be overcome without introducing an external cold source, and the operation cost of the normal-pressure storage tank is reduced.

本实用新型提出了一种用于液氢储存的常压储罐，包括由金属制成的用于盛装低温液氢介质的内罐、位于内罐外的由金属制成的外罐、位于内罐和外罐之间的夹层中的起绝热作用的绝热夹层、以及设在绝热夹层中的冷屏；冷屏包括采用金属材料制成的盘绕在绝热夹层中的冷屏盘管，冷屏盘管的入口端与内罐顶部气相空间的蒸发气出气口相连，冷屏盘管的出口端穿过外罐延伸至外罐外与蒸发气回收装置相连。本实用新型进入冷屏的冷屏介质为内罐内的液氢蒸发气，无需引入外部冷源，即可解决液氢低温常压储存技术日蒸发率高的缺点，降低该常压储罐的运行成本。

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of plate and strip production and equipment, and particularly relates to a structure and method for improving air tightness of a rapid cooling section of a continuous annealing furnace in a high-hydrogen mode, the structure comprises a sealing roller chamber shell, a roller and sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the bottom of the roller is in sealing connection with a graphite sealing gasket, and the bottom and the two ends of the graphite sealing gasket are fixed through castable; back lining plates are arranged between the two ends of the castable and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks, the positions between the back lining plates and the sealing roller chamber shell lining refractory bricks are filled with micropore heat insulation plates, and gaps of the upper end, the side wall and the bottom in the sealing roller chamber are filled with ceramic fibers. The invention mainly aims to ensure the stability of the sealing roller chamber structure of the rapid cooling section, improve the sealing performance in the roller chamber, prevent excessive hydrogen medium from overflowing to the slow cooling section and the overaging section, save the consumption of hydrogen energy and ensure the safety of a unit.

本发明属于板带生产及装备技术领域，尤其涉及一种连退炉快冷段高氢模式下提高气密性的结构及方法，包括密封辊室外壳、辊子、密封辊室外壳内衬耐火砖，所述辊子底部与石墨密封垫密封连接，石墨密封垫的底部及两端通过浇注料固定，所述浇注料的两端与密封辊室外壳内衬耐火砖之间设置有背衬板，所述背衬板与密封辊室外壳内衬耐火砖之间填充微孔绝热板，密封辊室内上端、侧壁及底部各部位的缝隙通过陶瓷纤维进行填充。本发明的主要目的是保证快冷段密封辊室结构的稳定性，并且提高辊室内的密封性，防止过量的氢气介质溢流至缓冷段和过时效段，节省氢气能源的消耗，保证机组的安全性。

invention_title.text: Medium filtering method and device based on hydrogen purity instrument
一种基于氢纯度仪上的介质过滤方法及装置

extracted_name.value: HUANENG YIMIN COAL & ELECTRICITY CO LTD
华能伊敏煤电有限责任公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses a medium filtering method and device based on a hydrogen purity instrument. The method comprises the following steps: connecting a sampling pipe to a source of a medium to be measured so as to conveniently introduce the medium; the other end of the sampling pipe is connected with the filtering device, so that the medium passes through the sampling pipe before entering the filtering device; the filtered oil mist is adsorbed and sampled through a filter element in the filtering device, and the oil mist is separated from the hydrogen medium; oil gathered in the filtering device is introduced into the oil storage tank through the drainage pipe; a pressure sensing module and an automatic oil drain valve are installed at the bottom of the oil storage tank. According to the medium filtering method and device based on the hydrogen purity instrument, on one hand, the measurement accuracy of hydrogen purity parameters is improved, a reliable basis is provided for operators to monitor and maintain the purity of hydrogen, and the operation economy and safety of a generator are guaranteed; on the other hand, the automatic oil discharging valve is adopted to achieve the automatic sewage discharging function, the daily maintenance workload is reduced, and the automation level of equipment is improved.

本发明公开了一种基于氢纯度仪上的介质过滤方法及装置，包括通过将采样管连接到待测量介质的源头方便引入介质；再将采样管的另一端与过滤装置相连，从而确保介质在进入过滤装置前经过采样管；通过过滤装置中的滤芯吸附和采样过滤中的油雾，将油雾与氢气介质分离；通过引流管将集聚在过滤装置中的油引入储油罐；在储油罐底部安装感压模块和自动排油阀。该基于氢纯度仪上的介质过滤方法及装置，一方面提高了氢纯度参数测量准确性，为运行人员监视和保持氢气的纯度提供可靠依据，保证了发电机运行经济性和安全性；另一方面采用自动排油阀实现自动排污功能，减少了日常维护工作量，提高了设备的自动化水平。

abstract.text: A storage cabin capable of storing ultralow-temperature liquid hydrogen is provided with a cylindrical inner cabin, the inner cabin is supported and fixed in an outer cabin through a filling layer, the inner cabin and the outer cabin form a filling layer space, and the filling layer space is filled with low-temperature LNG or low-temperature liquid nitrogen. The inner cabin is composed of an inner cabin outer wall and an inner cabin inner wall, the inner cabin outer wall and the inner cabin inner wall form a vacuum layer, and the vacuum layer is filled with perlite and vacuumized. A double-layer compartment is arranged, an insulating layer is laid on an outer compartment, an inner compartment is of a vacuum double-wall heat insulation structure, and the space between the inner compartment and the outer compartment is filled with LNG or liquid nitrogen with the temperature close to that of liquid hydrogen. According to the scheme, the ultralow-temperature liquid state maintenance of-163 DEG C LNG or-196 DEG C liquid ammonia medium is easily realized through a mature reliquefaction system, so that the liquid state maintenance of the ultralow-temperature-253 DEG C liquid hydrogen medium is indirectly ensured, the heat transfer between the liquid hydrogen cabin and the external environment can be greatly reduced, and the technical difficulty and the technical cost of ultralow-temperature storage of the liquid hydrogen are reduced.

一种可以存储超低温液氢的存储舱，有圆筒形内舱，内舱通过填注层支撑固定在外舱内部，内舱与外舱形成填注层空间，填注层空间内填充有低温LNG或低温液氮。内舱由内舱外壁和内舱内壁组成，内舱外壁与内舱内壁形成真空层，真空层内填注珍珠岩并抽真空。本发明采用双层隔舱设置，外舱敷设绝缘层，内舱采用真空双壁绝热结构，内外舱之间充装与液氢温度较为接近的LNG或液氮，考虑到直接对液氢实现液体状态维持技术难度高、耗能大，本方案通过成熟的再液化系统轻松实现对‑163℃LNG或‑196℃液氨介质的超低温液体状态维护，从而间接保证超低温‑253℃液氢介质的液体状态维持，可大大降低液氢舱与外部环境之间的热量传递，降低液氢超低温存储技术难度和技术成本。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a high-temperature solid hydrogen storage and SOEC coupling hydrogen production and storage integrated system and method. The system comprises a water supply device, and the end of the water supply device is connected with a suction device; one end of the recovery device is connected with the suction device, and the other end is connected with a reaction device; the SOEC electrolytic reactor is connected with the reaction device, the SOEC electrolytic reactor comprises an anode end and a cathode end, and the anode end is connected with the recovery device; one end of the air delivery device is mounted between the reaction device and the SOEC electrolytic reactor, and the other end of the air delivery device is connected with a hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device; the first end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the hydrogen high-temperature heat recovery device, the second end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with the reaction device, the third end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a condenser, the fourth end of the hydrogen medium-temperature heat recoverer is connected with a dryer, and the condenser is connected with the dryer. Medium-temperature and high-temperature heat energy released in the hydrogen storage process of the high-temperature metal hydride is recycled through the heat recycling device and used for producing high-temperature superheated steam needed by SOEC electrolysis, and the good heat and mass synergistic effect is achieved on the whole.

本发明公开了一种高温固态储氢与SOEC耦合制储氢一体化系统及方法，包括供水装置，其端部连接有抽吸装置；回收装置，一端与抽吸装置连接，另一端连接有反应装置；SOEC电解堆，与反应装置连接，SOEC电解堆包括阳极端和阴极端，阳极端与回收装置连接；风量输送装置，一端安装于反应装置与SOEC电解堆之间，另一端连接有氢气高温热回收装置；氢气中温热回收器，氢气中温热回收器的第一端与氢气高温热回收装置连接，第二端与反应装置连接，第三端连接有冷凝器，第四端连接有干燥器，冷凝器与干燥器连接。通过热量回收装置回收高温金属氢化物储氢过程中释放的中、高温热能，用于生产SOEC电解所需的高温过热蒸汽，整体实现了很好的热质协同效果。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a vacuum multi-layer heat insulation liquid hydrogen container and a using method, the vacuum multi-layer heat insulation liquid hydrogen container comprises a liquid hydrogen storage tank outer tank and a liquid hydrogen storage tank inner tank located in the liquid hydrogen storage tank outer tank, and a nitrogen heat insulation structure, a methane gas heat insulation structure, a carbon dioxide heat insulation structure and a radiation heat insulation structure are sequentially arranged between the liquid hydrogen storage tank outer tank and the liquid hydrogen storage tank inner tank from inside to outside. According to the liquid hydrogen storage tank, efficient heat insulation of the liquid hydrogen storage tank and gradient utilization of the evaporation gas cooling capacity are comprehensively achieved through the liquid hydrogen evaporation gas cooling capacity and the multiple heat insulation layers internally filled with gas with different freezing point temperatures, meanwhile, the different heat insulation layers are isolated from one another, and the problem that the vacuum degree of a traditional liquid hydrogen storage tank is prone to damage is solved. The functions of the nitrogen heat insulation layer, the methane gas heat insulation layer, the carbon dioxide heat insulation layer and the radiation heat insulation layer can be regulated and controlled through corresponding valves, so that the liquid hydrogen storage tank has heat insulation regulation capacity, application scenes with different evaporation rate requirements can be effectively met, and emergency discharge of a hydrogen medium in the liquid hydrogen storage tank is achieved in some specific scenes.

本发明公开了一种真空多层绝热液氢容器及使用方法，包括液氢储罐外罐和位于其内的液氢储罐内罐，所述液氢储罐外罐和液氢储罐内罐之间由内至外依次设置有氮气绝热结构、甲烷气绝热结构、二氧化碳绝热结构和辐射绝热结构。本发明利用液氢蒸发气冷量和内部充注不同凝固点温度的气体的多层绝热层，综合实现液氢储罐的高效绝热和蒸发气冷量梯级利用，同时不同绝热层之间相互隔绝，避免传统液氢储罐真空度易破坏的问题。氮气绝热层、甲烷气绝热层、二氧化碳绝热层、辐射绝热层的功能可通过对应的阀门进行调控，所以液氢储罐具有绝热调节能力，能够有效满足不同蒸发率需求的应用场景，并且在某些特定场景实现液氢储罐内部氢介质的紧急排放。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a safety monitoring method and equipment of a vehicle-mounted hydrogen storage system and a storage medium, the vehicle-mounted hydrogen storage system comprises a hydrogen in-pile stop valve, a hydrogen discharge valve, a hydrogen storage bottle, a pressure reducing valve and a hydrogen medium-pressure sensor, and the hydrogen medium-pressure sensor, the pressure reducing valve and the hydrogen in-pile stop valve are sequentially arranged on a pipeline between the hydrogen storage bottle and a fuel cell stack; the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first opening and closing state of a hydrogen inlet pile stop valve, a second opening and closing state of the hydrogen discharge valve and medium-pressure pressure detected by a hydrogen medium-pressure sensor; determining a fault level threshold according to the first opening and closing state and the second opening and closing state; and determining the fault level of the medium-pressure pressure according to the medium-pressure pressure and the fault level threshold. The fault level is judged by combining the opening and closing states of the hydrogen reactor inlet stop valve and the hydrogen discharge valve, so that the misjudgment and false alarm of the medium-pressure pressure fault under different operation conditions can be effectively avoided, and the accuracy of safety monitoring is improved.

本申请公开了一种车载储氢系统的安全监测方法、设备及存储介质，车载储氢系统包括氢气进堆截止阀、排氢阀、储氢瓶、减压阀和氢气中压传感器，氢气中压传感器、减压阀和氢气进堆截止阀依次设置于储氢瓶至燃料电池电堆之间的管路上，排氢阀设置于燃料电池电堆的排气口，该方法包括：获取氢气进堆截止阀的第一开合状态、排氢阀的第二开合状态和氢气中压传感器检测的中压压力；根据第一开合状态和第二开合状态，确定故障等级阈值；根据中压压力和故障等级阈值，确定中压压力的故障等级。其中，通过结合氢气进堆截止阀和排氢阀的开合状态判断故障等级，能有效避免不同操作条件下对中压压力故障的误判和误报，提高了安全监测的准确性。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen conveying centrifugal pump which comprises a rotor assembly, an inner shell assembly and an outer shell assembly. The rotor assembly is sleeved in the inner shell assembly to form a core; and the core is sleeved in the outer shell assembly. A multi-stage centrifugal pump structure is adopted for conveying a liquid hydrogen medium, and a three-stage centrifugal wheel with long blades, middle blades and short blades, a radial inlet annular inlet shell, a combined inter-stage overflowing structure with radial guide blades and reverse guide blades and a combined sealing structure with static sealing, end face sealing and blow-off isolation sealing are adopted. By adopting a mounting mode which is compact in structure and convenient to disassemble, the liquid hydrogen medium can be transferred from an offshore transport ship to a storage tank, from the storage tank to the storage tank, from the storage tank to a tank car and the like; the whole structure is simple, and disassembly, assembly, disassembly and replacement are convenient; and the technical blank is filled.

本发明公开了一种液氢输送离心泵，包括：转子组件、内壳体组件和外壳体组件；转子组件套装在内壳体组件内，构成芯子；芯子套装在外壳体组件内。采用多级离心泵结构进行液氢介质的输送，采用带有“长叶片+中叶片+短叶片”的三级离心轮，径向进的环形进口壳体，“径向导叶+反导叶”的组合级间过流结构，“静密封+端面密封”并带吹除隔离密封的组合密封结构，采用结构紧凑、便于拆卸的安装方式，可实现液氢介质从海上运输船到贮箱、从贮箱到贮箱、从贮箱到槽车等的转运；整体结构简单，便于拆装、分解、更换；填补了技术空白。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of fuel cell control, and particularly provides a fuel cell hydrogen medium pressure control method, system and device.The method comprises the steps that a current hydrogen medium pressure fluctuation value of a hydrogen system in the hydrogen discharging process is obtained; and under the condition that the current hydrogen medium pressure fluctuation value does not meet the preset condition, the hydrogen supply hydrogen pressure in the hydrogen system is controlled. According to the fuel cell hydrogen medium-pressure control method, after the opening degree of the electric control pressure reducing valve is controlled by using the electric signal, three-valve linkage is carried out between the hydrogen discharging electromagnetic valve and the hydrogen inlet proportional valve based on the pressure reducing valve and the hydrogen system, so that the hydrogen system can adaptively control and reduce hydrogen medium-pressure fluctuation through the opening degree of the pressure reducing valve; therefore, the stable control of the medium pressure of the hydrogen in the hydrogen discharging process of the fuel cell is better realized.

本发明涉及燃料电池控制技术领域，具体提供一种燃料电池氢气中压控制方法、系统及装置，其中，方法包括：获取氢气系统在排氢过程中的当前氢中压波动值；在所述当前氢中压波动值不满足预设条件的情况下，对所述氢气系统中的供氢氢气压力进行控制。本申请的燃料电池氢气中压控制方法使用电信号控制电控减压阀的开度后，通过基于减压阀和氢气系统的排氢电磁阀、进氢比例阀之间进行三阀联动，使得能够使氢气系统通过减压阀开度适应控制降低氢气中压波动，从而更好地实现了燃料电池在排氢过程中的氢气中压压力的稳定控制。

液氢低温截止阀

extracted_name.value: 方正阀门集团股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of valves, in particular to a liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve which comprises a valve body, a valve clack and a valve rod connected with the valve clack, a medium channel is arranged in the valve body, the valve body is connected with a valve cover, the liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve further comprises a vacuum jacket arranged on the outer side of the valve body, and a flange plate extends from one end, close to the valve cover, of the valve body. One end of the vacuum jacket is connected with the flange plate, the other end of the vacuum jacket is connected with the outer wall, corresponding to the medium channel, of the valve body, a vacuum cavity is formed between the vacuum jacket and the valve body, and a first screw plug communicated with the vacuum cavity is arranged at the end, close to the medium channel, of the vacuum jacket. The outer side of the valve body is connected with the vacuum jacket, so that a vacuum state is formed between the vacuum jacket and the valve body, heat exchange between the outer wall of the valve and air is reduced to the maximum extent, heat loss is fully reduced, cooling time is shortened, and a liquid hydrogen medium can be stably conveyed at low temperature.

本实用新型涉及阀门技术领域，尤其是涉及一种液氢低温截止阀，包括阀体、阀瓣以及与阀瓣连接的阀杆，所述阀体内部设有介质通道，所述阀体连接有阀盖，还包括有设置于阀体外侧的真空夹套，所述阀体靠近阀盖的一端延伸有法兰盘，所述真空夹套一端与法兰盘连接且另一端与阀体对应介质通道处的外壁连接，所述真空夹套与阀体之间形成一个真空腔，所述真空夹套靠近介质通道处的端部设有连通真空腔的第一螺塞，本实用新型具有隔热结构，即在阀体外侧连接真空夹套，使真空夹套与阀体之间形成真空状态，最大限度减少阀门外壁与空气的热量交换，充分减少热量损失并缩短冷却时间，能够稳定、低温输送液氢介质。

invention_title.text: Normal pressure storage tank for storing liquid hydrogen
用于液氢储存的常压储罐

extracted_name.value: CHONGQING NAIDE ENERGY EQUIPMENT INTEGRATION CO LTD
重庆耐德能源装备集成有限公司

abstract.text: The invention provides a normal pressure storage tank for liquid hydrogen storage. The normal pressure storage tank comprises an inner tank made of metal and used for containing a low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, an outer tank located outside the inner tank and made of metal, a heat insulation interlayer located in an interlayer between the inner tank and the outer tank and playing a heat insulation role, and a cold shield arranged in the heat insulation interlayer. The cold shield comprises a cold shield coil pipe which is made of a metal material and is coiled in the heat insulation interlayer, the inlet end of the cold shield coil pipe is connected with a boil-off gas outlet of the gas phase space at the top of the inner tank, and the outlet end of the cold shield coil pipe penetrates through the outer tank, extends out of the outer tank and is connected with a boil-off gas recovery device. The cold shield medium entering the cold shield is the liquid hydrogen evaporation gas in the inner tank, the defect that the daily evaporation rate of the liquid hydrogen low-temperature normal-pressure storage technology is high can be overcome without introducing an external cold source, and the operation cost of the normal-pressure storage tank is reduced.

本发明提出了一种用于液氢储存的常压储罐，包括由金属制成的用于盛装低温液氢介质的内罐、位于内罐外的由金属制成的外罐、位于内罐和外罐之间的夹层中的起绝热作用的绝热夹层、以及设在绝热夹层中的冷屏；冷屏包括采用金属材料制成的盘绕在绝热夹层中的冷屏盘管，冷屏盘管的入口端与内罐顶部气相空间的蒸发气出气口相连，冷屏盘管的出口端穿过外罐延伸至外罐外与蒸发气回收装置相连。本发明进入冷屏的冷屏介质为内罐内的液氢蒸发气，无需引入外部冷源，即可解决液氢低温常压储存技术日蒸发率高的缺点，降低该常压储罐的运行成本。

invention_title.text: Gaseous hydrogen medium-pressure direct injection nozzle cap
一种气态氢气中压直喷喷嘴帽

extracted_name.value: 广西玉柴机器股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a gaseous hydrogen medium-pressure direct injection nozzle cap which comprises an expansion section, a compression section and a transition section connected with the expansion section and the compression section, and an inner cavity which becomes larger and smaller from top to bottom is formed. Wherein the expansion section is connected to the upper end of the transition section, and the joint between the expansion section and the transition section is of a gradually open structure, so that the flow area is increased; the upper end of the compression section is connected to the lower end of the transition section, and the flow area is gradually reduced from top to bottom; the transition section is equal in diameter, so that the diameter of the outlet of the expansion section is equal to that of the outlet of the transition section and is d. The nozzle cap has the advantages of simple structure, capability of effectively reducing the downstream hydrogen flow rate of the nozzle cap and reducing the impact of hydrogen on the wall surface of a cylinder sleeve, and the like.

本实用新型公开了一种气态氢气中压直喷喷嘴帽，所述喷嘴帽包括膨胀段和压缩段，以及连接所述膨胀段和压缩段的过渡段，形成自上而下的由小变大再变小的内腔；其中，所述膨胀段连接于过渡段的上端，膨胀段到过渡段的结合处为逐渐敞开的结构，使得其流通面积得到增加；所述压缩段的上端连接于过渡段的下端，其自上而下的流通面积逐渐减小；所述过渡段为等直径，使得膨胀段的出口和过渡段的出口直径相等，为d。本实用新型具有结构简单、能够有效降低喷嘴帽下游氢气流速，降低氢气对气缸套壁面冲击等优点。

invention_title.text: Preparation method of high-molecular rubber sealing product with high-pressure hydrogen permeation resistance
一种耐高压氢渗性能的高分子橡胶密封制品制备方法

extracted_name.value: ANHUI TONGFENG RUBBER & PLASTIC IND CO LTD
安徽同丰橡塑工业有限公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses a preparation method of a polymer rubber sealing product with high-pressure hydrogen permeation resistance, and relates to the technical field of rubber sealing, and the preparation method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining plasticated rubber; s2, obtaining a rubber compound; and S3, putting the rubber compound obtained in the step S2 on a vulcanizing machine for pre-vulcanization, and performing thin passing for three times and secondary vulcanization to obtain the rubber material, the polymer rubber sealing product with high-pressure hydrogen permeation resistance can be applied to various industrial fields, and particularly plays an important role in high-temperature and high-pressure occasions. In the field of hydrogen energy, hydrogen is extremely small in molecule, high in activity and easy to permeate into a plurality of materials, so that preparation raw materials of the rubber sealing product are greatly improved and the dosage is optimized, and the prepared rubber sealing product not only has excellent chemical resistance and high-temperature resistance, but also has excellent mechanical property and high-temperature resistance. And in a high-pressure hydrogen medium environment, the composite material also has good airtight performance and high-pressure hydrogen permeation resistance.

本发明公开了一种耐高压氢渗性能的高分子橡胶密封制品制备方法，涉及橡胶密封技术领域，包括以下步骤：S1得到塑炼胶；S2得到混炼胶；S3将步骤S2得到的混炼胶置于硫化机上进行预硫化，经过薄通3次，二次硫化，即得；本发明制备的耐高压氢渗性能的高分子橡胶密封制品能够应用于各种工业领域，特别是在高温、高压的场合中发挥着重要作用。在氢能源领域，由于氢气的分子极小且活性高，容易渗透到许多材料中，因此，本发明通过对橡胶密封制品制备原料进行了大幅度的改进与用量优化，从而使得所制成的橡胶密封制品不仅具有优异的耐化学性和耐高温性能，同时，在高压氢气介质环境下，还具备良好的气密性能和耐高压氢渗透能力。

abstract.text: The invention discloses an ortho-parahydrogen conversion test system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen liquefaction. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen pipeline, a liquid nitrogen pipeline, a test hydrogen pipeline and a standard hydrogen pipeline, the liquid hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with a liquid hydrogen storage tank, a liquid hydrogen regulating valve, a liquid hydrogen temperature zone cooler, an intermediate cooler and a hydrogen temperature sensor; the liquid nitrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with a liquid nitrogen storage tank, a liquid nitrogen regulating valve, a liquid nitrogen temperature zone cooler, an intermediate cooler and a liquid nitrogen temperature sensor; the test hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with the hydrogen cylinder, the test hydrogen valve, the ortho-parahydrogen conversion tester and the gas chromatograph, the test hydrogen pipeline is further connected with a standard hydrogen pipeline, and the standard hydrogen pipeline is sequentially connected with the standard hydrogen valve and the gas chromatograph. The continuous gradient temperature from the liquid nitrogen temperature zone to the liquid hydrogen temperature zone in the hydrogen liquefaction system is provided through cooperative matching of the liquid nitrogen medium and the liquid hydrogen medium, the true application environment simulation of the ortho-parahydrogen catalyst is achieved, and the device structure and the operation process are simplified.

本发明公开了一种正仲氢转化测试系统及方法，涉及氢气液化技术领域。系统包括液氢管路、液氮管路、测试氢气管路和标准氢气管路；液氢管路依次连接液氢储罐、液氢调节阀、液氢温区冷却器、中间冷却器和氢气温度传感器；液氮管路依次连接液氮储罐、液氮调节阀、液氮温区冷却器、中间冷却器和液氮温度传感器；测试氢气管路依次连接氢气瓶、测试氢气阀、正仲氢转化测试器和气相色谱仪，测试氢气管路上还连接有标准氢气管路，标准氢气管路依次连接标准氢气阀和气相色谱仪。本发明利用液氮介质和液氢介质协同匹配提供氢液化系统中液氮温区到液氢温区的连续渐变温度，实现正仲氢催化剂真实应用环境模拟，并简化装置结构和运行流程。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen leakage diffusion safety protection system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen medium safety utilization. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen plant top, a liquid hydrogen plant wall and a liquid hydrogen plant bottom which are sequentially connected from top to bottom and form a sealed house body structure; a vertical discharge channel is formed in the top of the liquid hydrogen plant; an anti-explosion exhaust fan is arranged at the bottom of the vertical discharge channel, and a heater is arranged in the circumferential The front end of the low-temperature nitrogen pipeline is located outside the sealed room body structure and sequentially connected with a liquid nitrogen storage box, a liquid nitrogen valve and a liquid nitrogen vaporizer, and the rear end of the low-temperature nitrogen pipeline is located below the sealed bottom plate in the sealed room body structure and connected with the array type purging device. Low-temperature nitrogen and a heater are arranged at different heights, the chimney effect is formed in closed or semi-closed spaces such as a liquid hydrogen plant, leaked liquid hydrogen is rapidly treated by comprehensively utilizing the density difference and the temperature difference of liquid hydrogen vaporization, meanwhile, the array type purging device is used for preventing liquid hydrogen from flowing and diffusing, and the influence range of liquid hydrogen leakage is reduced.

本发明公开了一种液氢泄漏扩散安全防护系统及方法，涉及液氢介质安全利用技术领域。系统包括由上至下依次连接并构成密封式房体结构的液氢厂房顶部、液氢厂房围墙和液氢厂房底部；液氢厂房顶部上开设有竖直排放通道；竖直排放通道底部设有防爆排气扇，周向设有加热器；低温氮气管路的前端位于密封式房体结构外部且依次连接有液氮储箱、液氮阀和液氮汽化器，后端位于密封式房体结构内部的密封式底板下方且与阵列式吹扫装置相连。本发明利用在不同高度设置低温氮气和加热器，在液氢厂房等封闭或半封闭空间形成烟囱效应，综合利用液氢汽化的密度差和温度差对泄漏液氢快速处理，同时利用阵列式吹扫装置防止液氢流动扩散，减小液氢泄漏的影响范围。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a fast-response liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen-air fuel cells. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen storage tank, an air temperature box, a temperature control heat exchanger and a fuel cell. The high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is used as a supplement when the hydrogen elimination amount of the system is sharply increased, the high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is located in the air temperature box, the high-pressure hydrogen cylinder is cooled through gasification heat of low-temperature liquid hydrogen, the hydrogen filling amount can be effectively increased, and the adverse factor of overheating in the high-pressure hydrogen filling process can be overcome. The liquid hydrogen medium is heated step by step through the air temperature box and the temperature control heat exchanger, more evaporation heat is cooled by the air temperature box, less sensible heat is cooled by the temperature control heat exchanger with the adjustable power, and the energy utilization efficiency and the temperature control precision of the system can be effectively improved. In addition, the high-pressure hydrogen pipeline and the liquid hydrogen pipeline are arranged in parallel and are provided with regulating valves for regulating the flow of gaseous hydrogen fuel, so that the regulation dimension of the system can be increased, and the control capability of hydrogen fuel pressure and flow information can be enhanced.

本发明公开了一种快响应的液氢储供系统及方法，涉及氢空燃料电池技术领域。系统包括液氢储罐、空温箱、控温换热器和燃料电池。本发明利用高压氢气瓶作为系统消氢量急剧提升时的补充，且高压氢气瓶位于空温箱内部，利用低温液氢的气化热对其进行冷却，能够有效提升氢气充注量并克服高压氢气充注过程的过热不利因素。液氢介质通过空温箱和控温换热器进行逐级加热，其中占比较多的汽化热由空温箱冷却，而占比较小的显热由功率可调的控温换热器冷却，能够有效提升系统的能量利用效率和控温精度。此外，高压氢气管路和液氢管路并联设置，且均设置调节气态氢燃料流量的调节阀，可以增加系统调控维度，强化氢燃料压力、流量信息的控制能力。

invention_title.text: Soft cold shield liquid hydrogen filling system and method
一种软冷屏液氢加注系统及方法

extracted_name.value: 北京航天试验技术研究所

abstract.text: The invention discloses a soft cold shield liquid hydrogen filling system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen supply tank and a liquid hydrogen filling tank, in the liquid hydrogen storage stage, a medium in a cold shield is promoted to be converted into a solid state from a liquid state through the cold capacity of evaporated low-temperature hydrogen, cold energy storage is achieved, and the heat insulation performance of the liquid hydrogen storage tank can be improved; in the filling stage, a liquid hydrogen medium in the liquid hydrogen storage tank is emptied, and the medium in the open type cold shield is gradually converted into a liquid state from a solid state, so that the tank body is always kept in a low-temperature state, and the time required by subsequent pre-cooling operation is shortened; by means of the designed S-shaped capillary connector, a small part of liquefied high-density media and low-density media enter the inner tank to be vaporized under the condition that the heat insulation capacity is not affected, the micro-positive pressure of the inner tank of the liquid hydrogen filling tank is maintained, meanwhile, the low-density media and the high-density media are sequentially arranged from top to bottom, vaporized gas can be layered, and the heat insulation capacity of the liquid hydrogen filling tank is improved. And external air is effectively prevented from entering, and the time required by subsequent replacement operation is shortened.

本发明公开了一种软冷屏液氢加注系统及方法，涉及液氢技术领域。系统包括液氢供给罐和液氢加注罐，在液氢存储阶段，利用蒸发低温氢气的冷量促使冷屏内部的介质由液态转化为固态，实现冷能的存储并且可以提升液氢储罐的绝热性能；在加注阶段，液氢储罐内部的液氢介质已排空，开式冷屏中的介质逐渐由固态转化为液态，使罐体一直维持低温状态，减小后续预冷操作所需的时间；利用设计的S型毛细连接器，使少部分液化高密度介质及低密度介质在不影响绝热能力的情况下，进入内罐汽化，维持液氢加注罐内罐微正压，同时自上而下依次设置低密度介质和高密度介质，还可使汽化后的气体分层，有效防止外部空气进入，减少后续置换操作所需的时间。

invention_title.text: Liquid hydrogen vaporization system and method
一种液氢汽化系统及方法

extracted_name.value: 北京航天试验技术研究所

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen vaporization system and method, and relates to the technical field of liquid hydrogen. The system comprises a liquid hydrogen pressurization pipeline, a liquid hydrogen tank, a liquid hydrogen supply pipeline, a flat vaporizer, an air pipeline, a water pipeline and a liquid carbon dioxide pipeline. Through a transient pressurization method, a liquid hydrogen medium is in a supercooled state temporarily, the boiling state of liquid hydrogen in the flat vaporizer is eliminated, the metering precision of a liquid level meter is enhanced, and the liquid level regulation and control capacity of the liquid hydrogen is improved; the vertical fins of the flat plate vaporizer are divided into a plurality of groups of heat exchange temperature areas from top to bottom, so that gas components corresponding to different temperature areas are only liquefied and are not solidified, flow channels are not broken under the action of gravity, a liquid film is prevented from being generated, the heat exchange capacity of the vertical fins is greatly improved, and the frosting problem of a conventional liquid hydrogen vaporizer is solved. Meanwhile, the liquid hydrogen medium side and the vertical fin side of the flat vaporizer can maintain a stable heat exchange state; and liquefied liquid water and liquid carbon dioxide are collected, so that the method has relatively high environment-friendly application potential.

本发明公开了一种液氢汽化系统及方法，涉及液氢技术领域。系统包括液氢增压管路、液氢罐、液氢供给管路、平板汽化器、空气管路、水管路、液态二氧化碳管路。本发明通过瞬态增压方法，使液氢介质短暂处于过冷状态，消除平板汽化器中液氢沸腾状态，强化液位计的计量精度，提升液氢液位调控能力；平板汽化器的竖直翅片自上而下划分成多组换热温区，使不同温区对应的气体组分只液化不凝固，并且在重力的作用下不断流道，避免液膜的产生，大幅改善竖直翅片的换热能力，解决常规液氢汽化器结霜问题，同时平板汽化器的液氢介质侧和竖直翅片侧均可以维持稳定换热状态；对液化后的液态水和液态二氧化碳进行收集，具有较强的环保应用潜力。

invention_title.text: Electrolyte for Lithium Secondary Battery and Lithium Secondary Battery Containing the Same
리튬 이차전지 전해액 및 이를 포함하는 리튬 이차전지

abstract.text: An object of the present invention is to provide an electrolyte for a secondary battery capable of improving high-temperature storage characteristics and high-temperature lifespan characteristics of a lithium secondary battery, and a secondary battery including the same. The electrolyte for a lithium secondary battery of the present invention comprises: a lithium salt; an organic solvent; and a sulfonyl-based compound represented by chemical formula 1. In the chemical formula 1, R1 and R2 are independently selected from hydrogen, medium and small hydrogen, and a substituted or non-substituted C1-C4 alkyl group. The present invention can remarkably improve the high-temperature storage characteristics and the high-temperature lifespan characteristics of a battery due to a decrease in a thickness change rate and a decrease in a DCIR change rate when the battery is stored at high temperature. In addition, the electrolyte of the present invention can improve low-temperature output characteristics of the battery.
본 발명은 리튬 이차전지 전해액에 및 이를 포함한 리튬 이차전지에 대한 것으로, 화학식 1의 설포닐계 화합물을 포함함으로써 고온 저장 특성 및 고온 수명을 현저히 향상시킨 리튬 이차전지 전해엑에 대한 것이다.

abstract.text: The invention discloses a high-strength pipeline steel plate suitable for a hydrogen conveying pipeline and a manufacturing method, and belongs to the technical field of metal materials. The manufacturing method comprises the following steps: manufacturing a casting blank; the casting blank is subjected to rough rolling and finish rolling, and a finish-rolled steel plate is obtained; the upper surface of the finish-rolled steel plate is cooled through large-flow water spraying, the lower surface of the finish-rolled steel plate is cooled through compressed air or mist spraying or naturally cooled in air, the cooling speed of the upper surface is larger than that of the lower surface, the strength of the upper surface is larger than that of the lower surface, and the high-strength pipeline steel plate is obtained. The strength of the high-strength pipeline steel plate in the thickness direction is different, the upper strength of the steel plate is high, and the pipeline wall thickness is reduced; the lower part of the steel plate is low in strength, so that the influence degree of conveying medium hydrogen on the brittleness and fatigue life of the material is reduced, the loading capacity of the high-strength material is ensured, and the harmfulness of the hydrogen medium is reduced.

本发明公开了一种适用于输氢管道的高强度管线钢板及制造方法，属于金属材料技术领域。所述制造方法包括以下步骤：制做铸坯；将所述铸坯进行粗轧、精轧，得到精轧钢板；将所述精轧钢板的上表面采用大流量喷水冷却，所述精轧钢板的下表面进行压缩空气冷却、喷雾冷却或空气中自然冷却，所述上表面的冷却的速度大于下表面的冷却的速度，所述上表面的强度大于下表面的强度，得到高强度管线钢板。所述高强度管线钢板沿厚度方向强度存在差异，钢板上部强度高，降低管道壁厚；所述钢板下部强度低，降低输送介质氢对材料脆性和疲劳寿命的影响程度，既保证了高强度材料的承压能力，又将氢介质的危害性降低。

invention_title.text: Hydrogen purification method and purification device for removing carbon monoxide by using molecular sieve
一种使用分子筛脱除一氧化碳的氢气提纯方法及提纯装置

extracted_name.value: JIANGSU CHANGQING TECH ENGINEERING RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
江苏常氢科技工程研究院有限公司

abstract.text: The invention relates to a hydrogen purification method for removing carbon monoxide by using a molecular sieve, which adopts a purification device to carry out carbon monoxide removal on input hydrogen containing carbon monoxide. The purification method comprises the following steps: S1, nitrogen replacement: when the purity of gas-phase nitrogen is detected to be greater than 99.5% by a gas sampling analyzer AI, opening a valve IV to perform emptying, wherein the purity of the gas-phase nitrogen is detected to be greater than 99.5% by a gas output from an output port of a reactor; s2, starting a heater for heating to activate the molecular sieve; s3, primary purification; and S4, secondary purification: when the gas output from the output port of the reactor detects that the purity of gas-phase hydrogen is greater than 99.99% and the content of carbon monoxide is less than or equal to 0.2 mu mol/mol through a gas sampling analyzer AI, the purified hydrogen is output from a hydrogen output pipeline through a valve II. The device is suitable for deep removal of carbon monoxide in a gas-phase hydrogen medium, and the output hydrogen meets the requirement that the content of impurity carbon monoxide is less than or equal to 0.2 mu mol/mol for hydrogen for a fuel cell.

本发明涉及一种使用分子筛脱除一氧化碳的氢气提纯方法，采用提纯装置对输入的含有一氧化碳的氢气进行一氧化碳脱除，所述提纯方法包括如下步骤：S1、氮气置换：当反应器输出口输出的气体经气体取样分析器AI检测到气相氮气纯度＞99.5％时，打开阀门四进行排空；S2、启动加热器加热，使得分子筛活化；S3、初步提纯；S4、二次提纯：当反应器输出口输出的气体经气体取样分析器AI检测到气相氢气纯度＞99.99％，一氧化碳含量≤0.2μmol/mol时，提纯后氢气经阀门二从氢气输出管道输出。本发明适用于气相氢气介质中深度脱一氧化碳，输出的氢气达到燃料电池用氢对杂质一氧化碳含量≤0.2μmol/mol的要求。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of valve testing and performance detection, in particular to a liquid hydrogen regulating valve testing device and a testing method thereof.The liquid hydrogen regulating valve testing device comprises a liquid hydrogen pipeline, a liquid hydrogen storage tank, a first liquid hydrogen valve, a heat insulation box and a testing regulating valve. According to the device, the supercooled liquid hydrogen is prepared through the low-temperature vacuum unit, and the liquid hydrogen passing through the test regulating valve is cooled, so that gas-liquid two-phase flow is prevented from being generated; high-pressure hydrogen generated by vaporization of part of liquid hydrogen is used for regulating and testing internal pressure in front of and behind the regulating valve in a transient state, the liquid hydrogen is converted into a non-equilibrium state from an equilibrium state, and the supercooling degree of the liquid hydrogen is further increased; supercharged gas of the liquid hydrogen storage tank is low-temperature hydrogen subjected to a supercooled liquid hydrogen bath, so that the temperature of the liquid hydrogen in the liquid hydrogen storage tank can be effectively prevented from rising, and the possibility of vaporization of the liquid hydrogen is reduced from the source; the rear end of the device adopts the parallel hydrogen flow meter with high accuracy to indirectly test the liquid hydrogen flow under the working condition of small opening of the test regulating valve, so that the consumption of a liquid hydrogen medium can be effectively reduced, and the overall accuracy of the test is improved.

本发明涉及阀门测试与性能检测技术领域，尤其涉及一种液氢调节阀测试装置及其测试方法,其包括液氢管路、液氢储罐、第一液氢阀、绝热箱、测试调节阀。本发明中，通过低温真空机组制备过冷液氢，并对通过测试调节阀后的液氢进行冷却，防止产生气液两相流；利用部分液氢汽化产生的高压氢气瞬态调控测试调节阀前后的内部压力，将液氢由平衡态转化为非平衡态，进一步增加液氢过冷度；液氢储罐的增压气为经过过冷液氢浴的低温氢气，可有效防止液氢储罐内部的液氢温度升高，从源头降低液氢汽化的可能；装置后端采用准确度较高的并联式氢气流量计对测试调节阀小开度工况下的液氢流量进行间接测试，可有效减小液氢介质的消耗，提升测试的整体准确度。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of valve testing and performance detection, in particular to a multi-state liquid hydrogen valve testing device and a testing method thereof.The multi-state liquid hydrogen valve testing device comprises a helium pressurizing pipeline, a high-pressure helium tank, a helium switching valve, a first helium pressure reducing valve, a first helium stop valve and a first pressure sensor. According to the invention, by regulating and controlling the temperature and pressure parameters of the liquid hydrogen medium before and after the liquid hydrogen medium flows through the test valve, the test of various complex working conditions such as supercritical hydrogen, supercooled hydrogen, transcritical hydrogen and the like can be realized besides a conventional saturated state; by adjusting the flow of liquid hydrogen before and after flowing through the test valve, the test of two working conditions of stable flow and fluctuating flow can be realized; and meanwhile, the helium mass spectrometer, the flowmeter and other devices are arranged, so that the testing contents of inner leakage, outer leakage and the like of the valve can be effectively realized. Generally speaking, the device not only can realize the conventional test of the liquid hydrogen valve, but also can realize various complex content tests, has the advantages of simple structure, convenience in operation and the like, and is beneficial to popularization and application.

本发明涉及阀门测试与性能检测技术领域，尤其涉及一种多状态液氢阀门测试装置及其测试方法,其包括氦增压管路、高压氦气瓶、氦气开关阀、第一氦气减压阀、第一氦气截止阀、第一压力传感器。本发明中，通过对流经测试阀门前后液氢介质温度和压力参数的调控，除常规饱和态外，还可实现超临界氢、过冷态氢、跨临界氢等多种复杂工况的测试；通过对流经测试阀门前后液氢流量的调节，可以实现稳定流动和波动流动两种工况的测试；同时通过设置的氦质谱仪、流量计等装置，可以有效实现阀门内漏、外漏等测试内容。综合而言，本装置不但可以实现液氢阀门的常规测试，还可以实现多种复杂内容测试，同时具备结构简单，操作便捷等优点，有利于推广应用。

invention_title.text: High-pressure ferrule joint for hydrogen medium
用于氢气介质的高压卡套接头

extracted_name.value: 镇江禹成机电有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a high-pressure ferrule joint for hydrogen medium, which is applied to the field of ferrule joints and comprises a ferrule joint, a medium channel is arranged in the ferrule joint, two limiting blocks are embedded in the medium channel, and flexible parts are bolted on the sides, far away from each other, of the two limiting blocks; through the arrangement of the first threaded seat and the second threaded seat, after the nut is in threaded connection with the clamping head, the first threaded seat is in threaded connection with the clamping head, the second threaded seat is in threaded connection with the nut, and the nut is tightened in the opposite direction of the nut through the first threaded seat and the second threaded seat; the nut is prevented from loosening under high pressure; the strength of the flexible part is improved by arranging the limiting block in the clamping connector, after the flexible part makes contact with the pipeline through the toughness of the flexible part, the pipeline is pushed tightly, the flexible part deforms, the end face of the pipeline which is cut unevenly can be wrapped, and therefore the sealing performance after the pipeline is installed is improved.

本实用新型公开了用于氢气介质的高压卡套接头，应用在卡套接头领域，包括卡接头，所述卡接头的内部开设有介质通道，所述介质通道的内部内嵌有两个限位块，两个所述限位块相互远离的一侧均栓接有柔性件；本实用新型通过设置第一螺纹座和第二螺纹座，在螺母和卡接头螺纹连接后，再通过第一螺纹座和卡接头螺纹连接，第二螺纹座和螺母螺纹连接，利用第一螺纹座和第二螺纹座从螺母的相反方向拉紧螺母，保证螺母不会在高压下出现松动情况；通过在卡接头的内部设置限位块增加柔性件的强度，利用柔性件具有的韧性和管道接触后，通过推紧管道，柔性件发生形变，可以包裹住切割不平整的管道端面，从而增加管道安装后的密封性。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump low-temperature test device and method, and the device comprises a liquid hydrogen storage tank used for storing a liquid hydrogen medium, the liquid hydrogen storage tank is provided with a liquid hydrogen medium input port and a liquid hydrogen medium backflow port, and a gas inlet pipeline of a liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with an inlet adjusting valve, a first thermometer and a first pressure gauge. An outlet pipeline of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is further connected with an outlet one-way regulating valve, a second thermometer, a second pressure gauge and a liquid hydrogen flow meter, and an air return port pipeline of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with an air return stop valve and a fourth thermometer. A pump pool of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is connected with a third thermometer, a third pressure gauge and a power monitoring instrument connected with the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump, one side of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump is provided with a test control console position used for monitoring various data in the operation process of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump, and all the instruments are connected with the test control console position. The liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump performance evaluation method has the effect that the performance of the liquid hydrogen centrifugal pump can be effectively evaluated conveniently.

本发明公开了一种液氢离心泵低温试验装置及方法，包括用于存储液氢介质的液氢储罐，液氢储罐上设置有液氢介质输入口和液氢介质回流口，液氢离心泵的进气口管路上分别连接有进口调节阀、第一温度计和第一压力表，液氢离心泵的出口管路上还连接有出口单向调节阀、第二温度计、第二压力表和液氢流量计，液氢离心泵回气口管路上连接有回气截止阀和第四温度计，液氢离心泵的泵池连接有第三温度计、第三压力表和与液氢离心泵相连的功率监测仪表，液氢离心泵的一侧设置有用于监测液氢离心泵运行过程中的各项数据的测试控制台位，所有仪表均连接与所述测试控制台位相连接。本申请具有便于对液氢离心泵的性能进行有效评估的效果。

invention_title.text: Method for preparing 2-butenol compound through isomerization of liquid-phase 3-butenol compound in hydrogen medium environment
一种液相3-丁烯醇化合物氢介质环境异构化制备2-丁烯醇化合物的方法

extracted_name.value: TIANJIN ANDESHENG TECH SERVICE CO LTD
天津安德胜科技服务有限公司

abstract.text: The invention provides a method for preparing a 2-butenol compound through isomerization of a liquid-phase 3-butenol compound in a hydrogen medium environment, which comprises the following steps: in a hydrogen environment, enabling a mixture flow of inorganic alkali and the 3-butenol compound to pass through a catalyst bed layer, and carrying out isomerization reaction to obtain the 2-butenol compound, the addition amount of the inorganic base is 0.01-1.5% of the mass of the 3-butenol compound; the catalyst is porous silicon oxide loaded with palladium, cerium and selenium. According to the present invention, by adding the additional alkali to the 3-butenol raw material, the unsaturated alcohol can be effectively prevented from being converted into the saturated alcohol during the isomerization process in the presence of the hydrogen, and the hydrogen adsorption capacity of the palladium catalyst can be inhibited by adding the electron accelerator selenium to the catalyst so as to improve the hydrogen adsorption capacity of the 3-butenol; the stability of cations of a palladium compound is maintained while the hydrogenation activity of the catalyst palladium is reduced, the diffusivity of the palladium is improved by the structure accelerant cerium, the active center and coordination of the palladium are increased, and the performance of the palladium catalyst is structurally improved.

本发明提供了一种液相3‑丁烯醇化合物氢介质环境异构化制备2‑丁烯醇化合物的方法，包括以下步骤：在氢气环境下，将无机碱与3‑丁烯醇化合物的混合物流通过催化剂床层，进行异构化反应，得到2‑丁烯醇化合物；所述无机碱的加入量为3‑丁烯醇化合物质量的0.01～1.5％；催化剂为负载有钯、铈和硒的多孔氧化硅。本发明通过在3‑丁烯醇的原料中加入额外的碱，能够有效阻止不饱和醇在氢存在的异构化过程中转化为饱和醇，同时，本申请中的催化剂中添加了电子促进剂硒能够抑制钯催化剂对氢的吸附能力，从而降低催化剂钯的加氢活性同时保持钯化合物阳离子的稳定性，以及结构促进剂铈提高了钯的扩散性，增加钯的活性中心和配位，从结构上提高钯催化剂性能。

invention_title.text: Liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve
一种液氢低温截止阀

abstract.text: The liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve particularly relates to the field of stop valves and comprises a main body mechanism, the main body mechanism comprises a valve body, a first through groove is formed in the valve body, second through grooves communicated with the first through groove are formed in the two sides of the first through groove, and a valve element is inserted into the first through groove in an up-down sliding state. A valve rod is fixedly installed at the top of the valve element, the valve rod can be arranged in the first through groove in a reciprocating motion state in the axial direction of the valve rod, a valve body lengthening pipe is fixedly installed at the top of the valve body, and the outer wall of the valve rod is sleeved with the valve body lengthening pipe. The valve body extension pipe is arranged on the outer wall of the valve rod, and the guide heat insulation ring is arranged between the valve rod and the valve body extension pipe, so that heat convection of a liquid hydrogen medium in the valve is reduced, liquid hydrogen cold energy is prevented from being conducted to other sealing parts of the sealing corrugated pipe fitting, the sealing performance and the service life of the valve are guaranteed, and the service life of the valve is prolonged. And the liquid hydrogen medium storage and transportation safety can be improved.

本实用新型公开了一种液氢低温截止阀，具体涉及截止阀领域，包括主体机构，主体机构包括阀体，阀体的内部开设有第一通槽，第一通槽的两侧开设有与其相连通的第二通槽，第一通槽的内部呈上下滑动状态插接有阀芯，阀芯的顶部固定安装有阀杆，阀杆可沿自身轴向呈往复移动状态设置于第一通槽的内部，阀体的顶部固定安装有阀体加长管，阀体加长管套设在阀杆的外壁。本实用新型通过在阀杆的外壁设有阀体加长管，并且在阀杆与阀体加长管之间设置有导向隔热环，减小了液氢介质在阀门内的热对流，限制了液氢冷能传导至密封波纹管件其他密封件处，保障阀门密封性能和使用寿命，有利于提升液氢介质储运安全性。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen valve sealing performance testing device, and relates to the technical field of ultralow temperature valve performance testing, the liquid hydrogen valve sealing performance testing device comprises a hydrogen supply subsystem, a hydrogen cooling and liquefying subsystem and a valve sealing performance detection subsystem, and an internal cooling method can be adopted to carry out internal leakage detection and external leakage detection on a tested valve in a liquid hydrogen environment; the hydrogen replacement and recovery subsystem switches a gas purging replacement pipeline and a hydrogen recovery pipeline by controlling the flow direction of a cut-off reversing mechanism, and hydrogen which is not liquefied in the pre-cooling stage can be recovered and reused. And the monitoring and control subsystem is used for monitoring and controlling the operation states of the hydrogen supply subsystem, the hydrogen cooling and liquefying subsystem, the valve sealing performance detection subsystem and the hydrogen replacement and recovery subsystem. According to the invention, high-pressure hydrogen can be cooled and liquefied on a test site, and a large amount of liquid hydrogen medium can be continuously obtained, so that the low-temperature sealing performance test can be carried out on the tested valve in a real liquid hydrogen medium environment.

本发明公开一种液氢阀门密封性能测试装置，涉及超低温阀门性能测试技术领域，包括氢气供应子系统、氢气冷却与液化子系统、阀门密封性能检测子系统，能够采用内部冷却法对被测阀门分别进行液氢环境下的内漏检测和外漏检测；氢气置换与回收子系统通过控制截止换向机构的流向，切换气体吹扫置换管路和氢气回收管路，能够将预冷阶段未发生液化的氢气进行回收和再利用；监测与控制子系统，用于监测并控制氢气供应子系统、氢气冷却与液化子系统、阀门密封性能检测子系统、氢气置换与回收子系统的运行状态。本发明能够在试验现场对高压氢气进行冷却和液化，可连续、大量获取液氢介质，从而实现在真实液氢介质环境下对被测阀门开展低温密封性能测试。

invention_title.text: Hydrogen heat conduction measuring device and method
一种氢导热测量装置及方法

extracted_name.value: 北京航天试验技术研究所

abstract.text: The invention discloses a hydrogen heat conduction measuring device and method. A sample cavity used for containing a hydrogen sample to be subjected to heat conduction measurement is formed in an inner cavity of a low-temperature Dewar, a sample cavity pressure sensor and a sample cavity temperature sensor are arranged in the cavity, and an electric heating assembly used for heating the sample cavity and the hydrogen sample in the cavity is installed outside the low-temperature Dewar; a hot wire is fixed in a cavity body of the sample cavity through an insulating support piece, only two ends of the hot wire are fixed with the insulating support piece in an insulating manner, and the rest part is immersed in the hydrogen sample in the sample cavity; the top of a cavity body of the sample cavity is sequentially connected with an electromagnetic valve and a hydrogen emptying valve through a stainless steel capillary tube; and the sample filling pipeline is sequentially connected with a hydrogen source tank. The linear heat source is heated by constant power, the temperature of the linear heat source and the measured hydrogen medium around the linear heat source can rise, the heat conductivity coefficient of the measured hydrogen medium can be obtained according to the temperature rise of the linear heat source, and efficient measurement of multi-state hydrogen heat conduction physical properties such as a liquid state and a supercritical state is achieved.

本发明公开了一种氢导热测量装置及方法。本发明在低温杜瓦的内腔中设有用于盛装待导热测量氢样品的样品腔，腔体中设置有样品腔压力传感器和样品腔温度传感器，外部安装有用于对样品腔及内部氢样品进行加热的电加热组件；样品腔的腔体内通过绝缘支撑件固定有热线，热线仅在两端与绝缘支撑件绝缘固定，其余部分均浸没在样品腔内部的氢样品中；样品腔的腔体顶部通过不锈钢毛细管依次连接电磁阀和氢气放空阀；且样品加注管路依次连接氢源罐。本发明利用恒功率对线热源进行加热，线热源及其周围的被测氢介质就会产生温升，根据线热源的温升就可以得到被测氢介质的导热系数，实现液态和超临界态等多状态氢导热物性的高效测量。

invention_title.text: Lightweight liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method
一种轻量化液氢储供系统及方法

extracted_name.value: 北京航天试验技术研究所

abstract.text: The invention discloses a lightweight liquid hydrogen storage and supply system and method, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy. The magnetocaloric heat exchanger for the liquid hydrogen medium is designed by utilizing the heat flow magnetic field effect and vaporization part pressurization of materials such as Be and Ga, the effective heat exchange area of the magnetocaloric heat exchanger is controlled by adjusting the magnitude of input current, and the magnetocaloric heat exchanger has the advantages of small size, light weight, simple structure and the like; and the application potential on carriers with high weight requirements, such as hydrogen energy aircrafts and the like, is huge. By measuring the air state parameters, the current liquid hydrogen vaporization amount data is indirectly obtained and serves as the basis for changing the liquid hydrogen vaporization amount, accurate regulation and supply of the liquid hydrogen vaporization amount can be achieved, the regulation and control strategy of the whole system is simple, safe and reliable, and large fluctuation generated during flow regulation can be prevented.

本发明公开了一种轻量化液氢储供系统及方法，涉及氢能技术领域。本发明利用Be、Ga等材料的热流磁场效应和汽化部分增压，设计了用于液氢介质的磁热式换热器，通过调整输入电流的大小来控制磁热式换热器的有效换热面积，具有体积小、重量轻、结构简单等优势，在氢能飞机等对重量要求较高的载具上应用潜力巨大。通过对空气状态参数的测量，间接获取当前的液氢汽化量数据并将其作为液氢汽化量变更的依据，可实现液氢汽化量的精确调控和供应，整体系统调控策略简单，安全可靠，并可防止流量调节时产生的大幅度波动。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a liquid hydrogen solid air preparation and test device and a method thereof, which can truly realize visualization and component measurement functions of a solid air preparation process under a liquid hydrogen medium immersion working condition, and strengthen the understanding degree of the liquid hydrogen solid air. The cold insulation container and the preparation container are arranged in the visual liquid hydrogen dewar from top to bottom, so that the heat insulation performance of the preparation container is greatly improved, and the influence of a conventional liquid hydrogen emptying method on the solid-air form is effectively avoided. Meanwhile, by adjusting the oxygen and nitrogen concentration in the simulation gas, solid air preparation and testing under various different initial conditions are achieved, and the device has the characteristic of functional diversification.
本发明公开了一种液氢固空制备及测试装置及其方法，可真实实现液氢介质浸没工况下的固空制备过程可视化及组分测量功能，强化对液氢固空的认识程度。本发明通过在可视化液氢杜瓦内部自上而下设置保冷容器和制备容器，大幅提升制备容器的绝热性能有效避免常规液氢排空方法对固空形态的影响。同时本发明通过调节模拟气中的氧氮浓度，实现多种不同初始条件下的固空制备及测试，具有功能多样化特征。

abstract.text: The invention discloses an integrated adjusting device and method for a liquid hydrogen storage and supply system, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy. The sound velocity nozzle assembly which is simple in structure and easy to machine is adopted to replace existing large-size components such as an adjusting valve and a flow meter, the influence of factors such as a downstream power device and a pipeline is avoided, and coupling and unification of flow adjustment and parameter measurement of a hydrogen medium are achieved; the downstream pressure of the sonic nozzle is reduced to the maximum extent through the characteristic of secondary ortho-hydrogen conversion heat absorption, it is guaranteed that the corresponding sonic nozzle reaches the critical state, and the calculation precision of actual flow parameters is guaranteed; and by utilizing the characteristic that the hydrogen temperature is throttled and heated when being higher than the turning-back temperature and is throttled and cooled when being lower than the turning-back temperature, various coolant circulation modes are designed, and the energy utilization efficiency of the whole system is improved.

本发明公开了一种液氢储供系统集成调节装置及方法，涉及氢能技术领域。本发明采用简单结构、易于加工的音速喷嘴组件替代现用的调节阀和流量计等大体积部件，且不受下游动力装置、管路等因素的影响，实现氢介质的流量调节和参数测量的耦合统一；通过仲正氢转化吸热的特性最大限度地降低音速喷嘴下游压力，确保对应的音速喷嘴达到临界状态，保证实际流量参数的计算精度；利用氢气温度大于转回温度时节流升温、小于转回温度时节流降温的特性，设计了多种冷却剂循环方式，提升系统整体的能量利用效率。

abstract.text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of hydrogen production through alkaline water electrolysis, and discloses an electrolytic bath flushing device. According to the electrolytic bath flushing device, through cooperation of the circulating pump, the connecting pipeline and the valves, cleaning liquid is pumped out of the electrolytic bath from the alkali inlet in the bottom of the electrolytic bath and injected into the electrolytic bath again through the hydrogen medium outlet or the oxygen medium outlet to conduct forward cleaning on the electrolytic bath, or through cooperation of the liquid storage tank, the circulating pump, the connecting pipeline and the valves, the electrolytic bath is flushed. Cleaning liquid in the liquid storage box is injected from the alkali inlet in the bottom of the electrolytic bath and pumped out through the hydrogen medium outlet and the oxygen medium outlet in the electrolytic bath to conduct reverse cleaning on the electrolytic bath, the electrolytic bath can be subjected to forward flushing and back flushing through the electrolytic bath flushing device, welding slag, nickel slag, dust and other impurities in the electrolytic bath can be efficiently removed, and the electrolytic bath can be cleaned more efficiently. The service life of the electrolytic bath is effectively prolonged.

本实用新型属于碱水电解制氢技术领域，公开了电解槽冲洗装置。该电解槽冲洗装置，通过循环泵、连接管路及多个阀门的配合，将清洗液从电解槽底部的进碱口抽出电解槽并通过氢介质出口或氧介质出口重新注入，对电解槽进行正向清洗，或是利用储液箱与循环泵、连接管路及多个阀门配合，将储液箱箱中的清洗液从电解槽底部的进碱口注入，并通过电解槽上的氢介质出口和氧介质出口抽出，对电解槽进行反向清洗，通过该电解槽冲洗装置能够对电解槽进行正冲洗和反冲洗，可高效去除电解槽内的焊渣、镍渣、灰尘等杂物，有效延长电解槽的使用寿命。

invention_title.text: Fixed high-vacuum heat-insulation vertical liquid hydrogen storage tank
固定式高真空绝热立式液氢储槽

extracted_name.value: HANGZHOU HANGYANG CRYOGENIC VESSEL CO LTD
杭州杭氧低温容器有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a fixed high-vacuum heat-insulating vertical liquid hydrogen storage tank which can meet the low-temperature performance requirements (including vacuum performance and vacuum heat-insulating performance) of a liquid hydrogen medium, and is economical and practical in structure and simple to manufacture. The inner container is formed by welding a cylindrical barrel, an upper elliptical head and a lower elliptical head, the outer surface of the inner container is sequentially wound with multiple layers of heat insulation materials composed of aluminum foil and glass fibers, the structure of the outer container is similar to that of the inner container, and the inner container and the outer container are connected through three stainless steel lower hanging belts; the pipeline system is located at the bottom of the liquid hydrogen storage tank and communicates with the liquid hydrogen storage tank.
本实用新型涉及一种既能满足液氢介质低温性能要求(包含真空性能、真空绝热性能)，又具有结构经济、实用，制造简单的固定式高真空绝热立式液氢储槽，内容器由圆柱形筒体和上下椭圆封头焊制而成且内容器外表面依次缠绕由铝箔和加玻璃纤维组成的多层绝热材料，外容器结构与内容器相似，内容器和外容器之间通过三根不锈钢下吊带相连，管路系统位于液氢储槽底部且与液氢储槽连通。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a hydrogen storage bottle fatigue characteristic prediction method and system. The prediction method comprises the following steps: carrying out a hydrogen charging and discharging thermodynamic test on the hydrogen storage cylinder under a hydrogen medium condition; establishing a hydrogen storage bottle thermodynamic model; testing thermal stress of the hydrogen storage cylinder; establishing a hydrogen storage cylinder thermal stress finite element simulation model; acquiring characteristics and failure behaviors of a fiber material, characteristics and failure behaviors of a matrix material, characteristics and failure behaviors of a fiber-matrix interface material and interlayer debonding characteristics of a composite material at different temperatures; establishing a composite material microscopic equivalent volume element finite element model; carrying out fatigue failure test on the laminated plate at different temperatures; establishing a fatigue characteristic finite element model of the multi-scale composite laminated plate under thermal-mechanical coupling; establishing a multi-scale multi-failure mode fatigue characteristic finite element model of the hydrogen storage cylinder under hydrogen thermal coupling; performing fatigue test on the hydrogen storage cylinder; and predicting the fatigue characteristic of the hydrogen storage cylinder. According to the method, the fatigue failure behavior of the hydrogen storage cylinder under the hydrogen-heat-force coupling condition can be accurately predicted.

本发明公开了一种储氢瓶疲劳特性预测方法及系统。本发明的预测方法包括：氢介质条件下储氢瓶充放氢热力学试验；建立储氢瓶热力学模型；储氢瓶热应力试验；建立储氢瓶热应力有限元仿真模型；获取不同温度下纤维材料特性与失效行为、基体材料特性与失效行为、纤维‑基体界面材料特性与失效行为及复合材料层间脱粘特性；建立复合材料微观等效体积单元有限元模型；不同温度下层合板疲劳失效试验；建立热力耦合下多尺度复合材料层合板疲劳特性有限元模型；建立氢热力耦合下储氢瓶多尺度多失效模式疲劳特性有限元模型；储氢瓶疲劳试验；储氢瓶疲劳特性的预测。本发明可以准确地预测氢‑热‑力耦合条件下的储氢瓶疲劳失效行为。

invention_title.text: Ball valve
一种球阀

extracted_name.value: 苏州纽威阀门股份有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses a ball valve which comprises a valve cover, a valve body, a cut-off structure and a blocking structure. Wherein a circulation channel is formed in the valve body; the cut-off structure is mounted in the valve body, and the cut-off structure is connected with the circulation channel so as to open or close the circulation channel; the blocking structure is formed between the valve body and the valve deck, and the blocking structure, the valve body and the valve deck jointly define an isolation cavity. The ball valve has the transportation state that the low-temperature medium is isolated in the circulation channel through the blocking structure. According to the structure, when a low-temperature medium exists in the circulation channel, the low-temperature medium is blocked in the circulation channel, so that the low-temperature medium cannot be close to the sealing piece, and the flange of the valve cover of the valve body is sealed to be far away from the low-temperature liquid hydrogen medium, so that the sealing piece cannot be located in an ultralow-temperature environment for a long time, deformation caused by the ultralow temperature cannot occur, and the service life of the sealing piece is prolonged. Therefore, the service life of the sealing piece is prolonged, and leakage is prevented.

本实用新型公开了一种球阀，包括：阀盖、阀体、截止结构和阻隔结构；其中，所述阀体上开设流通通道；截止结构安装在所述阀体内，所述截止结构与所述流通通道相连，以打开或封闭所述流通通道；所述阻隔结构成型在所述阀体与所述阀盖之间，所述阻隔结构、阀体和阀盖共同围合成隔离腔；所述球阀具利用阻隔结构有将低温介质隔离在所述流通通道内的运输状态。此结构在流通通道中具有低温介质时，将低温介质阻挡在流通通道内，使得低温介质不会靠近密封件，使阀体阀盖法兰处密封远离低温液氢介质，从而使得密封件不会长时间的处在超低温的环境中，不会出现由超低温导致的变形，从而提高密封件的使用寿命，防止泄漏。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a low-evaporation-rate liquid hydrogen storage and supply system which comprises a first power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger, a second power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger and a liquid hydrogen storage tank, and a hydrogen liquefaction unit and a liquid hydrogen pressurization unit are installed on the liquid hydrogen storage tank. Conventional waste high-quality hydrogen cooling capacity is used for thermoelectric power generation, the advantages of being free of noise, high in reliability, long in service life and the like are achieved, generated electric energy is used for reducing evaporation loss of liquid hydrogen, the storage time of a liquid hydrogen medium is greatly prolonged, and the overall economical efficiency of the system is improved. The novel power generation type hydrogen heat exchanger is designed, efficient integration of multiple processes such as secondary hydrogen conversion, cold and heat source heat exchange and thermoelectric power generation is achieved, the system structure is simplified, the remarkable light weight characteristic is achieved, and in addition, the cold and heat sources at the specific temperature can maintain the stable efficiency of thermoelectric power generation pieces. According to the operation characteristics of the hydrogen storage and supply system and the difference of thermoelectric power generation, multiple operation modes are designed, the electric energy utilization rate is comprehensively improved, and the overall evaporation rate of the system is reduced.

本发明公开了一种低蒸发率的液氢储供系统，包括第一发电型氢换热器、第二发电型氢换热器和液氢储罐，所述液氢储罐上安装有氢气液化单元和液氢增压单元。本发明利用常规废弃的高品质氢冷量进行温差发电，具有无噪声、高可靠、长寿命等优点，并将产生的电能用于减少液氢蒸发损耗，大幅延长液氢介质的存储时间，提升系统整体经济性。设计了新型的发电型氢换热器，实现仲正氢转化、冷热源换热、温差发电等多种过程的高效集成，简化系统结构，具有显著的轻量化特征，此外，特定温度的冷热源还可维持温差发电片的效率稳定。根据氢储供系统的运行特性及温差发电的差异，设计多种运行模式，综合提升电能利用率，降低系统的整体蒸发率。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the field of gas storage well detection, and discloses an underground gas storage well detection method which comprises the following steps: making a detection scheme; determining a degreasing cleaning scheme according to the object, and performing degreasing cleaning; performing external macroscopic inspection; performing underground television detection; shaft wall thickness corrosion detection; performance testing; degreasing and accepting; the main failure damage mode of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well is confirmed by analyzing the structural form, the main body material, the medium characteristics, the operation condition and the like of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well, and a targeted regular inspection scheme is designed for the possible damage mode and failure mode of the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well. According to the method, the inspection and detection means and the result evaluation method are defined, application verification is achieved in the high-pressure oxygen/hydrogen medium underground gas storage well, the safety condition of the gas storage well is effectively evaluated, and it is ensured that a user can use the gas storage well safely and trustingly according to the given use parameters.

本发明涉及储气井检测领域，公开了一种地下储气井的检验方法，包括制定检验方案；根据对象确定脱脂清洗方案，并进行脱脂清洗；外部宏观检验；井下电视检测；井筒壁厚腐蚀检测；性能试验；脱脂验收；发明针对高压氧气/氢气介质地下储气井，通过对其结构形式、主体材料、介质特性以及其运行工况等进行分析，确认了其主要失效损伤模式，针对其可能存在的损伤模式和失效模式，设计了有针对性的定期检验方案，明确了检验检测手段和结果评定方法，并在高压氧气/氢气介质地下储气井得到了应用验证，有效评估了该批储气井安全状况，确保了使用单位能够按照给出的使用参数安全放心使用。

invention_title.text: Floating type display board and use method thereof
一种飘浮式展示牌及其使用方法

abstract.text: The invention discloses a floating type display board and a using method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of display devices.The floating type display board comprises a display board assembly, the display board assembly comprises a display board body, an air bag is arranged in the display board body, the air bag is filled with a hydrogen medium part, and a side board is further connected to the side wall of the display board body; power mechanisms for pulling the display board assembly to move up and down are arranged on the opposite surfaces of the two bottom columns, and pulling rope locking mechanisms are further arranged above the power mechanisms. According to the technical scheme, the floating display board body can be subjected to positioning and anti-shaking treatment through the two telescopic components symmetrically arranged on the floating display board body, the situation that the display board body shakes under the outdoor strong wind condition is avoided, and the display effect of the floating display board can be guaranteed; a connecting rope used for pulling the display board body can be effectively prevented from being wound, and it is guaranteed that the display board body is taken back normally.

本申请公开了一种飘浮式展示牌及其使用方法，属于展示装置技术领域，该漂浮式展示牌包含展示牌组件，展示牌组件包括展示牌本体，展示牌本体的内部设有气囊，气囊的内部填充有氢气介质部，展示牌本体的侧壁上还连接有边板，两个底柱的相背面上均设有用于牵引展示牌组件进行上下活动的动力机构，动力机构的上方还设有牵引绳锁止机构。本申请技术方案通过漂浮式展示牌本体上对称设置的两个伸缩部件能够对漂浮的展示牌本体进行定位防晃动处理，避免展示牌本体在户外大风情况下出现晃动的情况出现，不仅能够保障漂浮式展示牌的展示效果，也能够有效避免用于牵引展示牌本体的连接绳发生缠绕，保障展示牌本体收回工作的正常进行。
