abstract.text: The liquid hydrogen low-temperature stop valve particularly relates to the field of stop valves and comprises a main body mechanism, the main body mechanism comprises a valve body, a first through groove is formed in the valve body, second through grooves communicating with the first through groove are formed in the two sides of the first through groove, and a valve element is inserted into the first through groove in an up-down sliding state; a valve rod is fixedly installed at the top of the valve element, the valve rod can be arranged in the first through groove in a reciprocating motion state in the axial direction of the valve rod, a valve body lengthening pipe is fixedly installed at the top of the valve body, and the outer wall of the valve rod is sleeved with the valve body lengthening pipe. The valve body extension pipe is arranged on the outer wall of the valve rod, and the guide heat insulation ring is arranged between the valve rod and the valve body extension pipe, so that heat convection of a liquid hydrogen medium in the valve is reduced, liquid hydrogen cold energy is prevented from being conducted to other sealing parts of the sealing corrugated pipe fitting, and the sealing performance and the service life of the valve are guaranteed; and the liquid hydrogen medium storage and transportation safety can be improved.

本发明公开了一种液氢低温截止阀，具体涉及截止阀领域，包括主体机构，主体机构包括阀体，阀体的内部开设有第一通槽，第一通槽的两侧开设有与其相连通的第二通槽，第一通槽的内部呈上下滑动状态插接有阀芯，阀芯的顶部固定安装有阀杆，阀杆可沿自身轴向呈往复移动状态设置于第一通槽的内部，阀体的顶部固定安装有阀体加长管，阀体加长管套设在阀杆的外壁。本发明通过在阀杆的外壁设有阀体加长管，并且在阀杆与阀体加长管之间设置有导向隔热环，减小了液氢介质在阀门内的热对流，限制了液氢冷能传导至密封波纹管件其他密封件处，保障阀门密封性能和使用寿命，有利于提升液氢介质储运安全性。

abstract.text: The invention provides a rocket liquid hydrogen tank self-pressurization simulation and verification device, and belongs to the technical field of rocket part testing. The temperature control pipeline is suitable for adjusting the temperature of liquid hydrogen in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank, and the temperature control pipeline comprises an effective section arranged in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank and an adjusting section arranged outside the simulated liquid hydrogen tank; a hydrogen medium flows in the temperature control pipeline; the first heat exchanger is filled with liquid nitrogen suitable for heat exchange with a pipeline of the adjusting section, and a temperature sensor assembly, a pressure sensor and a flow meter are arranged on the pipeline before the adjusting section enters the simulated liquid hydrogen tank; according to the rocket liquid hydrogen tank self-pressurization simulation and verification device, the vaporization amount in the simulated liquid hydrogen tank can be controlled by changing the temperature and the flow speed of the hydrogen medium in the temperature control pipeline, namely by only controlling the physical property of the hydrogen medium, the pressure of the simulated liquid hydrogen tank within a certain range is obtained, the structure is simple, and operation is convenient.

本发明提供的一种火箭液氢箱自增压模拟及验证装置，属于火箭零部件的测试技术领域，包括：模拟液氢箱；控温管路，适于对模拟液氢箱内液氢的温度进行调节，所述控温管路包括布置在模拟液氢箱内部的生效段以及布置在模拟液氢箱外部的调节段；所述控温管路内流通有氢介质；所述第一换热器内充有适于同调节段管路发生热交换的液氮，所述调节段在进入模拟液氢箱前的管路上设置有温度传感器组件、压力传感器和流量计；本发明的火箭液氢箱自增压模拟及验证装置，通过改变控温管路内氢介质的温度和流速，即仅通过控制氢介质的物理性质便可以控制模拟液氢箱内的汽化量，获得一定范围内的模拟液氢箱的压力，结构简单，操作方便。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a device and method for preparing supercooled liquid argon, the device is a device for preparing the supercooled liquid argon, the supercooled low-temperature liquid argon can be prepared, the supercooling degree can be kept, and the device specifically comprises a hydrogen medium interlayer container and an air pressure control chamber. The hydrogen medium interlayer container is communicated with the air pressure control chamber through a capillary tube. Wherein a hydrogen temperature swing adsorption material (MOFs) and a semiconductor temperature control element are contained in the air pressure control chamber, the temperature of the MOFs can be adjusted through the semiconductor temperature control element, the hydrogen adsorption amount of the MOFs is changed, and the interlayer gas pressure intensity is changed, so that the cooling rate is controlled.
本发明公开了一种制备过冷液氩的装置及方法，该装置为是一种制备过冷液氩的装置，可以制备过冷低温液氩并保持过冷度，具体包括氢气介质夹层容器及气压控制室。氢气介质夹层容器通过毛细管与气压控制室相连通。其中，气压控制室内包含氢气变温吸附材料(MOFs)、半导体温控元件,可以通过半导体温控元件调节MOFs温度，改变MOFs吸附氢气量而改变夹层气体压强，以控制冷却速率。

invention_title.text: Long-life air valve for high-pressure hydrogen compressor
一种高压氢气压缩机用高寿命气阀

extracted_name.value: SHANGHAI YIGONG HYDROGEN ENERGY TECH CO LTD
上海羿弓氢能科技有限公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses a long-life air valve for a high-pressure hydrogen compressor, and belongs to the technical field of compressors. Comprising an air inlet valve and an air outlet valve, and each of the air inlet valve and the air outlet valve comprises a guide valve cover, a valve plate, a valve seat and a spring; the guide valve cover comprises a valve cover shell and a non-metal valve cover lining arranged in the valve cover shell; the valve cover shell is made of a hydrogen embrittlement resistant material, and the hydrogen embrittlement resistant material is a 316 stainless steel material subjected to cold deformation strengthening; the valve cover lining is made of any non-metal material of a carbon fiber reinforced PEEK (Polyether Ether Ketone) material, a PTFE (Polytetrafluoroethylene) material and silver-dipped graphite; and the valve plate is made of a GH2132 alloy material. The valve element can be suitable for a hydrogen medium compressor with the high pressure ranging from 45 MPa to 90 MPa, and the valve element has high mechanical strength, high temperature resistance, long fatigue life and hydrogen embrittlement resistance; wear-resisting and self-lubricating properties are achieved, and abrasive particles are not prone to being generated to pollute media; and the situation that the valve plate is jammed or fails due to high temperature generated by friction is avoided.

本发明公开了一种高压氢气压缩机用高寿命气阀，属于压缩机技术领域。包括进气阀与排气阀，所述进气阀与排气阀均包括导向阀盖、阀片、阀座以及弹簧；所述导向阀盖包括阀盖外壳以及设于阀盖外壳内部的非金属阀盖内衬；所述阀盖外壳由抗氢脆材料制成，所述抗氢脆材料为经过冷变形强化的316不锈钢材质；所述阀盖内衬由碳纤维增强的PEEK材料、PTFE材料、浸银石墨中的任意一种非金属材料制成；所述阀片由GH2132合金材料制成。通过本发明，能适用于45MPa‑90MPa高压力的氢气介质压缩机中，阀芯有较高的机械强度、耐高温性能、疲劳寿命和抗氢脆能力；具有耐磨自润滑特性，不易产生磨粒污染介质；也不会因为摩擦产生高温进而导致阀片卡涩或阀片失效。

invention_title.text: Two-stage hydrogen medium diaphragm compressor
一种两级氢介质隔膜压缩机

extracted_name.value: YANTAI DONGDE HYDROGEN ENERGY TECH CO LTD
烟台东德氢能技术有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model relates to a diaphragm compressor, in particular to a two-stage hydrogen medium diaphragm compressor, which is different from the prior art in that a first-stage diaphragm head and a second-stage diaphragm head respectively comprise an upper diaphragm head, a lower diaphragm head and a diaphragm positioned between the upper diaphragm head and the lower diaphragm head, the inner surface of the upper diaphragm head is not an arched cambered surface but a plane and is fixedly connected with an air disc, and the outer end of the air disc is also a plane; an arched cambered surface is arranged on the inner surface of the gas disc; the inner surface of the lower film head is provided with an arched cambered surface, and the middle of the lower film head is provided with a circular sinking groove in which an oil distribution disc is fixedly connected; a plurality of upper axial through holes are evenly formed in the circumferential edge close to the upper membrane head, a plurality of lower axial screw holes are formed in the corresponding positions of the lower membrane head, and a plurality of fastening screws penetrate through the upper axial through holes to be in threaded connection with the lower axial screw holes to fixedly connect the upper membrane head, the membrane, the air disc and the lower membrane head together. Compared with the prior art, the utility model breaks through the tradition, so that the diameter of the plunger can be larger than that of the mounting convex ring of the crosshead, and the design and mounting requirements of the high-flow membrane head oil cylinder are met.

本实用新型涉及隔膜压缩机，具体是一种两级氢介质隔膜压缩机，与现有技术不同的是一级膜头和二级膜头均包括上膜头、下膜头、位于上膜头和下膜头之间的膜片，上膜头的内表面不是穹形弧面而是平面并固接外端同样是平面的气盘，气盘的内表面具有穹形弧面；下膜头的内表面具有穹形弧面但中部开设圆形沉槽，圆形沉槽内固接配油盘；靠近上膜头的周向边缘均匀开设多个上轴向通孔，下膜头的对应位置开设多个下轴向螺孔，多个紧固螺钉分别穿过上轴向通孔与下轴向螺孔螺接将上膜头、膜片、气盘和下膜头固接在一起。与现有技术相比，本实用新型突破传统使得柱塞的直径能够大于十字头的安装凸环的直径，满足大流量膜头油缸的设计安装要求。

invention_title.text: Steam shell-and-tube heat exchanger combination device for heating hydrogen medium
一种用于加热氢气介质的蒸汽管壳式换热器组合装置

extracted_name.value: DALIAN ENERGAS GAS EQUIPMENT CO LTD
大连派思燃气设备有限公司

abstract.text: The utility model provides a steam shell-and-tube heat exchanger combination device for heating a hydrogen medium, which is characterized in that one side of a heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen inlet pipeline connected with a pneumatic ball valve, and the upper end of the heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen inlet pipeline connected with an electric gate valve A; the other side of the heat exchanger is connected with a hydrogen outlet pipeline connected with a hydrogen temperature switch and a hydrogen temperature transmitter, a liquid level transmitter is installed on a shell of the heat exchanger, and the lower end of the heat exchanger is sequentially connected with an electric gate valve B, a pneumatic control valve, a drain valve and a return water temperature transmitter through a pipeline. And the upper end of the heat exchanger is also connected with a leak detection device, gas detection equipment and a bleeder of an exhaust valve. And the accuracy and safety of leak detection are improved.

本实用新型提供一种用于加热氢气介质的蒸汽管壳式换热器组合装置，换热器一侧与接有气动球阀的氢气入口管道相接，换热器上端与接有电动闸阀A的氢气入口管道相接，换热器另一侧与接有氢气温度开关、氢气温度变送器的氢气出口管道相接，换热器壳体上装有液位变送器，换热器下端通过管路依次接有电动闸阀B、气动调节阀、疏水阀及回水温度变送器，换热器上端还接有检漏装置、气体探测设备、排气阀的放散管。提高了检漏的准确度及安全性。

abstract.text: FIELD: oil and gas production. ^ SUBSTANCE: invention refers to a method of preparing and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock involving heating of stock and hydrogen, preparation of end-products; herewith liquid (oil, black oil, oil refining and petrochemistry remains) charge stock is heated up to the temperature above 20-50C and exposed to thermal and/or thermomechanical (non-catalytic) cracking, molecular hydrogen and/or hydrogen enriched light hydrogenous mediums (natural or accompanying gas, gas and light fractions of oil refining and petrochemistry), if required are heated up separately from charge stock, supplied at greater pressure than that of the heating stage, to the stage of producing active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals to a reactor or reactor package with a catalyst heated to the required temperature, thereafter produced active hydrogen and/or light radicals are supplied to a stock heating and cracking zone for the reaction; the reaction products are supplied to the separation stage; a portion of gas and light fractions and also unreacted hydrogen and/or light hydrogenous initial mediums after the separation stage are supplied to the start of the process and introduced into the charge stock, light end fractions of reaction after the separation stage mainly with end boiling point to 350-360C, partially or completely supplied on the stage of producing light end commodity products (condensed gas, petrol, kerosene, diesel fuel) and/or partially returned and introduced into charge stock, heavy remains after the separation stage mainly with start boiling point 360C and above, are partially or completely supplied for producing heavy commodity products (bitumen, coke), and, probably, partially or completely supplied for reprocessing by the given method to the start of the process together with charge stock; the stock and/or separation remain cracking and heating stages, hydrogen and/or hydrogenous medium and catalyst heating, production of active atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and separation into light portion and heavy remains are combined in one device, and the ratio of the surface of the reactor or reactors with the catalyst to volume of the stock heating and/or cracking shall be increased so that maximally increase the interaction (reaction) area of atomic hydrogen and/or light radicals and heated or cracked hydrocarbon stock for effective utilisation of reacting products. The invention also concerns a unit for preparation and fine processing of hydrocarbon stock. ^ EFFECT: higher yield of light end products. ^ 19 cl, 3 tbl, 15 dwg

Изобретение относится к нефтеперерабатывающей, нефтехимической и химической промышленности. Изобретение касается способа подготовки и глубокой переработки углеводородного сырья, включающего нагрев сырья и водорода, получение конечных продуктов, при этом жидкое (нефть, мазут, остатки нефтепереработки и нефтехимии) исходное сырье нагревают до температуры выше 20-50°С и подвергают термическому и/или термомеханическому (некаталитическому) крекингу, молекулярный водород и/или легкие водородсодержащие среды, обогащенные водородом (природный или попутный газ, газ и легкие фракции нефтепереработки и нефтехимии), при необходимости подогревают отдельно от сырья, направляют при большем давлении, чем давление на стадии нагрева и крекинга, на стадию получения активного атомарного водорода и/или легких радикалов в реактор или пакет реакторов с нагретым до необходимой температуры катализатором, после которого полученные активный водород и/или легкие радикалы направляют в зону нагрева и крекинга сырья для проведения реакции, продукты реакции направляют на стадию разделения, часть газовых и легких фракций, а также непрореагировавшего водорода и/или легких водородосодержащих исходных сред после стадии разделения направляют в начало процесса и вводят в исходное сырье, легкие целевые фракции реакции после стадии разделения, преимущественно с температурой конца кипения до 350-360°С, частично или полностью направляют на стадию получения легких целевых товарных продуктов (сжиженный газ, бензин, керосин, дизельное топливо) и/или частично возвращают и вводят в исходное сырье, тяжелый остаток после стадии разделения, преим�

invention_title.text: COMPOSITION AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING ETTRINGITE COATED FIBER AND AGGLOMERATE
에트린자이트 코팅된 섬유 및 응집체 제조를 위한 조성물과방법

abstract.text: PURPOSE: A fiber is provided to sediment an ettringite crystalline on the surface of the fiber or the other disposition in a hydrogenous medium. CONSTITUTION: An ettringite coated agglomerate is manufactured by: generating an ettringite in a hydrogenous slurry while being near a fiber, an agglomerate, or other filling material for forming a mineralized complex material including an ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, or other filling material; and the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material reacting in the existence of water for forming the ettringite by adding a reactive material such as a calcium oxide and a sulfuric aluminium being sedimented to the surface of the treated fiber or the other disposition. Therefore, the ettringite treated fiber, agglomerate, and other filling material are added to a hydrogenous hardening material for improving a chemical and a mechanical combinations between the fiber and other dispositions in a concrete material.

섬유, 응집체 및 기타 충진재의 표면상에 에트린자이트 (3CaO·AlO·3Ca(SO)·30-32HO)를 침전시키기 위한 방법 및 조성물이 발표된다. 에트린자이트는 섬유, 응집체 또는 기타 충진재 근처에서 수성현탁액내에 생성되어 에트린자이트로 코팅된 섬유, 응집체 또는 기타 충진재를 포함하는 광물화된 복합재료를 형성한다. 에트린자이트 처리된 섬유, 응집체 또는 기타 충진재는 물의 존재하에서 반응하여 에트린자이트를 형성하며 이후에 처리되는 섬유 또는 기타 기질 표면상에 침전하는 칼슘산화물 및 황산알루미늄과 같은 반응물을 첨가함으로써 형성된다. 에트린자이트 처리된 섬유, 응집체 또는 기타 충진재는 수경화성 재료에 첨가되어서 결과의 경화된 수경화성 복합재료, 특히 시멘트 또는 콘크리트재료내에 섬유 또는 기타 기질간의 화학적 및 기계적 결합을 향상시킬 수 있다.

abstract.text: The plate (10) has a main surface for a fuel cell stack, where the surface is surrounded by outer edges (14) of the plate. A cathode input and a cathode output are provided at a cathode side, and an anode input and an anode output are provided at an anode side. A hydrogenous medium is fed to the anode side and a medium containing oxygen is fed to the cathode side. An outer edge of the stack is freely accessible, where the plate is coated at its outer edges by a sealant (15) and the sealant forms a frame (16) around the plate. A polymer material is provided as the sealant.

Die Erfindung betrifft eine Bipolarplatte mit von einer Außenkante (14) umgebenen Hauptfläche für einen Brennstoffzellenstapel aus einer Mehrzahl von jeweils durch die Bipolarplatten getrennten Brennstoffzellen mit einer Kathodenseite mit einem Kathodeneingang und einem Kathodenausgang sowie einer Anodenseite mit einem Anodeneingang und einem Anodenausgang, wobei der Anodenseite ein wasserstoffhaltiges Medium und der Kathodenseite ein sauerstoffhaltiges Medium zuführbar ist und wobei Außenkanten des Brennstoffzellenstapels frei zugänglich sind. DOLLAR A Es wird vorgeschlagen, dass die Bipolarplatte (10) an ihrer Außenkante (14) rahmenartig von einem Dichtmittel (15) umhüllt ist. DOLLAR A Die Erfindung betrifft ferner eine Brennstoffzelle mit einer solchen Bipolarplatte (10).

abstract.text: Provided is an austenitic stainless steel material that has high strength and excellent fatigue crack propagation resistance in a hydrogen environment. The chemical composition of the austenitic stainless steel material of the present disclosure, as defined in the description, satisfies formula (1); the elemental content and grain size number (GSN) in μm satisfy formula (2); and the tensile strength (TS), which is 730 MPa or more, the number density of inclusions (NDI) having an equivalent circle diameter of 2.0 μm or more per 4.0 mm2, and the number density of carbonitrides (NDC) having an equivalent circle diameter of 1.0 μm or more per mm2 satisfy formula (3).　(1) Nb + V ≤ 0.55; (2) 10FnA - 0.2FnB + 4.5GSN ≥ 39.0, where FnA and FnB in formula (2) are defined by formulas (A) and (B);　(A) FnA = 2N + C; (B) FnB = -7.1 + 2.8Ni + 0.49Cr + 2Mo - 2Si + 0.75Mn - 5.7C - 24N; (3) 0.5NDI + NDC + 0.02TS ≤ 30.0.

La divulgation concerne un matériau d'acier inoxydable austénitique qui présente une résistance élevée et une excellente résistance à la propagation de fissures de fatigue dans un environnement d'hydrogène. La composition chimique du matériau d'acier inoxydable austénitique de la présente divulgation, telle que définie dans la description, satisfait la formule (1) ; la teneur élémentaire et l'indice granulométrique (GSN) en µm satisfont la formule (2) ; et la résistance à la traction (TS), qui est supérieure ou égale à 730 MPa, la densité en nombre d'inclusions (NDI) ayant un diamètre de cercle équivalent supérieur ou égal à 2,0 µm par 4,0 mm2, et la densité en nombre de carbonitrures (NDC) ayant un diamètre de cercle équivalent supérieur ou égal à 1,0 µm par mm2 satisfont la formule (3).　(1) Nb + V ≤ 0,55 ; (2) 10 FnA - 0,2 FnB + 4,5 GSN ≥ 39,0, où FnA et FnB dans la formule (2) sont définis par les formules (A) et (B) ; (A) FnA = 2N + C ; (B) FnB = -7,1 + 2,8 Ni + 0,49 Cr + 2 Mo - 2 Si + 0,75 Mn - 5,7 C - 24 N ; (3) 0,5 NDI + NDC + 0,02 TS ≤ 30,0.

invention_title.text: Method and system for synergistically testing and evaluating fatigue and fracture of metal material in hydrogen environment
氢环境金属材料疲劳和断裂协同试验与评价方法及系统

extracted_name.value: CNPC ENGINEERING MAT R & D COMPANY LIMITED
中国石油天然气集团有限公司,
中国石油集团工程材料研究院有限公司

abstract.text: The invention relates to a hydrogen environment metal material fatigue and fracture cooperative test and evaluation method and system, and belongs to the field of metal material hydrogen environment compatibility. The method comprises the following steps: performing a fatigue crack propagation test and a fracture toughness test on a fatigue and fracture synergistic test sample in a hydrogen environment with preset pressure and preset temperature; based on the obtained fatigue crack propagation curve and the obtained crack propagation resistance curve, obtaining a fatigue crack propagation fitting curve and a fracture toughness characteristic value in the hydrogen environment with the preset pressure and the preset temperature; and based on the fatigue crack propagation fitting curve and the fracture toughness characteristic value in the hydrogen environment with the preset pressure and the preset temperature, safety evaluation of the metal material simulated hydrogen conveying pipeline under the fatigue load working condition is completed. The fatigue crack test is replaced by the fracture toughness test according to the defect length, the fatigue and fracture cooperative test is realized, the sample replacement is not needed, the test material is saved, the test preparation time for the sample replacement and cooling process is reduced, and the test efficiency is improved.

本发明涉及一种氢环境金属材料疲劳和断裂协同试验与评价方法及系统，属于金属材料临氢环境相容性领域。方法包括对疲劳与断裂协同试验试样进行预设压力预设温度氢环境下疲劳裂纹扩展试验和断裂韧性试验；基于所得的疲劳裂纹扩展曲线和所得的裂纹扩展阻力曲线，得预设压力预设温度氢环境中疲劳裂纹扩展拟合曲线和断裂韧性特征值；基于预设压力预设温度氢环境中疲劳裂纹扩展拟合曲线和断裂韧性特征值，完成金属材料模拟输氢管道在疲劳载荷工况下的安全评价。本发明根据缺陷长度替换疲劳裂纹试验为断裂韧性试验，实现了疲劳与断裂协同试验，无需进行试样跟换，不但节省了试验材料，减少了试样更换及降温过程等试验准备时间，提高了试验效率。

invention_title.text: Full-size PE pipeline hydrogen permeation and aging test integrated equipment
一种全尺寸PE管道氢渗透及老化测试一体化设备

extracted_name.value: 北京市燃气集团有限责任公司

abstract.text: The utility model discloses full-size PE pipeline hydrogen permeation and aging test integrated equipment which comprises a high-temperature aging oven, supporting plates are fixedly installed at the two ends of the bottom of an inner cavity of the high-temperature aging oven, a sealing mechanism used for testing is arranged at the tops of the supporting plates, and a PE pipe body is arranged on the inner side wall of the sealing mechanism; according to the utility model, the high-temperature aging oven, the sealing mechanism, the air intake and exhaust mechanism, the pressure reading instrument and the gas chromatograph are arranged in a matched manner, so that the hydrogen permeability of the full-size PE pipeline can be tested, and meanwhile, an aging test can be carried out in a hydrogen environment, thereby improving the test effect; the hydrogen permeability coefficient of hydrogen-doped natural gas in a PE pipeline can be measured through gas chromatography, so that the requirements of people are met, sealing operation during testing is achieved through the sealing mechanism, the gas inlet and outlet mechanism is used for achieving gas inlet and outlet operation during testing, and the pressure reading instrument and the gas chromatograph are used for analyzing and recording obtained data.

本实用新型公开了一种全尺寸PE管道氢渗透及老化测试一体化设备，包括高温老化箱，所述高温老化箱内腔底部的两端均固定安装有支板，所述支板的顶部设置有用于测试的密封机构，所述密封机构的内侧壁设置有PE管本体；本实用新型通过高温老化箱、密封机构、进排气机构、读压仪和气相色谱仪的配合设置，能够对全尺寸PE管道的氢渗透性能进行测试，同时还可在临氢环境中进行老化测试，从而提高测试的效果，可以通过气相色谱测量掺氢天然气在PE管道中的氢渗透系数的优点吗，以满足人们的需求，利用密封机构实现测试时的密封作业，而进排气机构用于实现测试时的进排气作业，读压仪和气相色谱仪实现分析以及记录所得数据。

abstract.text: The invention provides a rock salt creep experiment device in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, and belongs to the technical field of rock experiments, the rock salt creep experiment device comprises a cavity, the top and the side of the cavity are provided with openings, a top cover and a side cover, the top cover and the side cover are used for sealing the two openings respectively, and the side cover is provided with an observation window; an air injection hole and an exhaust hole are formed in one side, deviating from the side cover, of the side wall of the cavity, and the air injection hole is higher than the exhaust hole; the experiment assembling structure is arranged in the cavity, and the experiment assembling structure comprises a sample placing table, a limiting assembly and a loading rod; the gas injection and recovery system is arranged on one side of the cavity and used for injecting high-pressure hydrogen into the cavity and recovering the high-pressure hydrogen in the cavity; and the shooting system is arranged on one side where the side cover of the cavity is located and comprises a shooting device and a light source. By means of the salt rock creep experiment device in the high-pressure hydrogen environment, the safety of the experiment device can be improved, and potential safety hazards caused by the circuit and air tightness problems are reduced.

本申请提供一种高压氢环境下的盐岩蠕变实验装置，属于岩石实验技术领域，包括：腔体，腔体的顶部和侧部具有开口以及分别用于封闭两个开口的顶盖和侧盖，且侧盖上设置有观察窗口，腔体的侧壁上位于背离侧盖的一侧开设有注气孔和排气孔，注气孔的高度高于排气孔；实验装配结构，设置在腔体内，实验装配结构包括置样台、限位组件和加载杆；注气回收系统，设置在腔体的一侧，用于向腔体内注入高压氢气以及回收腔体内的高压氢气；拍摄系统，设置在腔体的侧盖所在的一侧，包括摄影装置和光源。通过本申请提供的一种高压氢环境下的盐岩蠕变实验装置，可以提升实验装置的安全性，减少因电路以及气密性问题导致的潜在安全隐患。

abstract.text: Provided is a method for manufacturing an austenitic alloy steel material that can improve mechanical properties even without improving a composition of a steel material and 5 an increase in the service life of a component in a high-pressure hydrogen environment can be expected. A method for manufacturing a precipitation-hardening austenitic alloy steel material, the method including: a hot forging step of providing a material for forging having a composition of the precipitation-hardening austenitic alloy steel material, and performing hot forging several times so that a total forging forming ratio is 30 or more, to form a forged 10 material. The method preferably includes a heat treatment step of additionally subjecting the forged material to a solution treatment and an aging treatment, to obtain a heat-treated steel material.

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of ultrahigh-speed motor materials and hydrogen energy equipment, in particular to a high-performance material combination for an ultrahigh-speed permanent magnet motor driven hydrogen circulating pump, which comprises a permanent magnet material: a neodymium iron boron 42SH magnet is adopted and subjected to Dy-Cu co-doping treatment, and the surface of the magnet is coated with a nickel-phosphorus alloy coating of 10-15 microns; the rotor sheath is made of TC11 titanium alloy (containing 3.5%-4.5% of Mo), and the hardness of the TC11 titanium alloy reaches 38-42 HRC after beta heat treatment; a pump body and an impeller are made of a combined structure of Hastelloy C276 and a SiC particle reinforced aluminum matrix composite (the volume fraction of SiC is 15%-20%), and the inner wall of the pump body is sprayed with a 50-80-micron diamond-like carbon (DLC) coating; hydrogen embrittlement resistance and stability are enhanced, the hydrogen embrittlement critical value of a key material is increased to 200 MPa.m < 1/2 > or above, and the continuous operation life under the 1.5 MPa hydrogen environment is longer than or equal to 8000 h and is prolonged by two times compared with a traditional material; the high-temperature magnetic performance attenuation rate of the permanent magnet is smaller than or equal to 5%, the fatigue strength of the rotor sheath is improved by 25%, and the requirement for long-term operation at the speed of 200000r/min is met.

本申请涉及超高速电机材料与氢能装备技术领域，具体为一种用于超高速永磁电机驱动氢气循环泵的高性能材料组合，包括永磁体材料：采用钕铁硼42SH磁体，经Dy‑Cu共掺杂处理，磁体表面包覆10‑15μm镍‑磷合金镀层；转子护套材料：选用TC11钛合金(含Mo3.5％‑4.5％)，经β热处理后硬度达38‑42HRC；泵体及叶轮材料：采用哈氏合金C276与SiC颗粒增强铝基复合材料(SiC体积分数15％‑20％)的组合结构，泵体内壁喷涂50‑80μm类金刚石(DLC)涂层；抗氢脆与稳定性增强：关键材料氢脆临界值提升至200MPa·m1/2以上，1.5MPa氢气环境下连续运行寿命≥8000h，较传统材料延长2倍；磁‑力性能衰减可控：永磁体高温磁性能衰减率≤5％，转子护套疲劳强度提升25％，满足200000r/min长期运行需求。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of motor iron core structures, in particular to a hydrogen circulating pump stator iron core structure adopting 0.05 mm silicon steel sheets. The hydrogen circulating pump stator iron core structure adopting 0.05 mm silicon steel sheets comprises an iron core body which is formed by laminating a plurality of silicon steel sheets with the thickness of 0.05 mm in the axial direction, and the surfaces of the silicon steel sheets are provided with insulating coatings; the stator yoke part is located on the periphery of the iron core body and is of an annular structure, and the thickness of the yoke part is 15-20 mm; the stator tooth parts are uniformly distributed along the inner circumference of the stator yoke part, the number of the stator tooth parts is 12-24, the width of each tooth part is 5-8mm, and a wire slot is formed between every two adjacent tooth parts; the eddy current path is shortened by the ultra-thin silicon steel sheets of 0.05 mm, and the high-frequency iron loss is reduced by more than 40% and the motor efficiency is improved by 5-8% by combining high-frequency low-loss materials; and the heat dissipation grooves and the graphene heat-conducting fins have a synergistic effect, so that the temperature rise of the iron core is reduced by 15-20 DEG C, and high-temperature potential safety hazards in a hydrogen environment are avoided.

本申请涉及电机铁芯结构技术领域，具体为一种采用0.05毫米硅钢片的氢气循环泵定子铁芯结构，一种采用0.05毫米硅钢片的氢气循环泵定子铁芯结构，包括铁芯本体：由多片厚度为0.05mm的硅钢片沿轴向叠压而成，所述硅钢片表面设有绝缘涂层；定子轭部：位于铁芯本体外周，呈环形结构，轭部厚度为15‑20mm；定子齿部：沿定子轭部内圆周均匀分布，数量为12‑24个，齿部宽度为5‑8mm，相邻齿部之间形成线槽；高频铁损显著降低：0.05mm超薄硅钢片缩短涡流路径，结合高频低损耗材质，高频下铁损降低40％以上，电机效率提升5％‑8％；散热性能增强：散热槽与石墨烯导热片协同作用，铁芯温升降低15‑20℃，避免氢气环境下的高温安全隐患。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of compressor cylinder body surface coating, and discloses a high-pressure piston type hydrogen compressor cylinder body surface PVD preparation process which comprises the following steps: step 1, matrix laser microtexturing and plasma activation: machining micro-pit arrays on the surfaces of a cylinder sleeve and a piston by adopting a pulse fiber laser; and the oxide layer is removed through Ar < + >/H2 mixed plasma etching, and a nanoscale activated surface is generated. According to the method, the film-substrate binding force is remarkably enhanced through laser microtexture and plasma activation, and the coating is prevented from being peeled off; by utilizing a multi-layer composite structure and a rare earth doping technology, the coating structure is extremely densified, a hydrogen permeation path is effectively blocked, and hydrogen embrittlement is fundamentally inhibited; gradient design and fluorinated hydrophobic treatment are adopted, so that the surface is endowed with low friction coefficient and super-hydrophobicity, and abrasion and corrosion are reduced; meanwhile, high hardness, high toughness and excellent corrosion resistance are considered, and the reliability, durability and safety of the cylinder body in the high-pressure hydrogen environment are comprehensively improved.

本发明涉及压缩机缸体表面镀层技术领域，公开了一种高压活塞式氢气压缩机缸体表面PVD的制备工艺，包括以下步骤，步骤1、基体激光微织构与等离子活化：采用脉冲光纤激光器在缸套和活塞表面加工微凹坑阵列；并通过Ar+/H2混合等离子体刻蚀去除氧化层并生成纳米级活化表面。本发明通过激光微织构与等离子活化显著增强膜基结合力，防止涂层剥落；利用多层复合结构及稀土掺杂技术，极致致密化涂层结构，有效阻断氢渗透路径，从根本上抑制氢脆；采用梯度设计与氟化疏水处理，赋予表面低摩擦系数和超疏水性，减少磨损与腐蚀；同时兼顾高硬度、高韧性及优异耐腐蚀性，全面提升缸体在高压氢气环境下的可靠性、耐久性与安全性。

invention_title.text: Multiphase preparation method of aniline derivative
一种苯胺衍生物的多相制备方法

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of fine chemicals and related chemistry, and provides a heterogeneous preparation method of an aniline derivative, which comprises the following steps: taking a nitrobenzene derivative as a raw material, and reacting in an organic solvent at 60-100 DEG C for 24 hours in a hydrogen environment under the action of a high-entropy alloy catalyst to obtain the corresponding aniline derivative. According to the method, the high-entropy alloy is used as the catalyst, the reaction selectivity is high, the reaction system is simple, the substrate compatibility is good, the highest yield can reach 97% or above, and the catalyst is good in stability and can be recycled. The aniline derivative prepared by the invention has a wide range of applications, and has an extremely important position in drug design and drug synthesis.

本发明属于精细化学品及相关化学技术领域，提供了一种苯胺衍生物的多相制备方法，该方法以硝基苯衍生物为原料，氢气环境下，在高熵合金催化剂的作用下，于有机溶剂中，在60‑100 °C反应24小时，即得到相应的苯胺衍生物。本发明的方法使用高熵合金作为催化剂，反应选择性高，反应的体系简单，底物兼容性好，最高产率可达97%以上，催化剂稳定性好、可回收利用。本发明制备的苯胺衍生物具有相当广泛的用途，在药物设计和药物合成中具有极其重要地位。

abstract.text: The invention relates to intelligent agent test equipment for intelligently and efficiently evaluating the fatigue crack growth rate of hydrogen pipeline steel and a use method of the intelligent agent test equipment. The problem that the fatigue crack growth rate test efficiency of a material is low under the gaseous hydrogen environment and the fatigue coupling effect is solved. The equipment mainly comprises a high-purity N2 gas cylinder, a high-purity H2 gas cylinder, a hydrogen-doped gas cylinder I, a hydrogen-doped gas cylinder II, an electromagnetic valve I, an electromagnetic valve II, an electromagnetic valve III, an electromagnetic valve IV, a gas inlet pipeline, a vacuum pump, a vacuum gauge, a pressure gauge, a high-pressure hydrogen environment fatigue crack growth rate performance test system and an artificial intelligence decision and control system. Multi-field coupling conditions such as stress amplitude, frequency, pressure and hydrogen doping ratio can be integrated, and the crack propagation behavior of a pipeline steel material in an actual hydrogen service environment can be simulated. A direct-current potential drop device is used for monitoring the fatigue crack propagation state in real time, an artificial intelligence model is embedded at the same time, and load, environment and crack data collected in real time are subjected to online analysis.

本发明涉及一种临氢管线钢疲劳裂纹扩展速率智能化高效评价的智能体试验设备及其使用方法，解决材料在气态氢气环境与疲劳耦合作用下疲劳裂纹扩展速率测试效率低的问题。该设备主要由高纯N2气瓶、高纯H2气瓶、掺氢气瓶Ⅰ、掺氢气瓶Ⅱ、电磁阀Ⅰ、电磁阀Ⅱ、电磁阀Ⅲ、电磁阀Ⅳ、进气管路、真空泵、真空计、压力表、高压氢环境疲劳裂纹扩展速率性能测试系统、人工智能决策和控制系统组成，能够集成应力幅、频率、压力、掺氢比等多场耦合条件，模拟管线钢材料在实际临氢服役环境下的裂纹扩展行为。使用直流电位降装置实时监测疲劳裂纹扩展状态，同时嵌入人工智能模型，对实时采集的载荷、环境、裂纹数据进行在线分析。

invention_title.text: Neutron diffraction testing device and method for hydrogen storage material in liquid hydrogen environment
一种液氢环境下储氢材料的中子衍射测试装置和方法

extracted_name.value: 中国科学院高能物理研究所

abstract.text: The invention relates to a neutron diffraction testing device and method for a hydrogen storage material in a liquid hydrogen environment, in particular to the technical field of hydrogen storage material testing, and the neutron diffraction testing device comprises a neutron diffraction testing unit and a liquid hydrogen environment providing unit arranged between radial collimators of the neutron diffraction testing unit; the liquid hydrogen environment providing unit comprises a hydrogen end, a liquid helium end, a liquid hydrogen environment end and a gas recovery end; the hydrogen end is connected with the liquid hydrogen environment end through the heat exchanger; the liquid helium end is connected with a cold medium channel of the heat exchanger; and a hydrogen outlet of the liquid hydrogen environment end is connected with the gas recovery end. According to the neutron diffraction testing device for the hydrogen storage material in the liquid hydrogen environment, provided by the invention, the liquid hydrogen environment unit is introduced into the testing device, so that neutron diffraction testing of the hydrogen storage material in the dynamic hydrogen absorption/desorption or service process in the liquid hydrogen environment is realized, and crystal structure evolution information and related information such as material stress and strain are obtained; therefore, the performance characterization accuracy of the hydrogen storage material is improved.

本发明涉及一种液氢环境下储氢材料的中子衍射测试装置和方法，具体涉及储氢材料测试技术领域，包括：中子衍射测试单元，和设置于中子衍射测试单元的径向准直器之间的液氢环境提供单元；液氢环境提供单元包括：氢气端、液氦端、液氢环境端和气体回收端；氢气端通过换热器与液氢环境端相连接；液氦端与换热器的冷介质通道相连接；液氢环境端的氢气出口与气体回收端相连接。本发明提供的液氢环境下储氢材料的中子衍射测试装置，通过在测试装置中引入液氢环境单元，实现了储氢材料在液氢环境下动态吸/放氢或服役过程中的中子衍射测试，以获取晶体结构演变信息以及相关的材料应力应变等信息，从而提升储氢材料进行性能表征的准确性。

invention_title.text: Reduction-state catalyst suitable for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas-phase hydrogenation as well as preparation and application of reduction-state catalyst
一种适用于硝基苯气相加氢制备苯胺的还原态催化剂及其制备和应用

extracted_name.value: NANJING RUNHE ZHUORUI NEW MATERIAL TECH CO LTD
南京润和卓锐新材料科技有限公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses a reduction-state catalyst suitable for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas-phase hydrogenation as well as a preparation method and application of the reduction-state catalyst, and belongs to the technical field of catalysts. The catalyst is used in a reaction for preparing aniline through nitrobenzene gas phase hydrogenation, the induction period is shorter than 3 h, the total amount of by-products in the induction period is lower than 120 ppm, and during stable operation in the induction period, phenol in an aniline product is lower than 40 ppm, and cyclohexanol in the aniline product is lower than 15 ppm; in the reduction process of the catalyst, the catalyst can tolerate rapid reduction of high-concentration hydrogen or pure hydrogen, does not influence the activity and selectivity of an induction period, has the condition that the catalyst is supplemented into a fluidized bed device in production in an oxidation state to be rapidly reduced and put into use in a high-concentration hydrogen environment in the bed, and does not influence the quality of an aniline product.

本发明公开了一种适用于硝基苯气相加氢制备苯胺的还原态催化剂及其制备方法和应用，属于催化剂技术领域。该催化剂用于硝基苯气相加氢制苯胺反应中，诱导期低于3h，诱导期内副产物总量低于120ppm，渡过诱导期稳定运行时，苯胺产品中苯酚低于40ppm，环己醇低于15ppm；该催化剂还原过程中，可以耐受高浓度氢气或纯氢气快速还原，而不影响诱导期活性及选择性，具备以氧化态形式补加进正在生产的流化床装置中在床内高浓度氢气环境中快速还原投入使用的条件，且不影响苯胺产品质量。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of sealing valves, in particular to a hydrogen embrittlement-resistant double-piston-effect high-pressure ball valve and an intelligent pressure relief method thereof, and can solve the problems that a traditional high-pressure ball valve is poor in sealing performance, difficult to adapt to pressure change, incapable of meeting the intelligent characteristic, difficult to achieve accurate pressure control and poor in pressure relief effect to a certain extent. The hydrogen embrittlement failure is easily caused. The ball valve comprises a double-piston-effect valve seat, a front valve seat and a rear valve seat of the double-piston-effect valve seat float independently to form double piston rings, and a discharge channel with the diameter of 2.0 +/-0.1 mm is integrated; the triple dynamic sealing system covers metal-to-metal primary sealing, PTFE and expanded graphite composite ring secondary sealing and hastelloy corrugated pipe fire sealing; and the valve body is subjected to subzero treatment. According to the intelligent pressure relief method, the pressure gradient is monitored in real time through a piezoelectric sensor; and when the pressure is 2.0 MPa, the piezoelectric actuator expands the hole diameter of the discharge hole. According to the invention, the overpressure explosion risk of a valve cavity is solved, a hydrogen permeation path is blocked, hydrogen embrittlement is eliminated, and 15,000 times of zero-leakage circulation in a 70MPa hydrogen environment is realized.

本申请涉及密封阀门技术领域，具体而言，涉及一种抗氢脆双活塞效应高压球阀及其智能泄压方法，一定程度上可以解决传统高压球阀密封性能差且难以适应压力变化，不能满足智能化特点，难以实现精准的压力控制，易发生氢脆失效的问题。该球阀包括双活塞效应阀座，其前阀座与后阀座独立浮动，形成双活塞环，并集成直径2.0±0.1mm泄放通道；三重动态密封系统，涵盖金属对金属主密封、PTFE+膨胀石墨复合环次密封以及哈氏合金波纹管火灾密封；经深冷处理的阀体。智能泄压方法通过压电传感器实时监测压力梯度，当阀腔与管道压差ΔP>2.0MPa时，压电驱动器扩大泄放孔径。该发明解决阀腔超压爆炸风险，阻断氢渗透路径，消除氢脆，实现70MPa氢环境下15,000次零泄漏循环。

invention_title.text: Method for preparing p-aminobenzoic acid through chlorination, hydrolysis and hydrogenation of p-nitrotoluene
一种对硝基甲苯氯化水解加氢制备对氨基苯甲酸的方法

extracted_name.value: ZHIHUA HENAN NEW MAT CO LTD
智华（河南）新材料有限责任公司

abstract.text: The invention provides a method for preparing p-aminobenzoic acid through chlorination, hydrolysis and hydrogenation of p-nitrotoluene, and belongs to the technical field of organic compound preparation. Comprising the following steps: melting p-nitrotoluene, and performing chlorination reaction under the catalysis of azodiisobutyronitrile to generate a chlorinated product containing p-nitrobenzyl chloride; mixing the chlorination product with liquid caustic soda and sodium hypochlorite for hydrolysis reaction, separating liquid after reaction, and acidifying an upper-layer water phase to obtain p-nitrobenzoic acid; the method comprises the following steps: mixing p-nitrobenzoic acid with methanol and a Pd/C catalyst, carrying out hydrogenation reaction in a hydrogen environment, and filtering, distilling, cooling, centrifuging and drying after the reaction to obtain p-aminobenzoic acid. The method is simple in process route, mild in reaction condition, high in product purity, high in yield and suitable for industrial production, raw materials are easy to obtain, hydrogen chloride gas generated in the chlorination reaction and p-nitrotoluene obtained after the hydrolysis reaction are recycled, cyclic utilization of resources is achieved, and the production cost is reduced.

本发明提供了一种对硝基甲苯氯化水解加氢制备对氨基苯甲酸的方法，属于有机化合物制备技术领域。包括：将对硝基甲苯熔融后在偶氮二异丁基腈催化下进行氯化反应，生成含对硝基氯苄的氯化产物；将氯化产物与液碱和次氯酸钠混合进行水解反应，反应后分液，取上层水相酸化得到对硝基苯甲酸；将对硝基苯甲酸与甲醇和Pd/C催化剂混合，在氢气环境下进行加氢反应，反应后过滤、蒸馏、降温、离心、干燥得到对氨基苯甲酸。本发明工艺路线简单，反应条件温和，原料易得，产品纯度高，收率高，适合工业化生产，且通过回收利用氯化反应产生的氯化氢气体和水解反应后的对硝基甲苯，实现了资源的循环利用，降低了生产成本。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a full-size pressure regulator hydrogen permeation and pressure regulating performance testing integrated device which comprises hydrogen/hydrogen-doped natural gas, a gas source, a valve set, a tee joint, a pressure gauge set, a pipeline, a sealing clamp, a pressure regulator, a gas chromatograph and a vacuum pump. The gas source is connected with the clamp through a pipeline, a sealing area is formed through the sealing clamp and the pipe sleeve, the permeability coefficients of pure hydrogen and hydrogen-doped natural gas in the pressure regulator can be tested by combining a gas chromatograph, a vacuum pump and the like, and meanwhile the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator in the hydrogen environment is researched. The hydrogen permeability coefficient of the hydrogen-doped natural gas in the pressure regulator can be measured through gas chromatography; the device can work for a long time, the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator in the hydrogen environment can be researched, and the hydrogen permeability of the full-size pressure regulator can be tested while the pressure regulating performance of the pressure regulator can be tested in the hydrogen environment.

本发明公开了一种全尺寸调压器道氢渗透及调压性能测试一体化设备，包括氢气/掺氢天然气、气源、阀门组、三通、压力表组、管道、密封夹具、调压器、气相色谱仪和真空泵，所述密封夹具用于将所述调压器两端与燃气管道密封连接，所述气源通过管路与所述夹具连接，包括通过密封夹具、管套形成密封区域，结合气相色谱仪、真空泵等，可测试纯氢和掺氢天然气在调压器中的渗透系数，同时研究临氢环境下调压器的调压性能，可以通过气相色谱测量掺氢天然气在调压器中的氢渗透系数；可以长时间工作，研究临氢环境中调压器的调压性能，能做到在测试全尺寸调压器的氢渗透性能的同时，还能对调压器的调压性能进行临氢环境测试。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a hydrogen environment metal material constant load testing device and a CTOD-based testing method.The high-pressure gas storage bin in the device is connected with an upper bin cover and a lower bin cover in a sealed mode, the upper bin cover is provided with a gas inlet pipeline, the lower bin cover is provided with a gas outlet pipeline, the high-pressure gas storage bin is filled with hydrogen, the upper bin cover is provided with an upper loading rod, and the upper loading rod is provided with a lower loading rod; the upper end of the upper loading rod is connected with a mechanical testing machine loading head, the lower end of the loading rod extends into the high-pressure gas storage bin, a load sensor is installed on the upper loading rod in the high-pressure gas storage bin, a lower loading rod is arranged on the lower bin cover, the upper end of the lower loading rod extends into the high-pressure gas storage bin, and the lower end of the lower loading rod is connected with a mechanical testing machine base. A constant-load sample is connected between the upper loading rod and the lower loading rod, an extensometer is mounted on the constant-load sample, and a temperature sensor and a pressure sensor are mounted in the high-pressure gas storage bin. The device can effectively provide a high-pressure hydrogen test environment, the method is not limited by the wall thickness of the pipe, and the fracture toughness value of the sample in the hydrogen environment is obtained.

本发明公开了一种氢环境金属材料恒载荷测试装置及基于CTOD的测试方法，装置中的高压储气仓密封连接有上仓盖和下仓盖，上仓盖上设有进气管路，下仓盖上设有出气管路，高压储气仓内填充有氢气，上仓盖上设有上加载杆，上加载杆的上端连接有力学试验机加载头，加载杆的下端伸入高压储气仓内，高压储气仓内的上加载杆上安装有载荷传感器，下舱盖上设有下加载杆，下加载杆的上端伸入高压储气仓内，下加载杆的下端连接有力学试验机底座，上加载杆和下加载杆之间连接有恒载荷试样，恒载荷试样上安装有引伸计，高压储气仓内安装有温度传感器和压力传感器。本发明的装置可有效提供高压氢试验环境，方法可不受管材壁厚限制，获取试样在氢环境中的断裂韧性值。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of material testing, and discloses a method for testing hydrogen induced cracking of a material in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, which comprises the following steps: firstly, preparing an extended compact tensile sample based on size data of a standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample and a standard compact tensile sample; then carrying out fatigue crack prefabrication on the extended compact tensile sample through a fatigue testing machine, and carrying out shape conversion to obtain a standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample with fatigue cracks, and taking the standard wedge-shaped opening loading sample as a target wedge-shaped opening loading sample; applying a load to the tail end of the fatigue crack on the target wedge-shaped opening loading sample, and placing the target wedge-shaped opening loading sample in a high-pressure hydrogen environment to determine the length of the current hydrogen-induced crack; and finally, determining a stress intensity factor threshold value of the to-be-tested material according to the initial applied stress intensity factor, the current hydrogen-induced crack length and the standard value of the hydrogen-induced crack length. According to the method, not only can a more accurate hydrogen-induced delayed cracking stress intensity factor threshold value be obtained, but also the test cost can be effectively reduced.

本申请涉及材料测试技术领域，公开了一种高压氢环境下材料氢致开裂测试方法，其中，首先基于标准楔形张开加载试样与标准紧凑拉伸试样的尺寸数据制备扩展型紧凑拉伸试样；然后通过疲劳试验机对扩展型紧凑拉伸试样进行疲劳裂纹预制，并进行形制转换，得到具有疲劳裂纹的标准楔形张开加载试样，作为目标楔形张开加载试样；接着对目标楔形张开加载试样上的疲劳裂纹末端施加载荷，将其放入高压氢环境中，以确定当前氢致裂纹长度；最后根据初始施加应力强度因子、当前氢致裂纹长度和氢致裂纹长度的标准值，确定待测试材料的应力强度因子门槛值。该方法不仅可以获得更为精确的氢致滞后开裂应力强度因子门槛值，还可以有效降低测试成本。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the field of hydrogen induced fracture, and particularly discloses a mode-adjustable fracture phase field simulation method considering a hydrogen concentration driving mechanism, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining material parameters of a test piece; obtaining constitutive equations of stress, phase field and chemical potential through a non-equilibrium state energy dissipation equation; obtaining evolution equations and boundary conditions of the mechanical field, the phase field and the chemical field; establishing a hydrogen-assisted fracture phase field model; establishing a hydrogen embrittlement fracture phase field model with an adjustable mode; obtaining the change relation of the initial deflection angle of the crack along with the weight coefficient; and obtaining results of stress distribution, phase field variables, crack initiation and expansion evolution. Effective regulation and control of the initial deflection angle of the mixed type crack in the hydrogen environment are achieved, comparison verification is conducted on the initial deflection angle and test data, meanwhile, relative contribution of ball quantity and deviator crack driving energy is considered, accurate evaluation of the initiation and expansion path of the mixed type crack is achieved, and the method is suitable for popularization and application. Therefore, an effective method is provided for accurate prediction and mechanism explanation of complex hydrogen embrittlement fracture behaviors.

本发明涉及氢致断裂领域，具体的公开了一种考虑氢浓度驱动机制的模式可调断裂相场模拟方法，获取试件的材料参数；通过非平衡态能量耗散方程，获得应力、相场和化学势的本构方程；获得力学场、相场和化学场的演化方程及边界条件；建立氢辅助断裂相场模型；建立模式可调的氢脆断裂相场模型；获得裂纹初始偏转角随权重系数的变化关系；获得应力分布、相场变量、裂纹萌生及扩展演化的结果。实现了氢气环境下混合型裂纹的初始偏转角的有效调控，并与试验数据进行对比验证，同时考虑球量和偏量裂纹驱动能量的相对贡献，实现了混合型裂纹的萌生与扩展路径的精确评估，从而为复杂氢脆断裂行为的精准预测与机理阐释提供有效方法。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a subsea pipeline steel hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation prediction method based on a hydrogen-induced dislocation pinning-unpinning mechanism, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a four-stage nonlinear constitutive model of a pipeline steel material in a given hydrogen environment; the four-stage nonlinear constitutive model comprises constitutive relation equations of different stages, which are respectively constructed in four stages of pinning hardening, platform, nail removal and post-nail-removal hardening based on elastic-plastic mechanical behaviors of the pipeline steel material; and endowing the pipeline steel material in the constructed finite element model with the four-stage nonlinear constitutive model, and carrying out pipeline steel hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation prediction. According to the method, the staged nonlinear elastic-plastic constitutive model is constructed on the basis of the mechanical property change of the pipeline steel in the hydrogen environment due to hydrogen-induced dislocation pinning and nail disengaging, and the model is used for predicting the hydrogen-induced fatigue crack propagation of the subsea pipeline steel, so that the prediction precision of the crack propagation behavior of the material in the hydrogen environment is remarkably improved.

本发明公开一种基于氢致位错钉扎‑脱钉机制的海底管线钢氢致疲劳裂纹扩展预测方法，包括:构建管线钢材料在给定氢环境下的四阶段非线性本构模型，所述四阶段非线性本构模型包括基于管线钢材料的弹塑性力学行为的钉扎硬化、平台、脱钉、脱钉后硬化四个阶段分别构建的不同阶段的本构关系方程；将四阶段非线性本构模型赋予构建的有限元模型中的管线钢材料，进行管线钢氢致疲劳裂纹扩展预测。本发明基于管线钢在氢气环境中因氢致位错钉扎与脱钉导致的力学性能变化，构建分阶段非线性弹塑性本构模型，并运用该模型进行海底管线钢氢致疲劳裂纹扩展预测，显著提升氢环境下材料裂纹扩展行为的预测精度。

abstract.text: The invention discloses an alpine region hydrogen-containing comprehensive energy system applying a vortex tube and a dispatching method. The system comprises an electrolytic bath, a compressor, a hydrogen storage tank, the vortex tube, a hot end heat exchanger, a heat storage tank, a cold end heat exchanger, a cold storage tank, a hydrogen fuel cell and a demand side. And the demand side comprises an alpine region oxygen environment, an alpine region hydrogen environment and hydrogen-doped natural gas users. According to the comprehensive energy system, oxygen prepared in an electrolytic cell is directly fed into an oxygen demand side, hydrogen enters a vortex tube through pressurization storage, energy separation is carried out in the vortex tube, cold and hot hydrogen flow division is achieved, different hydrogen flows of the vortex tube can be adjusted and changed, efficient distribution of hydrogen energy is achieved, and the overall economical efficiency is improved. According to the comprehensive energy system, the energy utilization efficiency and flexibility can be greatly improved, the special geographical environment requirements of the alpine region are met, and the energy self-sufficiency and emergency guarantee capacity is enhanced.

本发明公开了一种应用涡流管的高寒地区含氢综合能源系统及调度方法，所述系统中包括电解槽、压缩机、储氢罐、涡流管、热端换热器、储热罐、冷端换热器、储冷罐、氢燃料电池以及需求侧。所述需求侧包括高寒地区用氧环境、高寒地区用氢环境以及掺氢天然气用户。所述综合能源系统中在电解槽中制得的氧气直接送入氧气需求侧，氢气通过加压存储进入涡流管中，在涡流管中进行能量分离，实现冷、热氢气分流，并可以通过调度更改涡流管的不同氢气流量，实现氢能的高效分配，并提高整体经济性。本发明提出的综合能源系统可以极大提升能源利用效率和灵活性，适应高寒地区特殊地理环境需求，增强能源自给与应急保障能力。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a high-pressure hydrogen environment box and a test method for balancing pressure and reducing friction. The environment box comprises a test box body and a gas chamber, a sealing cavity is formed in the test box body; the air chamber is arranged on the test box body in a penetrating mode to form an upper air chamber and a lower air chamber, the upper air chamber and the lower air chamber are communicated with the internal sealing cavity, an upper piston rod is fixedly installed in the upper air chamber, and a lower piston rod is arranged in the lower air chamber in a sliding mode. The upper piston rod and the lower piston rod are respectively sealed with the upper air chamber and the lower air chamber through sealing structures, and the upper piston rod and the lower piston rod are used for mounting a test piece and an extensometer; the invention aims to solve the problems that when a high-pressure hydrogen environment fatigue device in the prior art carries out a fatigue test, an environment box and a piston rod are sealed only by using a sealing ring, so that air leakage is easily caused, and if multiple sealing rings are used, internal and external pressure difference is caused, so that friction force is increased, and test data are influenced.

本发明公开了一种用于高压氢气环境箱及平衡压力减少摩擦的试验方法，其中环境箱包括试验箱本体以及气室；所述试验箱本体内部具有密封腔；所述气室贯穿设置在试验箱本体上后形成上气室以及下气室，上气室以及下气室与内部的密封腔连通，上气室内部固定安装有上活塞杆，下气室内部滑动设置有下活塞杆，上活塞杆与下活塞杆分别通过密封结构与上气室以及下气室之间形成密封，上活塞杆与下活塞杆上用于安装测试件以及引伸计；本发明目的是解决现有技术中的高压氢环境疲劳装置在进行疲劳测试时，环境箱与活塞杆之间只使用密封圈密封很容易漏气，若使用多重密封圈，会导致内外压差从而增大摩擦力影响试验数据的问题。

invention_title.text: Sintering method for alternately strengthening oxygen reduction in vacuum and hydrogen environments
一种真空与氢气环境交替强化降氧的烧结方法

abstract.text: The invention relates to a sintering method for alternately strengthening oxygen reduction in a vacuum and hydrogen environment, which comprises the following steps: uniformly doping organic carbon into a metal powder raw material, utilizing the characteristics of high-temperature volatilization and decomposition of the organic carbon, heating the organic carbon to volatilize or decompose the organic carbon into CO, CO2, H2O and other gases in a presintering stage, and forming through open pores in a metal blank after overflowing. The pore structure provides a channel penetrating into the green body for hydrogen, so that the hydrogen can be directly subjected to reduction reaction with metal oxide in the green body, and the problem that the oxide in the green body is difficult to fully reduce due to limited mass transfer in the traditional process is effectively solved. In the reduction process, vacuum hydrogen circulation deoxidation can be carried out for multiple times according to the requirement of a sintered product on oxygen element; in the high-temperature sintering process, a vacuum dehydrogenation method can be carried out according to the requirement of the sintered product on the hydrogen element, the oxygen and hydrogen element content of the final product is reduced, and the comprehensive performance of the sintered product is improved.

一种真空与氢气环境交替强化降氧的烧结方法，本发明通过在金属粉末原料中均匀掺入有机碳，利用其高温挥发、分解的特性，在预烧结阶段，有机碳受热挥发或分解为CO、CO2及H2O等气体，溢出后在金属坯体内部形成贯通性开放孔隙。该孔隙结构为氢气提供了深入坯体内部的通道，使氢气能够直接与坯体内部的金属氧化物发生还原反应，有效解决了传统工艺中坯体内部氧化物因传质受限而难以充分还原的问题。还原过程中，根据烧结产品对氧元素的要求，可进行多次真空氢气循环脱氧；在高温烧结过程中，根据烧结产品对氢元素的要求，可进行真空脱氢的方法，降低最终产品氧和氢元素的含量，提升烧结制品的综合性能。

invention_title.text: Synthesis method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol
一种2-甲基-3-异丙基苯酚的合成方法

extracted_name.value: 上海泰坦科技股份有限公司

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of organic synthesis, and particularly discloses a synthetic method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol. The invention relates to a synthetic method of 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol. The synthetic method comprises the following steps: protecting phenolic hydroxyl in 3-bromo-2-methylphenol by using a protecting group to prepare the 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol, mixing the intermediate B, a palladium catalyst, isopropenyl boric acid pinacoline ester, a second base catalyst and a polar solvent, and performing Suzuki reaction in a nitrogen environment to obtain an intermediate C; and mixing the intermediate C, palladium on carbon and a protonic solvent, and carrying out hydrogenation reaction in a hydrogen environment to obtain a target product D. The synthesis method disclosed by the invention is high in product yield, mature in process, environment-friendly, safe and suitable for large-scale production, and the application range of the 2-methyl-3-isopropyl phenol can be effectively expanded.

本申请涉及有机合成技术领域，具体公开了一种2‑甲基‑3‑异丙基苯酚的合成方法。一种2‑甲基‑3‑异丙基苯酚的合成方法，包括以下步骤：由保护基对3‑溴‑2‑甲基苯酚中的酚羟基进行保护制备而成；将中间体B、钯催化剂、异丙烯基硼酸嚬哪醇酯、第二碱催化剂、极性溶剂混合后，在氮气环境进行铃木反应，得到中间体C；将中间体C、钯碳、质子性溶剂混合后，在氢气环境进行加氢反应，得到目标产物D。本申请的合成方法，产物收率高，工艺成熟，环保安全，适合放大生产，可有效扩大2‑甲基‑3‑异丙基苯酚的应用范围。

金属材料与氢环境相容性测试装置

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of metal mechanical property detection testing equipment, in particular to a metal material and hydrogen environment compatibility testing device which comprises an upper clamp, a vacuum pump and a first gas storage bottle, the first gas storage bottle is used for storing high-pressure gas of types required by testing, one end of the upper clamp is detachably connected with a sample, and the other end of the upper clamp is detachably connected with a second gas storage bottle. The upper clamp is used for blocking a central channel of a sample and forming a first cavity body, the vacuum pump and the first gas storage bottle are respectively communicated with the first cavity body, and during use, the upper clamp can be detached from one end of the sample, and the sealed first cavity body is formed between the upper clamp and the central channel of the sample; the second cavity cools the sample to a required temperature, or the sample is heated to the required temperature through the induction heating coil, so that the temperature control during the test of the sample is realized, the test requirement is met, the test accuracy is improved, the test cost is reduced, and the test safety is guaranteed.

本实用新型涉及金属力学性能检测试验设备技术领域，尤其是涉及金属材料与氢环境相容性测试装置，包括上夹具、真空泵和第一储气瓶，所述第一储气瓶用于存储测试所需种类的高压气体，所述上夹具的一端与试样可拆卸连接，所述上夹具用于将试样的中心通道封堵并形成第一空腔体，所述真空泵和第一储气瓶分别与第一空腔体连通，在使用时，通过在试样的一端可拆卸上夹具，并且上夹具与试样的中心通道之间形成密封的第一空腔体，第二空腔体对试样进行冷却值所需温度，或者通过感应加热线圈对试样加热至所需温度，实现对试样测试时的温度控制，满足测试要求，提高了测试准确性，降低了测试成本，以及保住了测试的安全性。

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of metal materials, and discloses high-nitrogen austenitic stainless steel for an ultralow-temperature environment and a preparation method thereof. The steel comprises the following components in percentage by weight: 0.01% of C # imgabs0 #, 0.1%-0.3% of Si, 1.5%-2.0% of Mn, 16.5%-18.5% of Cr, 12.5%-14.5% of Ni, 2.0%-3.0% of Mo, 0.30%-0.40% of N and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurity elements. The preparation method comprises the steps of high-pressure nitrogen injection, electric arc furnace crude smelting, vacuum induction furnace refining, temperature control cooling, rolling and heat treatment, aluminum powder is added in stages in the crude smelting process to inhibit nitride generation, and the nitrogen dissolution index NS is proposed to be used for representing the effective dissolution behavior of nitrogen. The yield strength of the obtained material at room temperature is greater than 430 MPa, the tensile strength is greater than 740 MPa, the impact energy is greater than 420 J, and the impact energy in a liquid hydrogen environment is greater than 260 J.

本发明属于金属材料技术领域，公开一种超低温环境用高氮奥氏体不锈钢及其制备方法。C#imgabs0#0.01%、Si：0.1%~0.3%、Mn：1.5%~2.0%、Cr：16.5%~18.5%、Ni：12.5%~14.5%、Mo：2.0%~3.0%、N：0.30%~0.40%，余量为Fe和不可避免的杂质元素。制备方法包括高压氮气注入、电弧炉粗炼、真空感应炉精炼、控温冷却、轧制与热处理，并在粗炼过程中通过分阶段投加铝粉以抑制氮化物生成，提出“氮溶解指数NS”用于表征氮的有效溶解行为。所得材料在室温下的屈服强度＞430MPa，抗拉强度＞740MPa，冲击功＞420J，液氢环境下的冲击功＞260J。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen energy conveying and material performance testing, in particular to a testing structure for hydrogen permeation testing in a high-pressure gas-phase hydrogen environment and an installation method and application of the testing structure. The testing structure comprises a sample body and an insulation sealing assembly, and the sample body is of a double-step disc structure; the uppermost edge of the first sealing insulation assembly is flush with the upper end face of the cylindrical platform, the sample body is installed on the inner side of the first sealing insulation assembly in a matched mode, the second sealing insulation assembly is in a shape with an upward opening, and the first sealing insulation assembly is installed in the second sealing insulation assembly in a matched mode. The test surface of the sample body of the test structure and the gas main flow keep a consistent flow velocity field, and when the test structure is used for testing, the permeation behavior of the hydrogen flow on the material surface can be truly reflected; all the clamping and conducting structures are arranged outside the pipe wall of the test pipeline or at the left part of the sample body, so that flow field disturbance is prevented from being introduced into a main airflow path.

本发明涉及氢能输送与材料性能测试技术领域，是一种用于高压气相氢环境下氢渗透测试的测试结构及其安装方法和应用，该测试结构，包括试样本体和绝缘密封组件，试样本体呈双阶圆盘结构；第一密封绝缘组件的最上边缘与圆柱平台的上端面齐平，试样本体配合安装第一密封绝缘组件的内侧，第二密封绝缘组件呈开口朝上的形，第一密封绝缘组件配合安装在第二密封绝缘组件内。本发明所测试结构的试样本体的测试面与气体主流保持一致流速场，利用该测试结构测试时，能够真实反映氢流对材料表面的渗透行为；所有夹紧与导通结构均设置于测试管道的管壁外部或试样本体左部，避免在气流主路径中引入流场扰动。

abstract.text: The utility model relates to the technical field of experiment machines, in particular to a high-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen environment test experiment table, which not only collects hydrogen after an experiment is completed, facilitates subsequent continuous utilization and improves the utilization rate of the hydrogen, but also performs multiple protection measures on the device, avoids hydrogen leakage and improves the safety of the device. Comprising an experiment table; the device further comprises a protection mechanism, a sealing mechanism, an experiment mechanism, an inflation mechanism and a gas storage mechanism, the protection mechanism is installed on the experiment table and avoids explosion caused by hydrogen leakage, the sealing mechanism is installed on the experiment table and avoids hydrogen leakage, and the experiment mechanism is installed on the experiment table and conducts a clamping test on a workpiece. The inflation mechanism is installed on the experiment table and heats and conveys hydrogen into the experiment table, and the gas storage mechanism is installed on the inflation mechanism and pumps out and stores the hydrogen after an experiment is completed.

本实用新型涉及实验机的技术领域，特别是涉及一种高温高压氢气环境测试实验台，其不仅在实验完成后将氢气收集，方便后续继续利用，提高了氢气的利用率，而且对装置进行了多重防护措施，避免了氢气泄漏，提高了装置的安全性；包括实验台；还包括防护机构、密封机构、实验机构、充气机构和储气机构，防护机构安装在实验台上并避免氢气泄漏发生爆炸，密封机构安装在实验台上并避免氢气泄漏，实验机构安装在实验台上并对工件进行夹持测试，充气机构安装在实验台上并将氢气加热输送到实验台内，储气机构安装在充气机构上并在实验完成后将氢气抽出储存。

abstract.text: According to the hydrogen pipeline leakage rate detection method, the valve and the system, the hydrogen pipeline is detected by using a program, a hydrogen leakage point can be quickly positioned, the manual detection time is shortened, meanwhile, an operator can be prevented from being located in a hydrogen environment for a long time, the potential safety hazard is reduced, and the detection efficiency is improved. If a plurality of elbows, tee joints, joints and other connecting pieces are arranged in the pipeline of the detection system, the gas flowability is poor, and the time can be properly increased; if the pipeline of the detection system is basically a straight pipe, the time can be properly shortened, the flexibility of the system can be effectively improved, and personalized setting is carried out according to system application scenes so as to improve the detection efficiency.

本发明公开了一种氢气管路泄漏量检测方法及阀门、系统，利用程序对氢气管道进行检测，可以快速定位氢气泄漏点位，减少了人工检测的时间，同时可以避免操作人员长时间位于氢气环境中，减少了安全隐患，根据检查管路的复杂程度进行增减，若检测系统管路内有多个弯头、三通、接头等连接件，导致气体流动性较差，可适当增加时间；若检测系统管路基本为直管，可适当减少时间，可以有效提高系统的灵活性，针对系统应用场景进行个性化设置，以便提高检测效率。

abstract.text: The present invention provides a technology that can stabilize and impart high functionality to a material for use in a high-pressure hydrogen gas environment and a liquid hydrogen environment. This austenitic stainless steel contains, as a component composition, 0.040-0.100% of C, 0.25-1.00% of Si, 13.50-18.50% of Mn, 0.020-0.045% of P, 0.0001-0.0020% of S, 4.00-8.00% of Ni, 16.50-18.00% of Cr, 0.05-2.00% of Mo, 0.05-1.00% of Cu, 0.12-0.45% of N, 0.002-0.020% of Al, 0.002-0.016% of Sn, 0.06-1.00% of Co, and 0.0001-0.0050% of O, the remaining portion being Fe and unavoidable impurities.

L'invention fournit une technique qui permet l'augmentation de la fonctionnalité et la stabilisation d'un matériau mis en œuvre dans un environnement d'hydrogène gazeux haute pression ou un environnement d'hydrogène liquide. Plus précisément, l'invention concerne un acier inoxydable austénitique qui comprend, en tant que composition, Ｃ：０,０４０ à ０,１００％, Ｓｉ：０,２５ à １,００％, Ｍｎ：１３,５０ à １８,５０％, Ｐ：０,０２０ à ０,０４５％, Ｓ：０,０００１ à ０,００２０％, Ｎｉ：４,００ à ８,００％, Ｃｒ：１６,５０ à １８,００％, Ｍｏ：０,０５ à ２,００％, Ｃｕ：０,０５ à １,００％, Ｎ：０,１２ à ０,４５％, Ａｌ：０,００２ à ０,０２０％, Ｓｎ：０,００２ à ０,０１６％, Ｃｏ：０,０６ à １,００％ et Ｏ：０,０００１ à ０,００５０％, le reste étant constitué de Fe et des impuretés inévitables.

abstract.text: The invention discloses L415MH pipeline steel and a preparation method thereof. The steel meets any of the following items: in a NACE TM0284 standard A solution environment, CLR is less than or equal to 10%, CTR is less than or equal to 3%, and CSR is less than or equal to 1%; a stress corrosion test is carried out according to the NACE TM0177 standard, the loading stress is 0.8 sigma s, and the surface of a tensile sample has no crack; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, the tensile strength, the ductility and the percentage reduction of area of the smooth sample are respectively greater than or equal to 90%, 80% and 75% in a nitrogen environment; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, K1C of the step type compact tensile sample is greater than or equal to 100 MPa.m < 1/2 >. According to the preparation method, in temperature-controlled water cooling after hot rolling, the initial cooling temperature is Ar3-50 DEG C to Ar3-30 DEG C, and the final cooling temperature is Min (TVC, TVN)-300 DEG C to Min (TVC, TVN)-270 DEG C.

本发明揭示了一种L415MH管线钢及其制备方法。所述钢满足以下任意项：在NACE TM0284标准A溶液环境下，CLR≤10％、CTR≤3％、CSR≤1％；在NACE TM0177标准进行应力腐蚀测试，加载应力为0.8σs，拉伸试样表面无裂纹；在6.3MPa纯氢环境下，光滑试样的抗拉强度、延伸率、断面收缩率分别大于等于氮气环境下的90％、80％、75％；在6.3MPa纯氢环境下，台阶型紧凑拉伸试样的K1C≥100MPa·m1/2。所述制备方法在热轧后的控温水冷中，开冷温度Ar3‑50℃～Ar3‑30℃，终冷温度Min(TVC,TVN)‑300℃～Min(TVC,TVN)‑270℃。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a hydrogen-corrosion-resistant steel plate for a pipeline and a production method of the hydrogen-corrosion-resistant steel plate. The steel plate meets at least one of the following conditions: in a NACE TM0284 standard A solution environment, CLR is less than or equal to 10%, CTR is less than or equal to 3%, and CSR is less than or equal to 1%; in a NACE TM0177 standard stress corrosion test, the loading stress is 0.8 sigma s, and the surface of a tensile sample has no crack; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, the tensile strength, the ductility and the percentage reduction of area of the smooth sample are not lower than 90%, 85% and 80% in a nitrogen environment respectively; in a 6.3 MPa pure hydrogen environment, K1C of the step type compact tensile sample is greater than or equal to 110 MPa.m < 1/2 >. The production method comprises the steps of continuous casting, hot rolling and temperature control water cooling. And the initial cooling temperature of temperature control water cooling is Ar3-70 DEG C to Ar3-50 DEG C, and the final cooling temperature is Min (TVC, TVN)-50 DEG C to Min (TVC, TVN)-30 DEG C.

本发明揭示了一种耐氢腐蚀的管线用钢板及其生产方法。所述钢板满足下列至少其一：在NACE TM0284标准A溶液环境下，CLR≤10％、CTR≤3％、CSR≤1％；在NACE TM0177标准应力腐蚀测试，加载应力0.8σs，拉伸试样表面无裂纹；在6.3MPa纯氢环境下，光滑试样的抗拉强度、延伸率、断面收缩率分别不低于氮气环境下的90％、85％、80％；在6.3MPa纯氢环境下，台阶型紧凑拉伸试样的K1C≥110MPa·m1/2。所述生产方法包括连铸、热轧、控温水冷；控温水冷的开冷温度Ar3‑70℃～Ar3‑50℃，终冷温度Min(TVC,TVN)‑50℃～Min(TVC,TVN)‑30℃。

invention_title.text: Construction method and application of heat-resistant yeast for synthesizing mannitol
一种合成甘露糖醇耐热酵母的构建方法和应用

abstract.text: The invention relates to heat-resistant yeast for synthesizing mannitol as well as a construction method and application of the heat-resistant yeast. According to the invention, firstly, Kluyveromyces marxianus is used as a chassis to screen five kinds of mannitol synthesis related genes from different sources, wherein the mannitol yield of the strain is the highest when CmMDH is over-expressed. And then, promoting the expression of the NADPH synthetic gene by increasing the copy number of the CmMDH and overexpression, so as to obtain the strain Y2CmMDH-KmUTR1 with higher yield. The production of the mannitol is further promoted by subsequently improving the oxygen introduction and pH (Potential of Hydrogen) environment. According to the invention, the yeast strain for efficiently producing the mannitol at 42 DEG C is constructed for the first time, and the mannitol is produced by using the molasses and the jerusalem artichoke without adding extra enzymes. The method has important significance for realizing industrial production of mannitol and recycling of agricultural wastes through a microbial synthesis method.

本发明涉及合成甘露糖醇的耐热酵母及其构建方法和应用。本发明首先以马克斯克鲁维酵母为底盘筛选了5种不同来源的甘露糖醇合成相关基因，其中过表达CmMDH时菌株甘露糖醇产量最高。随后，通过增加CmMDH拷贝数和过表达促进NADPH合成基因的表达，得到产量更高的菌株Y2CmMDH‑KmUTR1。后续改良通氧和pH环境，进一步促进了甘露糖醇的生产。本发明首次构建了在42℃下高效生产甘露糖醇的酵母菌株，并且无需添加额外的酶就实现了用糖蜜和菊芋生产甘露糖醇。这对通过微生物合成法实现甘露糖醇的工业化生产以及农业废弃物的再利用有重要意义。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of pipeline steel production, in particular to 450MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline steel and a production method thereof. The steel comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.051%-0.059% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.70%-0.80% of Mn, 0.016%-0.026% of Nb, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.12%-0.18% of Mo, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Mo is added to improve the volume fraction of a precipitated phase, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

本发明涉及管道用钢生产技术领域，尤其涉及一种450MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法。钢中化学成分为C：0.051%～0.059%、Si：0.10%～0.20%、Mn：0.70%～0.80%、Nb：0.016%～0.026%、Ti：0.013%～0.019%、Ni：0.20%～0.30%、Mo：0.12%～0.18%、P≤0.012%、S≤0.0015%、N≤0.0040%，其余为Fe和杂质。采用低碳低锰低硅的成分设计，结合纯净钢冶炼技术，综合利用Nb、Ti微合金化，添加Mo提高析出相体积分数、添加Ni促进位错交滑移，成品钢板在临氢环境下各项性能良好。

一种320MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for 320MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipelines and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.20%-0.30% of Cu, and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurities, p is less than or equal to 0.012%, S is less than or equal to 0.0015%, and N is less than or equal to 0.0040%. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cu is added to form a passive film, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

本发明涉及一种管道用钢生产技术领域，尤其涉及一种320MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法。钢板化学成分为C：0.041%～0.049%、Si：0.10%～0.20%、Mn：0.58%～0.67%、Nb：0.005%～0.010%、V：0.05%～0.08%、Ti：0.013%～0.019%、Ni：0.20%～0.30%、Cu：0.20%～0.30%，且Cu=Ni；P≤0.012%、S≤0.0015%、N≤0.0040%，其余为Fe和杂质。采用低碳低锰低硅的成分设计，结合纯净钢冶炼技术，综合利用Nb、V、Ti微合金化，添加Cu形成钝化膜、添加Ni促进位错交滑移，成品钢板在临氢环境下各项性能良好。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for 245MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipelines and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.12%-0.19% of Cr, 0.10%-0.20% of Cu, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cu is added to form a passive film, the structure uniformity in the thickness direction is improved by adding Cr, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

本发明涉及管道用钢生产技术领域，尤其涉及一种245MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法。钢板化学成分为C：0.041%～0.049%、Si：0.10%～0.20%、Mn：0.58%～0.67%、Nb：0.005%～0.010%、V：0.05%～0.08%、Ti：0.013%～0.019%、Cr：0.12%～0.19%、Cu：0.10%～0.20%、P≤0.012%、S≤0.0015%、N≤0.0040%，其余为Fe和杂质。采用低碳低锰低硅的成分设计，结合纯净钢冶炼技术，综合利用Nb、V、Ti微合金化，添加Cu形成钝化膜、添加Cr提高厚度方向组织均匀性，成品钢板在临氢环境下各项性能良好。

invention_title.text: HYDROGEN SHIELDING FILM
水素遮蔽膜

abstract.text: To provide a hydrogen shielding film that can suppress hydrogen embrittlement of a structural material for a long term under a hydrogen environment.SOLUTION: A hydrogen shielding film is constituted of a multilayer film laminated on an outside surface of a structural material comprising a metal and/or an alloy which are susceptible to hydrogen embrittlement. The number of layers constituting the multilayer film is at least two. The number of layers constituting the multilayer film laminated in part of the region of the outside surface of the structural material is different from the number of layers constituting the multilayer film laminated in the other regions of the outside surface of the structural material. In a hydrogen-resistant structural material, the whole outside surface of the structural material is coated on the hydrogen shielding film.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

【課題】水素環境下で、長時間、構造材の水素脆化を抑制できる水素遮蔽膜の提供。【解決手段】水素遮蔽膜は、水素脆化する金属及び／又は合金からなる構造材の外表面に積層される多層膜から構成される。この多層膜をなす層の数は、少なくとも２である。この構造材の外表面の一部の領域に積層される多層膜をなす層の数は、この構造材の外表面の他の領域に積層される多層膜をなす層の数と異なっている。耐水素性構造材は、構造材の外表面全体がこの水素遮蔽膜に被覆されている。【選択図】図１

invention_title.text: Steel for 415MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
一种415MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for a 415 MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.051%-0.059% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.70%-0.80% of Mn, 0.016%-0.026% of Nb, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Cu, 0.12%-0.18% of Mo, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Mo is added to improve the volume fraction of a precipitated phase, Cu is added to form a passive film to prevent hydrogen permeation, and the finished steel plate is good in performance in a hydrogen environment.

本发明涉及管道用钢生产技术领域，尤其涉及一种415MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法。钢板化学成分为C：0.051%～0.059%、Si：0.10%～0.20%、Mn：0.70%～0.80%、Nb：0.016%～0.026%、Ti：0.013%～0.019%、Cu：0.20%～0.30%、Mo：0.12%～0.18%、P≤0.012%、S≤0.0015%、N≤0.0040%，其余为Fe和杂质。采用低碳低锰低硅的成分设计，结合纯净钢冶炼技术，综合利用Nb、Ti微合金化，添加Mo提高析出相体积分数、添加Cu形成钝化膜阻止氢渗透，成品钢板在临氢环境下各性能良好。

invention_title.text: Steel for 290MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and production method thereof
一种290MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of production of steel for pipelines, in particular to steel for a 290MPa-grade hydrogen-doped conveying pipeline and a production method of the steel. The steel plate comprises the following chemical components in percentage by weight: 0.041%-0.049% of C, 0.10%-0.20% of Si, 0.58%-0.67% of Mn, 0.005%-0.010% of Nb, 0.05%-0.08% of V, 0.013%-0.019% of Ti, 0.20%-0.30% of Ni, 0.04%-0.08% of Cr, less than or equal to 0.012% of P, less than or equal to 0.0015% of S, less than or equal to 0.0040% of N and the balance of Fe and impurities. A low-carbon, low-manganese and low-silicon component design is adopted, a pure steel smelting technology is combined, Nb, V and Ti are comprehensively utilized for microalloying, Cr is added to improve the structure uniformity in the thickness direction, Ni is added to promote dislocation slippage, and the finished steel plate is good in various properties in a hydrogen environment.

本发明涉及管道用钢生产技术领域，尤其涉及一种290MPa级掺氢输送管道用钢及其生产方法。钢板化学成分为C：0.041%～0.049%、Si：0.10%～0.20%、Mn：0.58%～0.67%、Nb：0.005%～0.010%、V：0.05%～0.08%、Ti：0.013%～0.019%、Ni：0.20%～0.30%、Cr：0.04%～0.08%、P≤0.012%、S≤0.0015%、N≤0.0040%，其余为Fe和杂质。采用低碳低锰低硅的成分设计，结合纯净钢冶炼技术，综合利用Nb、V、Ti微合金化，添加Cr提高厚度方向组织均匀性，添加Ni促进位错交滑移，成品钢板在临氢环境下各项性能良好。

abstract.text: Provided is a martensitic steel capable of exhibiting very high strength even under a high-pressure hydrogen environment.　The martensitic steel for a high-pressure hydrogen environment has a component composition comprising, in mass%, C: 0.25 to 0.75%, Si: 0.1 to 1.5%, Mn: 0.1 to 1.5%, P: 0.04% or less, S: 0.01% or less, Ni: 0.5% or less, Cr: 9.0 to 15.0%, one or both of Mo and W according to the relational expression (Mo+1/2W): 3.0% or less, Cu: 0.5% or less, Nb: 0.3% or less, N: 0.10% or less, with the balance being Fe and inevitable impurities, wherein, when a low strain rate tensile test using a hollow test piece is conducted in high-pressure hydrogen of 10 MPaG or more, the tensile strength is 1800 MPa or higher, the carbide area ratio in a cross-sectional structure is 0.1 to 10.0%, and the average circle equivalent diameter of the carbide is 0.10 to 1.0 μm.

Est proposé un acier martensitique pouvant présenter une résistance très élevée même dans un environnement d'hydrogène à haute pression.　L'acier martensitique pour un environnement d'hydrogène à haute pression présente une composition de composants comprenant, en % en masse, C : 0,25 à 0,75 %, Si : 0,1 à 1,5 %, Mn : 0,1 à 1,5 %, P : 0,04 % ou moins, S : 0,01 % ou moins, Ni : 0,5 % ou moins, Cr : 9,0 à 15,0 %, l'un et/ou l'autre des éléments Mo et W selon l'expression relationnelle (Mo+1/2W) : 3,0 % ou moins, Cu : 0,5 % ou moins, Nb : 0,3 % ou moins, N : 0,10 % ou moins, le reste étant du Fe et des impuretés inévitables. Lorsqu'un essai de traction à faible taux de contrainte à l'aide d'une pièce d'essai creuse est conduit dans de l'hydrogène à haute pression de 10 MPaG ou plus, la résistance à la traction est de 1 800 MPa ou plus, le rapport de surface de carbure dans une structure de section transversale est de 0,1 à 10,0 %, et le diamètre équivalent de cercle moyen du carbure est de 0,10 à 1,0 µm.

高圧水素環境下においても非常に高い強度を得ることができるマルテンサイト鋼を提供する。　質量％で、Ｃ：０．２５～０．７５％、Ｓｉ：０．１～１．５％、Ｍｎ：０．１～１．５％、Ｐ：０．０４％以下、Ｓ：０．０１％以下、Ｎｉ：０．５％以下、Ｃｒ：９．０～１５．０％、（Ｍｏ＋１／２Ｗ）の関係式によるＭｏおよびＷのうちの１種または２種：３．０％以下、Ｃｕ：０．５％以下、Ｎｂ：０．３％以下、Ｎ：０．１０％以下、残部Ｆｅおよび不可避的不純物の成分組成からなり、　１０ＭＰａＧ以上の高圧水素中における中空試験片低ひずみ速度引張試験を実施した際、引張強度が１８００ＭＰａ以上であり、断面組織における炭化物面積率が０．１～１０．０％、炭化物平均円相当径が０．１０～１．０μｍである、高圧水素環境用マルテンサイト鋼。
