abstract.text: The invention provides a preparation method of TiO2 in a mixed crystal form, TiO2 loaded with elemental palladium as well as a preparation method and application of the TiO2, and belongs to the field of hydrogen sensing. The invention provides a preparation method of TiO2 in a mixed crystal form, which comprises the following steps: carrying out annealing treatment on TiO2 in a single crystal form to obtain TiO2 in the mixed crystal form; the annealing treatment is carried out in an atmosphere containing CO. The crystal form and the surface property of the TiO2 can be changed in the process of annealing the single crystal form TiO2 in the CO-containing atmosphere to form the mixed crystal form TiO2, so that the hydrogen adsorption capacity and the response speed of the TiO2 are improved. Furthermore, by loading Pd, the sensitivity and high selectivity of the catalyst to hydrogen can be further enhanced, and meanwhile, the catalyst also has relatively high detection performance in a low-concentration hydrogen environment and at a low working temperature.

本发明提供了一种混合晶型的TiO2的制备方法、负载有钯单质的TiO2及其制备方法和应用，属于氢气传感领域。本发明提供了一种混合晶型的TiO2的制备方法，包括以下步骤：将单一晶型的TiO2进行退火处理，得到混合晶型的TiO2；所述退火处理在含有CO的气氛中进行。单一晶型的TiO2在含有CO的气氛退火处理形成混合晶型的TiO2的过程中能够改变TiO2的晶型和表面性质，从而提高其对氢气的吸附能力和响应速度。进一步地，本发明通过负载Pd，可以进一步增强其对氢气的灵敏度、高选择性，同时在低浓度氢气环境下和低工作温度下也有较高的检测性能。

abstract.text: The invention discloses a hydrogen environment sealing structure leakage characteristic test system, and relates to the technical field of gas leakage monitoring, the hydrogen environment sealing structure leakage characteristic test system comprises a gas supply assembly, a leakage assembly, a sealing structure, a multi-parameter measurement assembly and a hydrogen leakage rate measurement assembly, the gas supply assembly comprises a hydrogen storage container and a gas filling pipeline, the hydrogen storage container is used for storing hydrogen, and the gas filling pipeline is used for filling gas; a gas outlet of the hydrogen storage container is communicated with a first end of the gas filling pipeline, the leakage assembly comprises a leakage joint, the leakage joint is communicated with a second end of the gas filling pipeline, and the leakage joint is used for leaking hydrogen into the sealing structure; the multi-parameter measuring assembly comprises multiple different types of measuring devices and is used for measuring different parameters of leaked hydrogen in the sealing structure, and the hydrogen leakage rate measuring assembly is connected with the sealing structure and is used for measuring the hydrogen leakage rate. According to the invention, online real-time monitoring of hydrogen leakage can be realized, and effective data support is provided for improving the accuracy of leakage monitoring.

本发明公开了一种氢环境密封结构泄漏特性测试系统，涉及气体泄漏监测技术领域，包括供气组件、泄漏组件、密封结构、多参量测量组件和氢泄漏率测量组件，供气组件包括储氢容器和充气管路，所述储氢容器用于储存氢气，所述储氢容器的出气口与所述充气管路的第一端连通，所述泄漏组件包括泄漏接头，所述泄漏接头与所述充气管路的第二端连通，所述泄漏接头用于向所述密封结构内泄漏氢气；所述多参量测量组件包括多种不同类型的测量装置，用于对所述密封结构内泄漏氢气的不同参数进行测量，所述氢泄漏率测量组件与所述密封结构连接，用于测量氢气泄漏率。本发明能够实现氢气泄漏的在线实时监测，为提高泄漏监测的准确性提供有效数据支撑。

invention_title.text: High-strength boron carbide composite material and preparation method thereof
一种高强度碳化硼复合材料及其制备方法

extracted_name.value: SONGSHAN ZHENGZHOU BORON TECH CO LTD
郑州嵩山硼业科技有限公司

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of composite materials, and particularly relates to a high-strength boron carbide composite material and a preparation method thereof.The preparation method comprises the following steps that S1, modification of titanium boride whiskers is conducted, specifically, the titanium boride whiskers, silicon powder and a grinding aid are put into a ball milling tank, ball milling, cleaning and drying are conducted, and the modified titanium boride whiskers are obtained; s2, preparation of composite material powder: mixing phenolic resin, boron carbide powder and deionized water, performing primary ball milling, then adding the modified titanium boride whisker, performing secondary ball milling, drying, and performing tertiary ball milling to obtain the composite material powder; and S3, sintering of the composite material: pressing the powder into blocks, drying moisture, pyrolyzing in a hydrogen environment, then coating with silicon powder, and sintering in vacuum. Titanium boride whiskers are adopted as a toughening and reinforcing component to reinforce and toughen the boron carbide composite material, and a liquid phase siliconizing sintering method is adopted to immerse the silicon element into the composite material system, so that the composite material is obtained. And silicon carbide can be generated in situ in the composite material, so that composite toughening of titanium boride and silicon carbide is realized.

本发明属于复合材料技术领域，具体涉及一种高强度碳化硼复合材料及其制备方法，包括如下步骤：S1：硼化钛晶须的改性：将硼化钛晶须、硅粉及助磨剂放入球磨罐中，球磨，清洗干燥即得改性硼化钛晶须；S2：复合材料粉末的制备：将酚醛树脂、碳化硼粉末及去离子水混合后，一次球磨，随后加入改性硼化钛晶须，二次球磨，烘干，三次球磨得到复合材料粉末；S3：复合材料的烧结：将粉末压制成块，烘干水分，氢气环境下热解，随后用硅粉包覆，真空烧结即可，本发明采用硼化钛晶须作为增韧增强组分对碳化硼复合材料进行增强增韧处理，并采用液相渗硅烧结方法在复合材料体系内部浸入硅元素，能够在复合材料内部原位生成碳化硅，进而实现硼化钛和碳化硅的复合增韧。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of test devices, and provides a low-temperature high-pressure hydrogen environment mechanical test bench, which comprises a hydrogen environment device, a refrigeration device and a test device, and is characterized in that the hydrogen environment device comprises a hydrogen environment box and a hydrogen supply mechanism, and the hydrogen supply mechanism supplies hydrogen to the hydrogen environment box; the refrigerating device refrigerates the hydrogen environment box; the testing device comprises a testing clamp, a transmission rod and a driving mechanism, the transmission rod is arranged in the hydrogen environment box in a reciprocating sliding mode, the first end of the transmission rod extends into the hydrogen environment box, the second end of the transmission rod extends out of the hydrogen environment box, the testing clamp comprises a first clamping part and a second clamping part, and the first clamping part is fixed relative to the hydrogen environment box; the second clamping part is connected with the first end of the transmission rod. The driving mechanism drives the transmission rod to slide back and forth. Therefore, a low-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen environment can be provided in combination with the refrigeration device and the hydrogen supply mechanism, the to-be-tested material is mounted on the test fixture, and tension or pressure can be applied to the to-be-tested material by utilizing the driving mechanism, so that the mechanical property test of the to-be-tested material can be completed.

本发明涉及测试装置技术领域，提供一种低温高压氢环境力学试验台，包括氢环境装置、制冷装置和测试装置，氢环境装置包括氢环境箱和供氢机构，供氢机构对氢环境箱供应氢气；制冷装置对氢环境箱制冷；测试装置包括测试夹具、传动杆和驱动机构，传动杆往复滑动地设于氢环境箱，传动杆第一端伸至氢环境箱内部，传动杆第二端伸至氢环境箱外部，测试夹具包括第一夹持部和第二夹持部，第一夹持部与氢环境箱相对固定，第二夹持部与传动杆第一端连接，驱动机构驱动传动杆往复滑动。如此，结合制冷装置和供氢机构可以提供低温、高压的氢环境，将待测材料安装于测试夹具，利用驱动机构可对待测材料施加拉力或者压力，从而可以完成对待测材料的力学性能测试。

abstract.text: The invention relates to high-toughness steel adapting to a high-damp-heat harsh hydrogen environment and a preparation method, and belongs to the technical field of steel preparation. The high strength and toughness steel comprises the following chemical components in percentage by mass: 0.40%-0.55% of C, 0.20%-1.50% of Si, 0.55%-1.50% of Mn, 0.70%-1.50% of Cr, 0.50%-1.50% of Ni, 0.15%-0.35% of Mo, 0.025%-0.065% of Al, less than or equal to 0.015% of P, less than or equal to 0.010% of S and the balance of Fe and inevitable impurities. By optimizing the alloy element ratio and synergistic effect, the strength, toughness and delayed fracture resistance of the steel are remarkably improved, and the long-life service requirement of the steel in the severe hydrogen environment is met at the strength level of 1200-1400 MPa.

本申请涉及一种适应高湿热苛刻氢环境下的高强韧钢及制备方法，属于钢材制备技术领域。以质量分数计，所述高强韧钢的化学成分为：C：0.40％～0.55％，Si：0.20％～1.50％，Mn：0.55％～1.50％，Cr：0.70％～1.50％，Ni：0.50％～1.50％，Mo：0.15％～0.35％，Al：0.025％～0.065％，P≤0.015％，S≤0.010％，余量为Fe及不可避免的杂质。通过优化合金元素配比与协同作用，显著提升钢材的强度、韧性及耐延迟断裂性能，使其在1200Mpa～1400MPa强度级别下满足苛刻氢环境的长寿命服役需求。

abstract.text: The invention relates to the technical field of high-entropy alloy hydrogen embrittlement resistance detection, and discloses a high-entropy alloy hydrogen embrittlement resistance detection method and device based on machine learning driving, and the method comprises the steps of calculation of elongation at break, setting of an elongation at break threshold and comparison of the elongation at break and the threshold. According to the method, the brittleness resistance of the high-entropy alloy in the hydrogen environment is evaluated through the unified standard elongation at break, and the detection reliability and comparability can be ensured regardless of the sample size. Compared with the direct comparison of the fracture length, the fracture elongation is not influenced by the sample size, so that the samples with different sizes can be evaluated under the unified standard, and the error caused by the size difference of the samples is avoided.

本发明涉及高熵合金抗氢脆性能检测技术领域，公开了一种基于机器学习驱动高熵合金抗氢脆性能检测方法及装置，包括断裂延伸率的计算、断裂延伸率阈值的设定以及二者的对比。本发明通过统一标准的断裂延伸率来评估高熵合金在氢气环境下的抗脆性，无论样品尺寸如何，都能确保检测的可靠性与可比性。相较于断裂长度的直接比较，断裂延伸率不受样品尺寸的影响，使得不同尺寸的样品可以在统一标准下进行评估，从而避免了因样品尺寸差异而引起的误差。

invention_title.text: Niobium oxide spraying powder, niobium oxide target material and preparation method thereof
一种氧化铌喷涂粉、氧化铌靶材及其制备方法

extracted_name.value: VITAL THIN FILM MAT ZIBO CO LTD
先导薄膜材料（淄博）有限公司

abstract.text: The invention discloses niobium oxide spraying powder, a niobium oxide target material and a preparation method of the niobium oxide spraying powder, and belongs to the technical field of plasma powder preparation. According to the niobium oxide spraying powder, niobium oxide and a certain amount of water are mixed and then ground, then slurry obtained through grinding is subjected to spray granulation and then sintered in a hydrogen environment at a specific temperature, and crushing and screening are conducted after sintering, so that the sphericity degree of the niobium oxide spraying powder can be effectively improved; the particle size of the niobium oxide spraying powder is in a proper range, and the particle size distribution uniformity is high; in addition, the obtained niobium oxide spraying powder also has a suitable apparent density range, excellent flowability and a relatively high spraying deposition rate. Meanwhile, in the preparation process of the niobium oxide spraying powder provided by the invention, no other metal powder is added, and no binder is added, so that the preparation cost can be effectively reduced. Furthermore, when the niobium oxide spraying powder provided by the invention is used for preparing a niobium oxide target material, the prepared niobium oxide target material is high in density and low in resistivity.

本发明公开了一种氧化铌喷涂粉、氧化铌靶材及其制备方法，属于等离子粉体制备技术领域；本发明提供的一种氧化铌喷涂粉通过先将氧化铌和一定的水混合后研磨，随后将研磨得到的浆料进行喷雾造粒后在氢气环境下以特定的温度烧结，烧结后破碎筛分，能够有效的提升氧化铌喷涂粉的球形度，使氧化铌喷涂粉的粒径在适宜的范围内且粒度分布均匀性高；并且，得到的氧化铌喷涂粉还具有适宜的松装密度范围、优异的流动性和较高的喷涂沉积率。同时，本发明提供的氧化铌喷涂粉的制备过程中不添加其他金属粉，也不添加粘结剂，能够有效的降低制备成本。进一步将本发明提供的氧化铌喷涂粉制备氧化铌靶材时，制备得到的氧化铌靶材的密度高，电阻率低。

abstract.text: The invention belongs to the technical field of hydrogen behavior tests in metal materials, and particularly relates to a high-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging method suitable for 316L stainless steel. The method provided by the invention is scientific and reasonable in design, and is a high-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging method taking the mixed molten salt of NaHSO4.H2O and KHSO4 in a mass ratio of 1: 1 as the electrolyte. Compared with normal-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging which takes H2SO4 as an electrolyte and high-temperature and high-pressure hydrogen charging which is carried out in a hydrogen environment by utilizing a high-pressure kettle in the current 316L stainless steel hydrogen embrittlement research, the method disclosed by the invention not only improves the problem of low efficiency of normal-temperature electrochemical hydrogen charging, but also solves the safety problem of high-temperature and high-pressure electrochemical hydrogen charging; according to the method, high-concentration hydrogen can be introduced into the 316L stainless steel, so that the 316L stainless steel is obviously embrittled.

本发明属于金属材料中的氢行为试验技术领域，具体涉及一种适用于316L不锈钢的高温电化学充氢方法。本发明方法设计科学合理，其是将质量比为1∶1的NaHSO4·H2O和KHSO4的混合熔融盐作为电解质的高温电化学充氢方法。与目前316L不锈钢氢脆研究中所采用的以H2SO4为电解质的常温电化学充氢和利用高压釜在氢环境下进行的高温高压充氢相比，本发明方法既改进了常温电化学充氢效率慢的问题，也解决了高温高压电化学充氢的安全性问题；利用本发明方法可以在316L不锈钢中引入高浓度的氢，从而使316L不锈钢产生明显的脆化。

abstract.text: The invention provides a thermal desorption gas chromatography analysis test system, and relates to the technical field of hydrogen diffusion characteristic research of materials in a high-pressure hydrogen environment, and the thermal desorption gas chromatography analysis test system comprises a high-pressure permeation device and a thermal desorption diffusion device; the high-pressure permeation device comprises a hydrogen permeation upper end cover, a hydrogen permeation lower end cover and a sealing ring; a hydrogen permeation cavity is formed in the hydrogen permeation lower end cover, a hydrogen inlet channel is formed in the hydrogen permeation lower end cover, and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover is in threaded connection with the hydrogen permeation upper end cover; the sealing ring is arranged in an annular sealing groove between the hydrogen permeation upper end cover and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover; the thermal desorption diffusion device is used for the thermal desorption hydrogen release process of the sample; the hydrogen permeation upper end cover and the hydrogen permeation lower end cover are connected through the threads, so that a sample is convenient to disassemble, assemble, take and place, and meanwhile, the sealing performance of the hydrogen permeation cavity is improved; besides, by arranging an annular sealing groove and a sealing ring, the sealing performance of the high-pressure permeation device is further improved, and the problem of lack of equipment for testing the diffusion performance of hydrogen in the non-metallic material under the 100 MPa high-pressure environment is solved.

本发明提供一种热解析气相色谱分析测试系统，涉及材料在高压氢气环境下氢气扩散特性研究技术领域，包括高压渗透装置以及热解析扩散装置；高压渗透装置包括渗氢上端盖、渗氢下端盖以及密封圈；渗氢下端盖中设置有渗氢腔体，渗氢下端盖上设置有氢气进气通道，渗氢下端盖与渗氢上端盖螺纹连接；密封圈设置在渗氢上端盖与渗氢下端盖之间的环形密封槽内；热解析扩散装置用于试样的热解析释氢过程；本发明通过设置螺纹连接渗氢上端盖、渗氢下端盖，不仅便于拆装取放试样，同时提高了渗氢腔体的密封性；另外，本发明通过设置环形密封槽和密封圈，进一步提高高压渗透装置的密封性，解决了100MPa高压环境下氢气在非金属材料中扩散性能测试装备缺失的问题。
